K03psp_5u:1: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sacet svapnāntaragato 'pi svapnopamāṃś caiva sarvadharmān vyavalokayati,
K03psp_5u:2: pratiśrutkopamān marīcyupamān pratibhāsopamān nirmitakopamān gandharvanagaropamāṃś ca sarvadharmān vyavalokayati na ca sākṣātkaroti,
K03psp_5u:3: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam. iti prathamaṃ liṅgam
K03psp_5u:4: punar aparaṃ subhūte svapnāntaragato 'pi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā traidhātuke vā na spṛhayati na cittam utpādayati nānuśaṃsayati,
K03psp_5u:5: idam api subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam. iti dvitīyam
K03psp_5u:6: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sacet svapnāntaragatas tathāgatam anekaśataparivāram
K03psp_5u:9: parivṛtaṃ puraskṛtaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ paśyati,
K03psp_5u:10: sa taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā tasya dharmasyārtham ājanāti dharmānudharmapratipanno viharati samayapratipanno 'nudharmacārī,
K03psp_5u:11: idam api subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam. iti tṛtīyam
K03psp_5u:12: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragataḥ sacet tathāgataṃ paśyed
K03psp_5u:13: vaihāyasam atyudgamya bhikṣusaṃghasya dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dvātriṃśadbhir mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
K03psp_5u:14: samalaṃkṛtaṃ vyāmaprabham ṛddhiprātihāryañ ca nidarśayantan nirmitāṃś ca nirmiṇvantan
K03psp_5u:15: tāṃś caiva nirmitān anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvataḥ,
K03psp_5u:16: idam api subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyasya lakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam. iti caturtham
K03psp_5u:17: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate grāmaghāte vartamāne nagaraghāte vartamāne 'gnidāhe vartamāne,
K03psp_5u:18: vyāḍamṛgān vā dṛṣṭvā tadanyān vā caṇḍamṛgajātīr dṛṣṭvā pipāsitān dṛṣṭvā bubhuksitān
K03psp_5u:19: dṛṣṭvā mātāpitṛmaraṇaṃ vā dṛṣṭvā bhrātṛbhaginīmaraṇaṃ vā dṛṣṭvā putraduhitṛmaraṇaṃ
K03psp_5u:20: vā dṛṣṭvā mitrāmātyajñātisālohitamaraṇaṃ vā dṛṣṭvā na śokabhayabhairavasaṃtrāsam utpādayati,
K03psp_5u:21: tataś ca svapnāt samanantaravibuddhasya samānasyaivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:23: mayāpy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya svapnopamaṃ sarvatraidhātukam iti dharmo deśayitavyaḥ,
K03psp_5u:24: idam api subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam. iti pañcamam
K03psp_5u:25: punar aparaṃ subhūte kathaṃ vijñāyate yathāvinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāṃ
K03psp_5u:26: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ
K03psp_5u:28: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato nārakaṃ vā sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tiryagyonigataṃ vā sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāmalokikaṃ vā sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
K03psp_5u:29: evaṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabhate yena smṛtilabdhasya caivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:30: tathā kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ trayo 'pāyā na bhaviṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:31: tathā hi yaś ca svapno yaś cāhaṃ sarva ime dharmā advayā advaidhīkārāḥ,
K03psp_5u:32: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam. iti saṣṭham
K03psp_5u:33: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsatttvaḥ svapnāntaragato vā prativibuddho vā nagaradāhe vartamāne,
K03psp_5u:35: yena mayā svapnāntaragatena vā prativibuddhena vā ya ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni
K03psp_5u:36: dṛṣṭāni yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K03psp_5u:38: yadi ta ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni mama saṃvidyante tair avaivartiko bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ satyādhiṣṭhānaṃ karoti, (PSP_5:3)
K03psp_5u:39: yena satyena satyavacanenāhaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tena satyena satyavacanenāyaṃ
K03psp_5u:40: nagaradāha upaśāmyatu śītībhavatv astaṃ gacchatu. saced upaśāmyati śītībhavaty astaṃ
K03psp_5u:41: gacchati veditavyaṃ subhūte vyākṛto batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv
K03psp_5u:42: avinivartanīyatāyai. sacet punaḥ subhūte agniskandho 'tikramitvā gṛhād gṛhaṃ dahati
K03psp_5u:43: rathyāyā rathyā dahaty anyad gṛhaṃ dahaty anyad gṛhaṃ na dahaty anyāṃ rathyāṃ dahaty
K03psp_5u:44: anyāṃ rathyāṃ na dahati veditavyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharmaṃ pratyākhyānasaṃvartanīyam
K03psp_5u:45: etaiḥ sattvaiḥ karmopacitaṃ yenaiteṣāṃ sattvānām ekaṃ gṛhaṃ dahyate,
K03psp_5u:47: teṣām etad dṛṣṭadhārmikam eva karma vipacyate,
K03psp_5u:48: ayaṃ subhūte hetur ayaṃ pratyayo 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yair hetubhir yaiḥ pratyayair avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. iti saptamam
K03psp_5u:49: punar aparaṃ subhūte yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo
K03psp_5u:50: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyas tān ākārāṃs tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni deśayiṣyāmi.
K03psp_5u:51: sacet subhūte kaścid eva strī vā puruṣo vāmanuṣyeṇādhiṣṭhito bhavet,
K03psp_5u:53: saced ahaṃ vyākṛtas tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye,
K03psp_5u:54: pariśuddhaś ca me 'dhyāśayo yathāham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmo yathāham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye,
K03psp_5u:56: apagataṃ me śrāvakacittam apagataṃ me pratyekabuddhacittam,
K03psp_5u:59: abhisaṃbhotsya evāham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodiṃ ye 'pi te 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu
K03psp_5u:60: buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti teṣāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ
K03psp_5u:61: nāsti kiṃcid adṛṣṭaṃ vāśrutaṃ vāviditaṃ vāsākṣātkṛtaṃ vānabhisaṃbuddhaṃ vā yathā
K03psp_5u:62: te buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajānanti paśyanti mamādhyāśayara iti hy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_5u:63: abhisaṃbhotsya etena satyena satyavacanenāyaṃ strī vā puruṣo vā yenāmanuṣyeṇa gṛhīto
K03psp_5u:66: sacet punaḥ subhūte so 'manuṣyas tato nāpakrāmati tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ
K03psp_5u:67: bhāṣamāṇasya veditavyam etat subhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tair pūrvakais
K03psp_5u:69: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya so 'manuṣyas tato
K03psp_5u:70: 'pakrāmati veditavyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo
K03psp_5u:71: mahāsattvas taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
K03psp_5u:72: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo
K03psp_5u:74: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
K03psp_5u:76: āryāṣṭāṅge ca mārge caturṣv āryasatyeṣu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu bodhisattvaniyāmam
K03psp_5u:77: anavakrāntasya satyādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati saced bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:79: tena satyena satyavacanenāyam amanuṣyabhūta ito 'pakrāmatv ity evaṃ satyādhiṣṭhānaṃ kariṣyati. tatra māraḥ pāpīyān autsukyam āpatsyate katham amanuṣya ito 'pakrāmed?
K03psp_5u:81: tathā hi māraḥ pāpīyān balavattaraṃ ca tejovattaraṃ ca tatrautsukyam āpatsyate katham ayam amanuṣya ito 'pakrāmed iti,
K03psp_5u:83: evaṃ ca tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_5u:85: na punar evaṃ jñāsyati mārānubhāvenaiṣo 'manuṣya ito 'pakrānta iti. sa tenānyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamaṃsyate ullāpayiṣyaty uccagghayiṣyati
K03psp_5u:86: ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair
K03psp_5u:87: ete punar anye na vyākṛtā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye. sa tena tāvanmātrakeṇa māraṃ vivardhayiṣyati,
K03psp_5u:88: dūrīkariṣyati sarvākārajñatāṃ dūrīkariṣyaty anuttaraṃ buddhajñānam. sa tathārūpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tāvanmātrakeṇānupāyakuśalo (PSP_5:5)
K03psp_5u:90: tasya dve bhūmi pratikāṅkṣitavye. katame dve?
K03psp_5u:91: yad uta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā. evaṃ satyādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārakarmotpatsyate,
K03psp_5u:92: tatra sa kalyāṇamitrāṇi na seviṣyate na bhajiṣyate na paryupāsiṣyate tad eva mārabandhanam āgāḍhīkariṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:93: yathāpi nāma ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv acaritatvād upāyakauśalena vāparigṛhītatvād,
K03psp_5u:94: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena satyādhiṣṭhānena mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_5u:95: kathaṃ ca punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv acaritāvino yāvad bodhisattvaniyāmam anavakrāntasya satyādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati?
K03psp_5u:96: iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān anyatareṇa veṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam evaṃ vakṣyati:
K03psp_5u:97: vyākṛtas tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye,
K03psp_5u:101: idan te mātur nāmadheyam idan te putraduhitṛbhaginīnāmadheyam,
K03psp_5u:102: idan te mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānāṃ yāvad āsaptamamātāmahapitāmahayugasya nāmadheyam upadekṣyati,
K03psp_5u:103: āmuṣmāt tvaṃ janapadād āmuṣmāt tvaṃ nagarād amuṣmād diśas tvam āgato,
K03psp_5u:104: 'muṣmin janapade tvaṃ jāto 'musmiṃ grāme vā nagare vā. sacet prakṛtyā mṛduko bhaviṣyati sa tam evaṃ vakṣyati:
K03psp_5u:105: pūrvam api tvam evaṃ mṛduka evābhūḥ,
K03psp_5u:106: sacet sa tīkṣṇo bhaviṣyati sa tam evaṃ vakṣyati:
K03psp_5u:107: pūrvam api tvam evaṃ tīkṣṇa evābhūḥ,
K03psp_5u:111: sacet khalupunaḥpaścādbhaktiko bhaviṣyati saced ekāśaniko bhaviṣyati sacet prasthavpiṇḍiko bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_5u:126: pūrvam api tvaṃ mandamantra evābhūḥ. tat kasya (PSP_5:6)
K03psp_5u:127: hetoḥ? tathā hi tavaivaṃrūpā dhūtaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante niścayena te pūrvam apy eta eva dhūtagunāḥ saṃlekhā abhūvan.
K03psp_5u:128: so 'nena ca pūrvakeṇa nāmāpadeśena gotrāpadeśena ca pratyutpannadhūtaguṇāpadeśena ca manyanām utpādayiṣyati. tam enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramyaivaṃ
K03psp_5u:129: vyākṛtas tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye 'vinivartanīyatāyāṃ yathā te dhūtaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante.
K03psp_5u:138: vyākṛtas tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:139: tathā hi tavāmī guṇāḥ saṃvidyante 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām.
K03psp_5u:140: ye ca te mayā subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ākārā liṅgāni
K03psp_5u:141: nimittāny ākhyātās te tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃvidyante. veditavyaṃ
K03psp_5u:142: subhūte tadanyair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair mārādhiṣṭhito batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:143: tathā hi ya ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāny 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_5u:144: te cāsya na saṃvidyante. anena ca nāmāpadeśena tad anyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
K03psp_5u:146: idam api subhūte nāmāpadeśena nāmādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_5u:147: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmādhiṣṭhānena mārakarma veditavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:148: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritaḥ sattvānāṃ nāma na jānāti,
K03psp_5u:151: vijñānaṃ na jānāti. tasya māraḥ pāpīyān nāmādhiṣṭhānena vyākariṣyati,
K03psp_5u:152: yāvat te 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyedaṃ nāma bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_5u:153: yat tena nāmadheyam anuvitarkitaṃ bhaviṣyaty anuvicāritam. tatra duṣprajñājātīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānupāyakuśalasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati:
K03psp_5u:155: yac ca mayā nāmadheyaṃ manasānuvitarkitam anuvicāritam, (PSP_5:7)
K03psp_5u:156: idaṃ mamānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya nāmadheyaṃ bhaviṣyati. tathā tathā māraḥ pāpīyān nirdekṣyati mārakāyikā vā devatā mārādhiṣṭhito vā bhikṣus tasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati:
K03psp_5u:159: yathā cānena bhikṣunā nirdiṣṭaṃ sameti nāma sameti me nāmnā vyākṛto 'haṃ tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
K03psp_5u:160: ye ca mayā subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākārā liṅgāni nimittāny ākhyātāni tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃvidyante,
K03psp_5u:164: sa tayā manyanayā abhimanyatayā dūrībhaviṣyaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tasyopāyakauśalyavirahitasya
K03psp_5u:165: prajñā pāramitāvirahitasya kalyāṇamitravirahitasya pāpamitraparigṛhītasya dve bhūmī
K03psp_5u:166: pratikāṅksitavye yad uta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā. atha vā ciraṃ
K03psp_5u:167: suciraṃ saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtyemām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_5u:168: abhisaṃbhotsyate. sacet sa priyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān na kalyāṇamitrāṇy abhīkṣṇaṃ
K03psp_5u:170: sacet tenaivātmabhāvapratilābhena tān pūrvakāṃś cittotpādān na vigarhiṣyati na pratideśayiṣyati tasya dve bhūmī pratikāṅkṣitavye yad uta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā.
K03psp_5u:171: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bhikṣuś catasṛṇāṃ mūlāpattīnām anyatarānyatarām āpattim āpadyābhikṣur
K03psp_5u:172: bhavaty aśramaṇo 'śākyaputrīyaḥ. so 'bhavyas tenaiva cātmabhāvena caturṇāṃ śrāmaṇyaphalānām
K03psp_5u:174: evam eva subhūte ayaṃ tato gurutaraś cittotpādo yo 'yaṃ nāmāpadeśena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya manyanāsahagataś cittotpāda utpannas,
K03psp_5u:175: tena ca nāmāpadeśamātreṇānyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamaṃsyate,
K03psp_5u:178: pañcabhyo 'pi subhūte ānantaryebhyaḥ karmabhyo gurutaro 'yaṃ cittotpādo yo 'yaṃ (PSP_5:8)
K03psp_5u:179: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpadeśena manyanāsahagataś cittotpāda utpannas,
K03psp_5u:180: tena ca nāmāpadeśamātreṇānyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamaṃsyate,
K03psp_5u:181: ayaṃ tato gurutaraś cittotpādo veditavyaḥ. iti hi subhūte imāni tāni nāmāni nāmāpadeśenotpadyamānāni mārakarmāṇi sūkṣmāṇi bhavanti.
K03psp_5u:182: punar aparaṃ subhūte vivekaguṇena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān hy upasaṃkramiṣyaty upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
K03psp_5u:183: vivekasya tathāgato varṇavādī. nāhaṃ subhūte evaṃ vivekaṃ vadāmi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yad utāraṇyāni vanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni.
K03psp_5u:185: kataraḥ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānyo viveko yadi nāraṇyāni vanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni?
K03psp_5u:186: kathaṃrūpo bhagavann anyo viveko bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya?
K03psp_5u:188: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vivikto bhavati,
K03psp_5u:192: yo 'yaṃ mayā subhūte viveko 'nujñāto bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. anena ca vivekena
K03psp_5u:193: rātriṃdivaṃ viharati viviktaś caiva viharati bodhisattvo mahāsatvo yad uta bodhisattvavivekena
K03psp_5u:194: nāraṇyavanaprasthaprāntaśayanāsanair viharati vivikta eva viharati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo,
K03psp_5u:195: grāmānte 'pi vā viharann anena vivekena viviktaś caiva viharati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
K03psp_5u:196: yaś ca mayā subhūte viveko 'nujñāto bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
K03psp_5u:197: yañ ca punaḥ sa māraḥ pāpīyān vivekam upadekṣyaty araṇyavanaprasthaprāntaśayanāsanair viharati,
K03psp_5u:198: sa tena vivekena saṃkīrṇaś caiva samānaḥ śrāvakapratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ viharati
K03psp_5u:200: sarvākārajñatāṃ na paripūrayati. evaṃ so 'nena vihāreṇa viharann apariśuddhadharmamanasikāraś
K03psp_5u:201: caiva samānas tadanyān api bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamaṃsyate ye te grāmānte viharanti
K03psp_5u:204: atha ca punaḥ so 'nupāyakuśalo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
K03psp_5u:205: kiṃ cāpi yojanaśatikeṣv aṭavīkāntāreṣv apagatavyādamṛgapakṣiṣv apagatacaurakāntāreṣv
K03psp_5u:206: apagatabhṛśaparṇarākṣasānuvicariteṣu tatra madhye vā saṃkalpayed varṣaṃ vā varṣaśataṃ
K03psp_5u:207: vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīśataṃ vā varṣakoṭīsahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā tato vā uttari,
K03psp_5u:208: imaṃ ca vivekan na jānāti yena vivekena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyāśayasaṃprasthito viharati,
K03psp_5u:209: saṃkīrṇaś caiva viharati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃkliṣṭaś caiva tatra viveke niśrita ālīno 'dhyavasito na me sa tāvanmātrakeṇa cittam abhirādhayati,
K03psp_5u:210: yaś ca mayā viveka ākhyātas tasmin viveke na saṃdṛśyate.
K03psp_5u:211: tam enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramyopary antarīkṣe sthitvaivaṃ vadati:
K03psp_5u:212: sādhu sādhu kulaputra eṣa vivekas tathāgatenākhyāto yena viharasy evaṃ tvaṃ kṣipram
K03psp_5u:213: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase. sa tato vivekāt punar anyān vivekān avamanyamānas
K03psp_5u:214: tadanyān bodhisattvayānikān bhikṣūn peśalān kalyāṇadharmano 'vamaṃsyate saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa
K03psp_5u:215: bateme viharanty āyuṣmanta iti. ye ca viviktavihāreṇa viharanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvās
K03psp_5u:217: ye ca saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa viharanti tān viviktavihāreṇa samudācariṣyati tatra ca gauravam utpādayiṣyati,
K03psp_5u:218: yatra ca gauravam utpādayitavyaṃ tatra mānam utpādayiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:223: ayaṃ bodhisattvas tadanyān bodhisattvayānikān kulaputrān paṃsayiṣyaty avamaṃsyate ullāpayiṣyati kutsayiṣyati.
K03psp_5u:230: tajjātikaḥ pudgalo na sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:231: ādhimānikā hi subhūte tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ. ity aṣṭamam
K03psp_5u:232: yasya khalu punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāparityaktā sarvākārajñatā,
K03psp_5u:233: aparityaktā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhis tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyāśayenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena,
K03psp_5u:234: sarvasattvānām arthaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tajjātīyaḥ pudgalo na
K03psp_5u:235: sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ. api tu khalu svakāryayogam anuyuktena
K03psp_5u:237: tatra caiva maitry utpādayitavyā tatra caivānukampākaruṇotpādayitavyā muditotpādayitavyā upekṣotpādayitavyā,
K03psp_5u:238: tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathaite mama doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti notpatsyante,
K03psp_5u:239: saced utpatsyante kṣipram eva prahāsyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā. ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svayamabhijñāya parākramo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_5u:240: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyāśayenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni
K03psp_5u:241: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:242: kāni punar bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni?
K03psp_5u:243: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:244: buddhā bhagavantaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
K03psp_5u:245: bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś ca subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
K03psp_5u:246: śrāvakā api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni.
K03psp_5u:247: ye ca ṣaṭ pāramitā ākhyāsyanti deśayiṣyanti prajñapayiṣyanti prasthāpayiṣyanti vivariṣyanti vibhajiṣyanti uttānīkariṣyanti saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
K03psp_5u:248: ime 'pi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni. ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
K03psp_5u:251: daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
K03psp_5u:253: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni. ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ śāstāro veditavyāḥ
K03psp_5u:254: ṣaṭ pāramitā mārgaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā ālokaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā (PSP_5:11)
K03psp_5u:255: ulkā ṣaṭ pāramitā avabhāsaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā bhūmiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ śaraṇaṃ ṣaṭ pāramitā
K03psp_5u:256: layanaṃ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parāyaṇaṃ ṣaṭ pāramitā mātā ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ pitā. catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni
K03psp_5u:259: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatāyai
K03psp_5u:260: yāvat sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇāya saṃvartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:261: tathā hi subhūte ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
K03psp_5u:262: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ime caiva saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā mātāpitarāv
K03psp_5u:263: abhūtām. ye 'pi te subhūte bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
K03psp_5u:264: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ime caiva saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā mātāpitarau
K03psp_5u:265: bhaviṣyataḥ. ye 'pi te subhūte etarhi daśa diśi loke buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti
K03psp_5u:266: dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti teṣām api subhūte buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ime
K03psp_5u:267: caiva saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā mātāpitarau bhavataḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:268: tathā hi subhūte 'to nirjātā hy atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ tasmāt
K03psp_5u:269: tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmenāparapraṇeyatāṃ
K03psp_5u:270: gantukāmenāparapraṇeyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ saṃśayāṃś chrotukāmena buddhakṣetraṃ
K03psp_5u:271: pariśodhayitukāmena sarvasattvān paripācayitukāmena caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ sattvāḥ
K03psp_5u:273: dānena priyavadyatayārthakriyayā samānārthatayā. idam apy ahaṃ subhūte 'rthavaśaṃ paśyann evaṃ vadāmi:
K03psp_5u:274: ete bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śāstāro mātāpitarau layanaṃ trāṇaṃ dvīpaḥ śaraṇaṃ yad utema eva saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ. iti navamam
K03psp_5u:275: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmenāparapraṇeyatāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:276: sthātukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ saṃśayāṃś chrotukāmena buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitukāmena
K03psp_5u:277: sarvasattvān paripācayitukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:278: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam. iti daśamam
K03psp_5u:279: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:283: asaṅgalakṣaṇā subhūte prajñāpāramitā na subhūte prajñāpāramitā lakṣaṇan na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kiñcil lakṣaṇam.
K03psp_5u:285: syād bhagavan paryāyo yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tenaiva lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyeran.
K03psp_5u:287: evam etad yena lakṣaṇena subhūte prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tenaiva lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:288: sarvadharmā hi subhūte viviktā asvabhāvāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāḥ,
K03psp_5u:289: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tenaiva lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyante yad uta viviktalakṣaṇena śūnyatālakṣaṇena.
K03psp_5u:290: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:291: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaviviktāḥ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyās,
K03psp_5u:292: tat kathaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ saṃkleśaṃ vyavadānaṃ prajñāyate?
K03psp_5u:293: na bhagavan viviktaṃ vā śūnyatā vā saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā,
K03psp_5u:294: na viviktaṃ vā śūnyatā vānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_5u:295: na vivikte vā śūnyatāyāṃ vā kaścid dharma upalabhyate,
K03psp_5u:296: yo bodhim abhisaṃbudhyetāsya caivaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasya katham arthaṃ jānīyām? iti.
K03psp_5u:297: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:299: subhūte, api nu dīrgharātram ime sattvā ahaṃkāramamakāre caranti.
K03psp_5u:301: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugata,
K03psp_5u:305: subhūte, api tv ahaṃkāramamakārau viviktāv api tv ahaṃkāramamakārau śūnyau.
K03psp_5u:310: subhūte, ahaṃkāramamakāreṇa sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃdhāvanti saṃsaranti.
K03psp_5u:312: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugata,
K03psp_5u:313: ahaṃkāramamakāreṇa bhagavan sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃdhāvanti saṃsaranti.
K03psp_5u:315: evaṃ khalu subhūte sattvānāṃ saṃkleśaḥ prajñāyate saṃsāre saṃdhāvatāṃ saṃsaratāṃ,
K03psp_5u:316: yatra subhūte nāhaṃkāro na mamakāras tatra nodgraho 'nena te sattvāḥ saṃsāre na saṃdhāvanti na saṃsaranti.
K03psp_5u:317: evaṃ khalu subhūte sattvānāṃ vyavadānaṃ prajñāyate saṃsāre na saṃdhāvatāṃ na saṃsaratām,
K03psp_5u:318: api tu khalu punar na kaścit tatra saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā,
K03psp_5u:319: evaṃ khalu subhūte saṃkleśo vyavadānañ ca prajñāyate. ity ekādaśam
K03psp_5u:320: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:321: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
K03psp_5u:322: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
K03psp_5u:324: na skandheṣu carati na dhātuṣu carati nāyataneṣu carati na pratītyasamutpāde carati
K03psp_5u:325: na pratītyasamutpādāṅgesu carati na smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati na samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgeṣu
K03psp_5u:326: na mārgeṣu carati nāryasatyeṣu nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu carati na sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu
K03psp_5u:327: carati na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu carati na pañcasv abhijñāsu carati na balavaiśāradyeṣu
K03psp_5u:328: carati na pratisaṃvitsu carati nāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:330: tathā hi te dharmā nopalabhyante yo vā careta yena vā careta yatra vā careta,
K03psp_5u:331: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nabhibhavanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa
K03psp_5u:332: lokena. evañ caran punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair
K03psp_5u:334: tathā hi so 'nabhibhūte sthāne sthito yad uta bodhisattvaniyāme 'nabhibhūto hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāmanasikārair viharann,
K03psp_5u:335: evañ caran punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā abhyāśībhavati. iti dvādaśam ity uktaṃ liṅgam
K03psp_5u:338: subhūte ye jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvās te sarvamānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabheran pratilabhyānuttarāṃ
K03psp_5u:339: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyeraṃs tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvajjīvaṃ
K03psp_5u:341: tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye parināmayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_5u:342: subhūte, api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_5u:346: ataḥ sa subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ (PSP_5:14)
K03psp_5u:348: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pareṣām ākhyāyed deśayet prajñapayet prasthāpayed vivṛṇuyād
K03psp_5u:349: vibhajed vibhāvayeta uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vihared,
K03psp_5u:350: evaṃ yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'pūrvācaramaṃ mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabheraṃs,
K03psp_5u:351: tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec,
K03psp_5u:352: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet
K03psp_5u:354: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K03psp_5u:356: subhūte, api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_5u:360: ataḥ sa subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_5u:361: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pareṣām ākhyāyed deśayet prajñapayet prasthāpayed vivṛṇuyād
K03psp_5u:362: vibhajed vibhāvayeta uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vihared,
K03psp_5u:363: evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:364: tathā hi na kasyacit sattvasya tādṛśo vihāro yathā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sthāpayitvā tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham. tat kasya
K03psp_5u:365: tathā hi te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto mahāmaitrīm abhinirharanti,
K03psp_5u:366: te prajñāpāramitāyāñ carantaḥ sarvasattvān vadhyagatān samanupaśyanti te mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhante,
K03psp_5u:367: te tena vihāreṇa viharanto muditayā pramodante te mahāmuditām abhinirharanti,
K03psp_5u:368: te tena nimittena sārdhaṃ na saṃvasanti te mahopekṣāṃ pratilabhante,
K03psp_5u:369: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahān prajñāloko yad uta prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_5u:370: dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitālokaḥ. anabhisaṃbuddhā
K03psp_5u:371: api te kulaputrā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchanti,
K03psp_5u:372: na ca vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher yeṣāñ ca paribhuñjate (PSP_5:15)
K03psp_5u:374: pratisaṃyuktair manasikārair viharanto dāyakadānapatīnāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayanti sarvākārajñatāyāś
K03psp_5u:375: cābhyāśībhavanti. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāmogharāṣṭrapiṇḍaṃ paribhoktukāmena,
K03psp_5u:379: sarvasattvānām anuttaraṃ prajñācakṣur viśodhayitukāmena prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktair
K03psp_5u:380: manasikārair vihartavyam. saced bodhisattvo mahāsattva etān prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān
K03psp_5u:382: tena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktā caiva kathā kathayitavyā. iti prathamā vivṛddhiḥ
K03psp_5u:383: tena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ kathayitvā prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāś caiva manasikārā manasikartavyās,
K03psp_5u:384: tena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair mānasikārair viharatānyeṣāṃ manasikārāṇām avakāśo na dātavyas,
K03psp_5u:385: tathā ca kartavyaṃ yathā taiḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair anikṣiptadhuro rātriṃdivaṃ viharet,
K03psp_5u:386: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣeṇa maṇiratnam apratilabdhapūrvaṃ syāt so 'pareṇa samayena pratilabhet,
K03psp_5u:387: sa tat maṇiratnaṃ pratilabhyodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato bhavet,
K03psp_5u:388: tasya saha pratilabdhantaṃ maṇiratnaṃ punar eva naśyet sa tatonidānaṃ mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena saṃyukto bhavet,
K03psp_5u:389: tasya satatasamitaṃ maṇiratnaṃ pratisaṃyuktā eva manasikārāḥ pravarteran,
K03psp_5u:390: aho batāhaṃ tena maṇiratnena viyukta iti. evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ratnam idam iti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair avirahitena bhavitavyam.
K03psp_5u:391: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:392: yadā punar bhagavan sarvamanasikārāḥ svabhāvena virahitāḥ,
K03psp_5u:394: tadā kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair avirahito bhavati?
K03psp_5u:395: na hy avirahito 'pi bodhisattvo mahāsattva upalabhyate manasikārā vā sarvākārajñatā vā.
K03psp_5u:396: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:397: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jānāti,
K03psp_5u:398: virahitāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena te na śrāvakair na pratyekabuddhair na buddhair bhagavadbhiḥ kṛtāḥ,
K03psp_5u:399: sthitāś caivaiteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā dharmatā dharmadhātus (PSP_5:16)
K03psp_5u:401: avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:402: tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā svabhāvena viviktā svabhāvena śūnyā,
K03psp_5u:403: sā nāpi vivardhate nāpi parihīyate. iti dvitīyā
K03psp_5u:405: saced bhagavan prajñāpāramitā svabhāvena viviktā svabhāvena sūnyā,
K03psp_5u:406: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
K03psp_5u:408: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate vā parihīyate vā,
K03psp_5u:409: na bhūtakoṭī vivardhate vā parihīyate vā,
K03psp_5u:410: na dharmadhātur vivardhate vā parihīyate vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:411: na hi prajñāpāramitā ekā vā dve vā. sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
K03psp_5u:415: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:416: kiṃ punar bhagavan yā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śūnyatā riktatā tucchatā vaśikatā asārakatā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K03psp_5u:419: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyatra prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K03psp_5u:422: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K03psp_5u:425: kiṃ punar bhagavan śūnyatā prajñapāramitāyāṃ carati?
K03psp_5u:428: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyatra śūnyatāyāḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K03psp_5u:431: kiṃ punar bhagavan rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_5u:436: kiṃ punar bhagavan skandhadhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti?
K03psp_5u:439: kiṃ punar bhagavan ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti?
K03psp_5u:440: evaṃ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
K03psp_5u:442: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭadaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti?
K03psp_5u:445: kiṃ punar bhagavan yā rūpasya śūnyatā riktatā tucchatā vaśikatā asārakatā,
K03psp_5u:446: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭī sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti?
K03psp_5u:450: kiṃ punar bhagavan yā vijñānasya śūnyatā riktatā tucchatā vaśikatā asārakatā,
K03psp_5u:451: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K03psp_5u:454: kiṃ punar bhagavan yā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāñ
K03psp_5u:455: ca śūnyatā riktatā tucchatā vaśikatā asārakatā tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā
K03psp_5u:456: dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭī sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K03psp_5u:459: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyā ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ śūnyatā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām
K03psp_5u:461: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ pañcānām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ
K03psp_5u:463: buddhadharmāṇāṃ ca śūnyatā riktatā tucchatā vaśikatā asārakatā,
K03psp_5u:464: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K03psp_5u:467: sacet punar bhagavann ete dharmā na caranti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_5u:468: kathaṃ carantaḥ punar bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś caranti prajñāpāramitāyām?
K03psp_5u:471: subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yo dharmaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati.
K03psp_5u:476: subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yatra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś caranti.
K03psp_5u:481: subhūte yat tvaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyasi kaścit sa dharma upalabhyate.
K03psp_5u:487: api nu sa utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā.
K03psp_5u:491: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir,
K03psp_5u:492: evaṃrūpayā subhūte kṣāntyā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_5u:493: iyaṃ subhūte tathāgatasya vaiśāradyapratisaṃvit yāṃ pratisaṃvidyamāno bodhisattvo
K03psp_5u:494: mahāsattva evaṃ caran ghaṭamāno vyāyacchamāno 'nuttaraṃ samyaksaṃbodhijñānaṃ mahājñānaṃ
K03psp_5u:495: sarvākārajñatājñānaṃ nānuprāpnuyād iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:496: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā tathā hi tan nimno bhaviṣyati yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. iti tṛtīyā
K03psp_5u:497: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:498: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām anutpattaye vyākariṣyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K03psp_5u:502: kiṃ punar bhagavann utpattaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākariṣyate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K03psp_5u:505: saced bhagavan nānutpattaye naivotpattaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākariṣyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_5u:506: tat kathaṃ bhagavan vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K03psp_5u:507: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:509: subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yo vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K03psp_5u:511: na bhagavan. nāhaṃ bhagavaṃs taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_5u:512: tam apy ahaṃ dharman na samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo 'bhisaṃbudhyeta yena vābhisaṃbudhyate.
K03psp_5u:515: sarvadharmān anupalabhamānasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:516: aham abhisaṃbhotsya idam abhisaṃbhotsye. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:517: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvā ete vikalpā na bhavanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:518: avikalpā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā. iti caturthī
K03psp_5u:519: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:520: gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā durdṛśā duranubodhātarkāvacanā yāvat sūkṣṃā nipuṇā bhagavan prajñāpāramitātyantaviviktatvād,
K03psp_5u:521: na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_5u:522: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti tathatvāya ca pratipatsyante,
K03psp_5u:523: na cānyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dāsyanti yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
K03psp_5u:526: na te kauśika sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_5u:527: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti tahatvāya ca pratipatsyante,
K03psp_5u:528: na cānyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dāsyanti yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_5u:529: kauśika yāvanto jāṃbudvīpakāḥ sattvās te sarve daśabhiḥ (PSP_5:20)
K03psp_5u:530: kuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ samanvāgatā bhaveyuś caturbhir dhyānaiś caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhir,
K03psp_5u:531: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet paryavāpnuyāt tathatvāya pratipadyeta,
K03psp_5u:532: asya kauśika kuśalamūlasya eṣa pūrvakaḥ kuśalamūlābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ
K03psp_5u:533: nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm
K03psp_5u:534: api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyataśatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api
K03psp_5u:535: gaṇanām apy upamām apy aupamyam apy upaniṣām apy upaniṣadam api nopaiti.
K03psp_5u:536: atha khalv anyataro bhikṣuḥ śakraṃ devānām indraṃ etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:537: abhibhūtas tvaṃ kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā te ca jāṃbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ
K03psp_5u:540: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām anikṣiptacittenodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
K03psp_5u:541: tathatvāya ca pratipatsyate anyeṣāñ ca cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ na dāsyati
K03psp_5u:543: evam ukte śakro devānām indras taṃ bhikṣum etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:544: ekacittotpādenaivāhaṃ bhikṣo tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena te ca jāmbūdvīpakāḥ
K03psp_5u:547: kaḥ punar vādo ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti tathatvāya pratipatsyante,
K03psp_5u:548: te sadevamānuṣāsuralokam abhibhūya niryāsyanti sadevamānuṣāsuralokam abhibhavanto
K03psp_5u:549: gacchanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ. na kevalaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuralokam abhibhavanto
K03psp_5u:551: ye 'pi te srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhās tān api sarvān
K03psp_5u:552: abhibhavanto gacchanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ. na kevalaṃ srotaāpannān sakṛdāgāmino
K03psp_5u:554: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānapāramitāyāñ caranti upāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitās tān apy abhibhavanto gacchanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ. (PSP_5:21)
K03psp_5u:556: ye 'pi te śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāñ caranti
K03psp_5u:557: upāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitās tān apy abhibhavanto gacchanti bodhisattvā
K03psp_5u:558: mahāsattvāḥ. na kevalaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranti,
K03psp_5u:559: ye 'pi te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranty upāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitās
K03psp_5u:560: tān apy abhibhavanto gacchanti bodhiasattvā mahāsattvāḥ. ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
K03psp_5u:561: yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti te sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena na śakyā abhibhavituṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_5u:562: yaś carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānuśiṣṭaṃ prajñāpāramitām anuvartate,
K03psp_5u:565: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ pratipadyamāno na virāgayati bodhimaṇḍam,
K03psp_5u:566: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān saṃsīdayamānān uddhartukāmo,
K03psp_5u:567: 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate na śrāvakaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate na pratyekabuddhaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate. iti paṅcamī
K03psp_5u:568: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ catvāro mahārājās tam upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
K03psp_5u:570: śīghraṃ śikṣasva imāni tāni catvāri pātrāṇi yāni tvayā pratigrahītavyāni bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇenānuttarāṃ
K03psp_5u:571: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhena yāni parigṛhītāni pūrvakais tathāgateair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ.
K03psp_5u:572: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tam upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
K03psp_5u:573: sārdhaṃ devais trayastriṃśaiḥ suyāmaś ca devaputra upasaṃkramyamitavyaṃ maṃsyate,
K03psp_5u:574: sārdhaṃ suyāmair devaputraiḥ saṃtuṣito 'pi devaputra upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate,
K03psp_5u:575: sārdhaṃ saṃtuṣitair devaputrair nirmāṇaratiś ca devaputra upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate,
K03psp_5u:576: sārdhaṃ nirmāṇaratibhir devaputraiḥ paranirmitavaśavarty api devaputra upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate sārdhaṃ paranirmitavaśavartibhir devaputrair upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate,
K03psp_5u:579: mahābrahmaiḥ ābhāsvaro 'pi devaputra upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate sārdhaṃ ābhāsvarair devaputrair upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate,
K03psp_5u:583: asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā aspṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante.
K03psp_5u:584: yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati,
K03psp_5u:585: tathāgatair api so 'rhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nityaṃ samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_5u:587: evaṃ yaś carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yāni tāni
K03psp_5u:588: laukikāni duḥkhāni paropakramikāni kāye utpatsyante tāni tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā
K03psp_5u:589: sarvaṃ kāye notpatsyante na nipatiṣyanti. ayaṃ subhūte dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇo bhaviṣyati
K03psp_5u:590: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yāni vā tāni
K03psp_5u:592: tadyathāpi nāma cakṣurogaḥ śrotrarogo ghrāṇarogo jihvārogo dantarogaḥ kāyaśūlaṃ cittasūlam,
K03psp_5u:593: evam aśītirogaśatāni caturadhikāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ kāye notpatsyante
K03psp_5u:594: na nipatiṣyanti. ayaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya
K03psp_5u:595: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ. iti ṣaṣṭhī
K03psp_5u:597: kim ayaṃ śakro devānām indraḥ svakena pratibhānena prajñāpāramitām upadiśati utāho buddhānubhāveneti?
K03psp_5u:598: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:599: buddhānubhāva eṣa bhadantānanda veditavyo yad ahaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadiśāmi.
K03psp_5u:600: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ ānandam āmantrayate sma:
K03psp_5u:602: tathāgatasyaiṣo 'nubhāvas tathāgatasyaitad adhiṣṭhānaṃ yac chakro devānām indraḥ
K03psp_5u:603: prajñāpāramitām upadiśati. yasminn ānanda samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:604: śikṣate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
K03psp_5u:605: tasmin samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsas te sarve saṃśayaprāptā bhavanti:
K03psp_5u:607: bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkṛtvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sākṣātkariṣyati sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā sākṣātkariṣyati pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ prāpsyati,
K03psp_5u:609: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahito bhavati tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyāñ chokaśalyaviddho bhavati.
K03psp_5u:610: punar aparam ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān ulkāpātān utprekṣyati bhayaṃ janayiṣyaty,
K03psp_5u:611: apy eva nāmāsya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvalīnatā vā bhaved romaharṣo vā bhaved
K03psp_5u:612: avalīnacittatā vā bhaved ekacittotpādasyāpi vikṣobhanaṃ bhaviṣyati sarvākārajñatāṃ manasikurvataḥ.
K03psp_5u:613: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:614: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ?
K03psp_5u:616: na khalv ānanda sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
K03psp_5u:617: keṣāṃcid ānanda bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ keṣāṃcin nopasaṃkramiṣyati.
K03psp_5u:618: ānanda āha: kiyadrūpāṇāṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ kiyadrūpāṇāṃ nopasaṃkramiṣyati?
K03psp_5u:620: yair ānanda bodhisattvaiḥ pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyamāṇā pratikṣiptā cittena nādhimuktā teṣāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati
K03psp_5u:621: punar aparam ānanda ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā bodhisattvaḥ saṃśayaprāpto 'bhūt,
K03psp_5u:622: syād veyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na vā syād ity asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ.
K03psp_5u:623: punar aparam ānanda yo bodhisattvaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahito bhavati so 'saṃpaśyamānaḥ
K03psp_5u:624: kalyāṇamitrānīmāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāraraitāṃ na śṛṇoty aśṛṇvan na jānāty ajānānas
K03psp_5u:626: kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyety asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ.
K03psp_5u:627: punar aparam ānanda prajñāpāramitāvirahito yo bodhisattvo 'saddharmaparigrahaṃ karoty asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati avatāraṃ ca lapsyate.
K03psp_5u:628: punar aparaṃ ānanda prajñāpāramitāvirahito yo bodhisattvo 'saddharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate tatra mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_5u:629: sahāya eṣo mama yo 'saddharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
K03psp_5u:630: bahūnām apy eṣa bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ sahāyo labdho yo 'saddharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
K03psp_5u:632: ayaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'py ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ bhūmibhyām anyatarasyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyati yad uta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā.
K03psp_5u:633: punar aparam ānanda evaṃrūpasya bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ lapsyate yo bodhisattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñapāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām evaṃ vakṣyati:
K03psp_5u:635: kiṃ te etayā gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitayā śrutayā bhāṣitayā vācitayā paryavāptayā dhāritayā?
K03psp_5u:636: aham api tāvad asyām āgādhaṃ na labhe kutaḥ punas tvaṃ lapsyase,
K03psp_5u:637: asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ lapsyate.
K03psp_5u:638: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo 'nyataraṃ bodhisattvam avamaṃsyate:
K03psp_5u:639: ahaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carāmi na tvaṃ dānapāramitāyāñ carasi,
K03psp_5u:640: ahaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carāmi na tvaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carasi,
K03psp_5u:641: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmi na tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carasi,
K03psp_5u:642: asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ lapsyate.
K03psp_5u:643: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo ātmānam utkṛṣṭaṃ manyate tasminn ānanda
K03psp_5u:644: samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tuṣṭo bhavaty udagro bhavaty āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati,
K03psp_5u:645: asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ lapsyate.
K03psp_5u:646: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo nāmagrahaṇato vā gotragrahaṇato vā
K03psp_5u:647: parikīrtito bhavati sa tena nāmagrahaṇena vā gotragrahaṇena vā tadanyān bodhisattvān
K03psp_5u:650: te cāsya guṇā na saṃvidyante ye 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni. (PSP_5:25)
K03psp_5u:651: sa tair akārair liṅgair nimittair asaṃvidyamānaiḥ kleśam utpādayati,
K03psp_5u:653: na tvam atra bodhisattvayāne saṃdṛśyase yathāham atra bodhisattvayāne bodhisattvagotre
K03psp_5u:654: saṃdṛśye. sa tenādhimānena bodhisattvayānikān pudgalān kutsayiṣyati paṃśayiṣyati.
K03psp_5u:656: aśūnyaṃ me bhavanaṃ bhaviṣyaty utsadā bhaviṣyanti mahānarakās,
K03psp_5u:657: tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ pretaviṣayaḥ. tathātathā ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tān bodhisattvān adhiṣṭhāsyati yathādeyavacanā bhaviṣyanti teṣāṃ tayādeyavacanatayā bahujanaḥ śrotavyaṃ maṃsyante,
K03psp_5u:659: te śrutvā dṛṣṭvānukṛtim āpadyamānās tathatāyai na śikṣiṣyante,
K03psp_5u:660: te tathatāyai na śikṣamāṇās te tathatāyai na pratipadyamānāḥ kleśaṃ vivardhayiṣyanti,
K03psp_5u:661: te viparyastayā cittasaṃtatyā yadyad eva karmārapsyante kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,
K03psp_5u:662: sarvaṃ tad aniṣṭatvāyākāntatvāyāmanaāpatvāya saṃvartiṣyati. evaṃ te mahānarakā utsadā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_5u:664: mārabhavanāny utsadāni bhaviṣyanti. imaṃ ānandārthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamāno māraḥ pāpīyān āttamanā bhavati pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ.
K03psp_5u:665: punar aparaṃ ānanda saced bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ śrāvakayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ vivadati,
K03psp_5u:667: dūrīkariṣyati batāyaṃ kulaputraḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ nāyam abhyāsī bhaviṣyati sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:668: naite kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādā mārgaḥ sarvākārajñtāyā narakamārga eṣa tiryagyonimārga eṣa yamalokamārga eṣa naiṣa mārgaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ.
K03psp_5u:669: punar aparaṃ ānanda saced bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'pareṇa bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādān karoti,
K03psp_5u:672: sarvākārajñatāyā ubhāv apy etau nābhisaṃbhotsyete 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:673: tathā hi naiṣa mārgaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā ya etaiḥ kulaputrair ārabdho,
K03psp_5u:674: narakamārga eṣa tiryagyonimārga eṣa yamalokamārga eṣa ya etaiḥ kulaputrair ārabdhaḥ.
K03psp_5u:675: punar aparaṃ ānandāvyākṛto bodhisattvo vyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntike cittam āghātayiṣyati,
K03psp_5u:677: vā vigrahaṃ vā vivādaṃ vā kariṣyati,
K03psp_5u:678: tena punas tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ yāvanti tasya tāni cittāny utpannāni kalahaṃ vā bhaṇḍanaṃ vā vigrahaṃ vā vivādaṃ vā kurvataḥ,
K03psp_5u:680: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:681: asti bhagavann eteṣāṃ cittotpādānāṃ niḥsaraṇam utāho tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ.
K03psp_5u:682: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:683: aniḥsaraṇo mayānanda dharmo deśitaḥ śrāvakayānikānāñ ca pudgalānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāñ ca pudgalānāṃ,
K03psp_5u:684: tatrānanda yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ
K03psp_5u:685: kalahaṃ vā bhaṇḍanaṃ vā vigrahaṃ vā kuryād yāvad vivaded vā ākrośed vā paribhāṣed
K03psp_5u:686: vā kalahayitvā vā bhaṇḍayitvā vā vigrahayitvā vā vivādayitvā vā ākrośayitvā vā paribhāṣayitvā
K03psp_5u:687: vā na pratideśayaty anuśayaṃ vahati anuśayabaddho viharati,
K03psp_5u:688: nāham ānanda tasya pudgalasya niḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmi,
K03psp_5u:689: avaśyaṃ tena tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ,
K03psp_5u:691: punar aparam ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kalahayitvā bhaṇḍitvā vigrahayitvā vivaditvā ākroṣitvā paribhāṣitvā pratideśayati:
K03psp_5u:692: mānuśayaṃ vahaty āyatyāṃ saṃvaram āpadyate durlabdhā me lābhā,
K03psp_5u:693: yan mayā sarvasattvānāṃ bhāra āhartavyas tad ahaṃ mantrite pratimantrayāmi,
K03psp_5u:694: yan mayā sarvasattvānāṃ saṃkramabhūtena bhavitavyaṃ so 'haṃ parasyāpriyaṃ mantrayāmi prativacanaṃ ca dadāmi. evam api mayā na vaktavyaṃ jaḍaiḍakamūkasadṛśena mayā bhavitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:695: adhyāśayaś ca me na vikopayitavyo yan mayaite sattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā anuttarāṃ
K03psp_5u:696: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya tad aham atra vyāpadye tad aham atra kṣubhyāmi na mayātra
K03psp_5u:697: vyāpattavyaṃ na mayā kṣobhacittam utpādayitavyam. asyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_5u:699: punar aparam ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śrāvakayānikaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sārdhaṃ na sthātavyaṃ sacet tiṣṭhati tena na kasyacid antike vyāpattavyaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:700: tathā hi naitan mama pratirūpaṃ syāt, (PSP_5:27)
K03psp_5u:701: yad aham eteṣām antike vyāpadye vā kṣubhyeyaṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:702: tathā hi te mayānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimocayitavyāḥ. iti saptamī
K03psp_5u:703: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:704: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām antike sthātavyam?
K03psp_5u:707: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām antike sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:709: yathā caivaitena śikṣitavyaṃ tathā caiva mayā śikṣitavyaṃ yatra caitena śikṣitavyaṃ
K03psp_5u:710: tatra caiva mayā śikṣitavyaṃ yad uta dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:713: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu
K03psp_5u:714: catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yāvat sarvākārajñatāyām
K03psp_5u:715: apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na mayātra śikṣitavyam. sacet punar
K03psp_5u:716: eṣa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair
K03psp_5u:717: mayāpy evam eva śikṣitavyam. evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samaśikṣo bhavati.
K03psp_5u:718: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:719: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā yatra samatāyāṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam?
K03psp_5u:727: vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanāni skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ śūnyāni,
K03psp_5u:742: bodhir yāvad bodhyā śūnyā. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā,
K03psp_5u:743: yatra samatāyāṃ sthitvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante. ity aṣṭamī
K03psp_5u:745: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpasya kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai,
K03psp_5u:746: rūpasya virāgāya nirodhāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai,
K03psp_5u:750: vijñānasya virāgāya nirodhāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai,
K03psp_5u:751: vijñānasyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya
K03psp_5u:752: pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ ca kṣayāya virāgāya nirodhāyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai.
K03psp_5u:753: sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānām
K03psp_5u:756: kṣayāya virāgāya nirodhāyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai. kiṃ punar
K03psp_5u:757: bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ kṣayāya śikṣate virāgāya
K03psp_5u:758: śikṣate nirodhāya śikṣate 'nutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai.
K03psp_5u:759: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:761: yad rūpasya kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai,
K03psp_5u:762: yad rūpasya virāgāya nirodhāyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai,
K03psp_5u:765: vijñānasya virāgāya nirodhāyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ ca kṣayāya virāgāya (PSP_5:29)
K03psp_5u:766: nirodhāyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai. sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ
K03psp_5u:769: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām
K03psp_5u:770: āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ kṣayāya virāgāya nirodhāyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai.
K03psp_5u:771: anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ kṣayāya virāgāya nirodhāyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai
K03psp_5u:773: subhūte yā rūpasya tathatā yā vedanāyās tathatā yā saṃjñāyās tathatā yā saṃskārāṇāṃ tathatā yā vijñānasya tathatā,
K03psp_5u:774: evaṃ yā skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ tathatā yā pratītyasamutpādasya tathatā yā pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ
K03psp_5u:775: tathatā yā pāramitānāṃ tathatā yā sarvaśūnyatānāṃ tathatā yā sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhānāṃ
K03psp_5u:776: tathatā yā saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā yāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ
K03psp_5u:777: tathatā yāryasatyānāṃ tathatā yā trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ tathatā yā pañcānām abhijñānāṃ
K03psp_5u:779: tathatā yā srotaāpannasya tathatā yā sakṛdāgāminas tathatā yānāgāminas tathatā yārhatas
K03psp_5u:780: tathatā yā pratyekabuddhasya tathatā yā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathatā,
K03psp_5u:783: api nu sā tathatā kṣīyate vā virahyate vā nirudhyate vā prahīyate vā.
K03psp_5u:787: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathatāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:788: na ca tathatā kṣīyate vā virahyate vā nirudhyate vā prahīyate vā. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
K03psp_5u:789: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathatāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyām. evaṃ
K03psp_5u:790: śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathatāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣate ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu,
K03psp_5u:801: śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyām. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāparamapāramitām
K03psp_5u:802: anuprāpsyati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śakyate māreṇa vā
K03psp_5u:803: mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir abhimarditum. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_5u:804: kṣipram avinivartanīyatām anuprāpsyati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_5u:805: svake paitṛke tathāgatagocare carati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K03psp_5u:806: nāthakaraṇīyair dharmaiś carati buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaiḥ. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte
K03psp_5u:807: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāmaitryāṃ śikṣate mahākaruṇāyāṃ śikṣate buddhakṣetrapariśodhanāya
K03psp_5u:808: śikṣate sattvaparipākāya śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas
K03psp_5u:810: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
K03psp_5u:811: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgatavaṃśasyānupacchedāya śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
K03psp_5u:814: na hi subhūte śakyaṃ hīnasattvair iha śikṣāyāṃ śikṣituṃ sarvasattvān saṃsārād uddhartukāmaḥ
K03psp_5u:815: sa sattvo yo 'syāṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K03psp_5u:841: na duḥśīlaparigrāhako bhavati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu devesūveṣūpapadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā (PSP_5:31
K03psp_5u:842: hy asti tasyopāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate,
K03psp_5u:845: na ca dhyānānāṃ na cāpramāṇānāṃ na cārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ vaśenopapadyate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pariśuddhim
K03psp_5u:847: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:849: tat katamasya dharmasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhim adhigacchati?
K03psp_5u:853: evaṃ pariśuddheṣu subhūte sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya yā tatrāsaṃsīdanatā anavalīnatā,
K03psp_5u:854: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā. tatsarvabālapṛthagjanā etān dharmān na jānanti na paśyanti,
K03psp_5u:855: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carati śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:856: carati kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati
K03psp_5u:865: aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carati sarvākārajñatāyāṃ carati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
K03psp_5u:866: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu balavaiśāradyam anuprāpnoti. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
K03psp_5u:867: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvacittacaritānāṃ pāraṃ gacchati. iti navamī
K03psp_5u:868: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte 'lpakās te mahāpṛthivīpradeśā yatra jāṃbūnadaṃ suvarṇaṃ jātarūpam utpadyate,
K03psp_5u:869: evam eva subhūte 'lpakās te sattvā ya iha śikṣāyāṃ śikṣaṇte,
K03psp_5u:870: yad uta prajñāpāramitāśikṣāyām ito bahutarakās te sattvā ye śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau saṃprasthitāḥ. iti daśamī
K03psp_5u:871: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte 'lpakās te sattvā ye cakravartirājyasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma samādāya vartante,
K03psp_5u:873: ye koṭṭarājyaṃ saṃvartanīyaṃ karma samadāya vartante. evam eva subhūte 'lpatarakās te sattvā ya imaṃ sarvākārajñatāmārgaṃ samāruhanti,
K03psp_5u:874: ataḥ prabhūtatarakās te sattvā ye śrāvakapratyekabuddhamārgaṃ samāruhanti. ye 'pi
K03psp_5u:875: te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās tato
K03psp_5u:876: 'lpakās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye tathatāyai pratipadyante,
K03psp_5u:877: ataḥ prabhūtatarakās te sattvā ye śrāvakapratyekabuddhatvāya sthāsyanti. ye 'pi te
K03psp_5u:878: subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahitā ye 'vinivartanīyabhūmim avakramiṣyanti,
K03psp_5u:879: ataḥ prabhūtatarakās te ye sattvāvinivartanīyabhūmin nāvakramiṣyanti,
K03psp_5u:880: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāvinivartanīyabhūmim anuprāptukāmenāvinivartanīyabhūmau
K03psp_5u:881: gaṇanāṃ gantukāmenehaiva gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. ity ekādaśī
K03psp_5u:882: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na mātsaryasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate,
K03psp_5u:891: na khilasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. iti dvādaśī
K03psp_5u:894: na vijñānasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapratītyasamutpādāṅgasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate,
K03psp_5u:897: na samyaksaṃbodhisaghagataṃ cittam utpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:898: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran na kañcid dharmam upalabhate,
K03psp_5u:899: anupalambhamāno na kañcid dharmacittam utpādayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavanti,
K03psp_5u:903: tathā hi subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti. iti trayodaśī
K03psp_5u:904: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte satkāyadṛṣṭyāṃ dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭigatāny antargatāni bhavanti,
K03psp_5u:905: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ
K03psp_5u:906: sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya kālagatasya
K03psp_5u:907: jīvitendriye niruddhe sarvāṇīndriyāṇi niruddhāni bhavanti. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya
K03psp_5u:908: mahāsatvasyeha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti,
K03psp_5u:909: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvapāramitānāṃ pāraṃ gantukāmena iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. iti caturdaśī
K03psp_5u:910: iha punaḥ subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānām agratāyai śikṣate. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_5u:911: subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvā api nu te bahavaḥ.
K03psp_5u:913: bahavo bhagavan jāṃbūdvīpakā eva tāvat sattvāḥ kaḥ punar vādo ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ.
K03psp_5u:915: yāvantaḥ subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'pūrvācaramamānuṣyakam
K03psp_5u:916: ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeraṃs tāṃ sarvān ekaiko
K03psp_5u:917: bodhisattvo yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhaṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāṃś cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair
K03psp_5u:919: subhūte 'pi nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_5u:923: ataḥ sa subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
K03psp_5u:924: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:925: evaṃ maharddhikā hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā anuttarāyāḥ
K03psp_5u:926: samyaksaṃbodher āhārikā. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānām
K03psp_5u:927: anuttarena bhavitukāmena sarvasattvānām anāthānāṃ nāthena bhavitukāmenāśaraṇānāṃ
K03psp_5u:929: bhavitukāmenālayanānāṃ layanena bhavitukamenādvīpanāṃ dvipena bhavitukāmena buddhatvam anuprāputukāmena buddhaviṣayam anuprāptukāmena budddhavikrīḍitaṃ
K03psp_5u:930: buddhasiṃhanādaṃ naditukāmena buddhaśaṃkhaṃ prapūrayitukāmena buddhasāṃkathyaṃ kartukāmena ihaiva gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:931: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na sā kācit saṃpattir yāṃ na pratilabhate yā tena na pratilabdhā syāt.
K03psp_5u:933: śrāvakasaṃpad api tena pratilabdhavyā pratyekabuddhasaṃpad api tena pratilabdhavyā.
K03psp_5u:937: tatra ca na sthātavyaṃ na pratiṣṭhātavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:938: jñānena ca darśanena ca dṛṣṭvātikramiṣyati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramiṣyati. evaṃ
K03psp_5u:939: śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā abhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāṃ
K03psp_5u:940: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_5u:941: sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_5u:942: mahāsattvaḥ ye tadanye dakṣiṇīyāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhās tān sarvān abhibhavitvā gacchati,
K03psp_5u:943: sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na riñcati prajñāpāramitāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāyām avirahitaḥ
K03psp_5u:944: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām aparihāṇadharmā veditavyāḥ,
K03psp_5u:945: sarvākārajñatāyā dūrīkaroti śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vābhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. iti pañcadaśī
K03psp_5u:950: saced evaṃ jānāti na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saced evaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na jānāti,
K03psp_5u:954: tad api na jānāti na paśyati yasya vā prajñāpāramitā yena vā prajñāpāramitā yo vā
K03psp_5u:955: prajñāpāramitayā niryāty evam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:957: nānayā prajñāpāramitayā kaścid dharmo niryāsyati sthitatvād dharmadhātos tathatāyā bhūtakoṭer,
K03psp_5u:958: evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyām abhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. iti ṣoḍaśī vivṛddhir ity uktā vivṛddhiḥ
K03psp_5u:959: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat:
K03psp_5u:960: carann apīha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāra,
K03psp_5u:965: kaḥ punar vādo yadānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati. sulabdhās tair lābhāḥ sujīvitaṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yeṣāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ cittaṃ kramati,
K03psp_5u:966: kaḥ punar vādo yair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditaṃ,
K03psp_5u:967: spṛhaṇīyās te sattvā ye 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheś cittam utpādayiṣyanti,
K03psp_5u:968: spṛhaṇīyās te sattvā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayanti.
K03psp_5u:969: atha khalu śakro devānām indro māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmad
K03psp_5u:970: upasaṃkramya tair māndāravaiḥ puṣpais tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham avakirati
K03psp_5u:973: ye bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim adhyālambante teṣām anena kuśalamūlenānuttarāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavatu,
K03psp_5u:976: eṣām anāsravadharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavatu. iti trisarvajñatvadharmānuttarā paripūrinirūḍhiḥ
K03psp_5u:977: na me bhagavann ekaś cittotpādo 'py utpadyate yad bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthito vivartetānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher,
K03psp_5u:978: na hi me bhagavann ekaś cittotpādo 'py utpadyate yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivartya śrāvako vā pratyekabuddho vā bhaved,
K03psp_5u:979: atha tarhi chandaṃ janayed anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhūyasyā mātrayā (PSP_5:36)
K03psp_5u:981: imāni saṃsarāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni dṛṣṭvārthakāmaḥ sukhakāmaḥ hitakāmaḥ sa sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya ya etaiś cittotpādaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cintayati,
K03psp_5u:982: kim iti vayaṃ tīrṇā atīrṇān sattvāṃs tārayema,
K03psp_5u:983: kim iti vayaṃ muktā amuktān sattvān mocayema,
K03psp_5u:984: kim iti vayam āśvastā anāśvastān sattvān āśvāsayema,
K03psp_5u:985: kim iti vayaṃ parinirvṛtā aparinirvṛtān sattvān parinirvāpayemeti. kiyat sa bhagavan
K03psp_5u:986: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasavati yaḥ prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_5u:988: caryāpratipannānāñ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta?
K03psp_5u:989: avinivartanīyānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta?
K03psp_5u:990: ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta?
K03psp_5u:991: ity aparityaktasattvārthā nirūḍhir ity uktā nirūḍhiḥ
K03psp_5u:992: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:993: syāt kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃś cittotpādānāṃ puṇyasya pramāṇaṃ,
K03psp_5u:994: tiṣṭhatu kauśika cāturdvīpako lokadhātur evaṃ sāhasro lokadhātur evaṃ dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātuḥ,
K03psp_5u:995: syāt khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ puṇyasya pramāṇaṃ,
K03psp_5u:996: syāt khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahāsamudreṣu śatadhā bhinnayā
K03psp_5u:997: vālāgrakoṭyā udakabindūnām utkṣipyamānānāṃ pramāṇaṃ na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ
K03psp_5u:999: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1001: ya imāṃś cittotpādān nānumodiṣyante. mārapakṣikās te bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_5u:1002: mārabhavanāt te bhagavan sattvāś cyutā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_5u:1003: ya imāṃś cittotpādān nānumodiṣyante. mārabhavanāt te bhagavan sattvā ihāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_5u:1004: ya imāṃś cittotpādān nānumodiṣyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1007: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayanti. anumoditavyās te bhagavaṃś cittotpādā,
K03psp_5u:1008: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayanti. yair aparityakto buddho 'parityakto dharmo 'parityaktaḥ saṃghas,
K03psp_5u:1010: anumodyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayitavyā yathā na dvayaḥ saṃjñī nādvayaḥ saṃjñī.
K03psp_5u:1014: ya imān kauśika cittotpādān anumodiṣyante te kṣipraṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham
K03psp_5u:1015: ārāgayiṣyanti ārāgayitvā na virāgayiṣyanti. evaṃ te ebhir anumodanāsahagataiś cittotpādakuśalamūlaiḥ
K03psp_5u:1016: samanvāgatā yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra satkṛtā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_5u:1017: gurukṛtā mānitāḥ pūjitā arcitā apacāyitā bhaviṣyanti. tatra te na jātv amanaāpāni rūpāṇi drakṣyanti,
K03psp_5u:1022: nāmanaāpān dharmān vijñāsyanti. na ca te jātu buddhair bhagavadbhir virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_5u:1026: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś cāsaṃkhyeyānām aprameyāṇām aparimāṇānāṃ
K03psp_5u:1027: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ navayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kuśalamūlāny anumoditāny anumodyānuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:1030: dvitīyabhūmisthitānāṃ yāvad daśabhūmisthitānāṃ yāvad ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny anumoditāni,
K03psp_5u:1031: taiś ca kuśalamūlair vibaddhamānair anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher abhyāsī bhavanti.
K03psp_5u:1032: te 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyāprameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇasattvān parinirvāpayiṣyanti.
K03psp_5u:1033: tad anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prathamacittotpādikānāṃ
K03psp_5u:1034: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny anumodyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni,
K03psp_5u:1035: tathā ca pariṇāmayitavyāni yathā tac cittam anyatra cittena caren nānyatra cittena. ity uktā cittasaṃsthitiḥ
K03psp_5u:1036: avinivartanīyānām ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny anumodyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni,
K03psp_5u:1037: tathā ca pariṇāmayitavyāni yathā na dvayasaṃjñā nādvayasaṃjñā. iti sakalapravṛttipakṣādhiṣṭhānaḥ prathamo grāhyavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1038: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1053: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte rūpam avikalpaṃ,
K03psp_5u:1056: cakṣuś cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā avikalpā. evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyā,
K03psp_5u:1057: mano manovijñānaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā avikalpā. kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte rūpam avikalpaṃ,
K03psp_5u:1059: dharmā apy avikalpāḥ. kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte dhyānāni vā apramāṇāni vā ārūpyasamāpattayo
K03psp_5u:1062: vā sarvaśūnyatā vā sarvasamādhayo vā daśatathāgatabalāni vā catvāri vaiśāradyāni
K03psp_5u:1063: vā catasraḥ pratisaṃvido vā mahāmaitrī vā mahākaruṇā vāvikalpā yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā
K03psp_5u:1065: buddho 'py avikalpaḥ bodhir apy avikalpā saṃskṛto dhātur apy avikalpo 'saṃskṛto dhātur apy avikalpaḥ.
K03psp_5u:1072: kuto vā prabhāvanā srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām?
K03psp_5u:1073: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1074: yad ete āyuṣman śāriputra sattvā viparyāsa samutthitāḥ karmābhisaṃskurvanti kāyena vācā manasā vā,
K03psp_5u:1077: yat punar āyuṣmān śāriputra evam āha,
K03psp_5u:1090: ato 'vikalpaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ. ye 'pi te āyuṣman śāriputrābhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā
K03psp_5u:1091: arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py āyuṣman śāriputra buddhā bhagavanto 'vikalpo vikalpaprahīṇās,
K03psp_5u:1092: tad anenāpi te āyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:1093: sarvadharmā avikalpā avikalpatathatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya bhūtakoṭiṃ dharmadhātum. evaṃ khalv āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāvikalpāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
K03psp_5u:1094: avikalpāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann avikalpaṃ dharmam abhisaṃbudhyate. iti samastanivṛttipakṣādhiṣṭhāno dvitīyo grāhyavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1095: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1096: sāre batāyam āyuṣman subhūte carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
K03psp_5u:1097: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1098: asāre batāyaṃ caraty āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1105: evaṃ yāvad asārā sarvākārajñatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1106: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann asāram eva nopalabhate na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:1110: atha khalu saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāñ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
K03psp_5u:1111: namaskartavyās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca yair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditaṃ,
K03psp_5u:1112: ye ceha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ caranti,
K03psp_5u:1113: atra cārthe caranto na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkurvanti,
K03psp_5u:1114: asākṣātkurvataḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā na tiṣṭheyur,
K03psp_5u:1115: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa namaskartavyās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imāṃ dharmasamatāṃ na sākṣātkurvanti.
K03psp_5u:1116: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat: nedaṃ (PSP_5:40)
K03psp_5u:1117: devaputrā duṣkaraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ya imaṃ dharmasamatāṃ na sākṣātkurvanti,
K03psp_5u:1118: yasyāḥ sākṣātkṛtāyāḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā tiṣṭheyuḥ. idaṃ teṣāṃ
K03psp_5u:1119: devaputrā duṣkaraṃ yad asaṃkhyeyān aprameyān aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma
K03psp_5u:1121: te ca sattvā atyantatayā nopalabhyante ye vinayitavyā iti. evañ caranto bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ saṃprasthitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sarvasattvān vinayiṣyāma iti,
K03psp_5u:1122: ākāśaṃ sa vinayitavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ sattvān vinayitavyān manyeta. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1126: ākāśatucchatayā sattvatucchatā draṣṭavyā iti. anenāpi devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārako
K03psp_5u:1127: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo 'saṃvidyamānānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate
K03psp_5u:1128: ākāśena sārdhaṃ sa vivaditavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhavyaṃ manyeta,
K03psp_5u:1129: sa ca saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddho bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvāś ca nopalabhyante yeṣām arthāya saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1130: sattvaviviktatayā saṃnāhaviviktatā draṣṭavyā. saced evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. tat kasya
K03psp_5u:1134: sacet punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ cittaṃ
K03psp_5u:1135: nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
K03psp_5u:1136: carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām. iti dravyasatpṛthagjanapuruṣādhiṣṭhānaḥ prathamo grāhakavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1138: kena kāraṇena subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati prajñāpāramitāyā?
K03psp_5u:1140: asattvād bhagavan na saṃsīdati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_5u:1141: viviktatvāc chāntatvād anutpādatvād bhagavan na saṃsīdati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām,
K03psp_5u:1142: anena bhagavan kāraṇena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati prajñāpāramitāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1143: tathā hi bhagavan sa nopalabhyate yaḥ saṃsīdate, yena (PSP_5:41)
K03psp_5u:1144: vā saṃsīdate yatra vā saṃsīdate sarva ete dharmā nopalabhyante. saced bhagavann evaṃ
K03psp_5u:1145: bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati na viṣīdati nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate
K03psp_5u:1146: nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati prajñāpāramitāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1147: tathā hi bhagavan sarva ete dharmā nopalabhyante yo vā saṃsīdet yena vā saṃsīdet yatra vā saṃsīdet,
K03psp_5u:1148: evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatayo devā namasyanti yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
K03psp_5u:1149: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1150: na kevalaṃ subhūte sendrakair devaiḥ sabrahmakaiḥ saprajāpatikair devair namasyanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_5u:1151: ye 'pi te 'tikrāntavarṇā devaputrāḥ śubhakṛtsnā vṛhatphalā yāvac chuddhāvāsakā devaputrās te 'pi subhūte namasyanti bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ ya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
K03psp_5u:1152: ye 'pi te subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu
K03psp_5u:1153: tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
K03psp_5u:1154: taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ samanvāharanti. ayaṃ bodhisattvo
K03psp_5u:1163: yāvat punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvān mahāsattvān buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ samanvāharanti,
K03psp_5u:1165: yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te sarve mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bhaveyur ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tāvata eva mārān pāpīyāso
K03psp_5u:1166: te sarve 'pratibalās tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato 'ntarāyaṃ kartum.
K03psp_5u:1167: dvābhyāṃ subhūte dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo (PSP_5:42)
K03psp_5u:1168: durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ. katamābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ?
K03psp_5u:1170: sarvasattvāś cāparityaktā bhavanti. ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato
K03psp_5u:1171: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyābhiḥ. aparābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ
K03psp_5u:1172: dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran durdharṣo
K03psp_5u:1174: yathāvādī tathākārī ca bhavati buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ samanvāharati. ābhyāṃ subhūte
K03psp_5u:1175: dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
K03psp_5u:1176: durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ. evañ carataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_5u:1177: te devaputrā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante paryupāsyante paripraśnayanti,
K03psp_5u:1179: kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra buddhabodhiṃ samanuprāpsyasi tasmāt tarhi tvaṃ kulaputra etenaiva vihāreṇa vihara yad uta śūnyatāvihāreṇānimittavihāreṇāpraṇihitavihāreṇa. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1180: etena tvaṃ kulaputra vihāreṇa viharann anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyasi,
K03psp_5u:1186: andhabhūtānāṃ sattvānām āloko bhaviṣyasi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1187: etena hi prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇāvirahitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāmī guṇā bhavanti.
K03psp_5u:1188: ye 'pi te 'saṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtā buddhā bhagavanto
K03psp_5u:1189: yo 'sau prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraty etair eva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato yad uta prajñāpāramitāguṇais
K03psp_5u:1190: tasya te buddhā bhagavanto nāmaṃ ca gotraṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
K03psp_5u:1191: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tadyathāpi nāmāham etarhi ratnaketor bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi,
K03psp_5u:1192: śikhinaś ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi.
K03psp_5u:1193: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsatttvā akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
K03psp_5u:1194: anayā ca prajñāpāramitayāvirahitās teṣām ahaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi.
K03psp_5u:1195: ye 'pi te pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
K03psp_5u:1196: tatra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
K03psp_5u:1197: anayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahitās teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā
K03psp_5u:1198: dharmaṃ deśayaty udānaṃ codānayanti. evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha
K03psp_5u:1200: ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
K03psp_5u:1201: tatra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
K03psp_5u:1202: anayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahitās teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
K03psp_5u:1203: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvamārgaṃ paripūrayamāṇā yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti,
K03psp_5u:1204: teṣām api te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1205: evaṃ duṣkarakārakā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti,
K03psp_5u:1207: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
