K03psp_5u:1208: katameṣāṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpās te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti vinivartanīyānāṃ vā avinivartanīyānāṃ vā?
K03psp_5u:1209: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1210: santi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
K03psp_5u:1211: santi vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
K03psp_5u:1212: yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ
K03psp_5u:1213: codānayanti. ye 'pi te ratnaketor bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacārikāṃ
K03psp_5u:1214: caranti teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
K03psp_5u:1215: punar aparaṃ subhūte ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
K03psp_5u:1216: sarvadharmā anutpattikā ity adhimuktā na cānutpattikair (PSP_5:44)
K03psp_5u:1218: sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ity adhimuktā na cānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
K03psp_5u:1219: sarvadharmāḥ śāntā ity adhimuktāḥ sarvadharmā vigatā iti tucchakā iti vaśikā ity asārakā ity adhimuktā na cānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
K03psp_5u:1220: eṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
K03psp_5u:1221: yeṣāṃ te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūupā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti,
K03psp_5u:1222: teṣām api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prahīṇā śrāvakabhūmiś ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
K03psp_5u:1224: yasya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ
K03psp_5u:1225: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyatāyāṃ sthāsyati yatra sthitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
K03psp_5u:1226: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:1227: śrutvā na kāṅkṣiṣyanti na vicikitsiṣyanti na dhandhāyiṣyanti. evam etad yathā tathāgatenārhatā
K03psp_5u:1231: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1232: gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā duṣkarakārakā bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ. tat kasya
K03psp_5u:1233: na ca nāma bhagavan kaścit tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhati nāpi kaścid anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_5u:1234: abhisaṃbudhyate nāpi kaścid dharmaṃ deśayati. atha ca nāvalīyate na cāsya kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ
K03psp_5u:1235: vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā bhavati. iti prajñaptisahāryapudgalādhiṣṭhāno dvitiyo grāhakavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1236: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1237: kathaṃ bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
K03psp_5u:1238: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1240: subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ māyopamaṃ cittam.
K03psp_5u:1247: na māyopamaṃ cittaṃ tatra samanupaśyasi tvaṃ cittam.
K03psp_5u:1252: subhūte 'nyatra māyāyā māyopamād vā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
K03psp_5u:1255: nāhaṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamād vā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo
K03psp_5u:1256: 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. so 'haṃ bhagavann anyaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyan
K03psp_5u:1257: tatkatamaṃ dharmam upadekṣyāmy asti vā nāsti veti?
K03psp_5u:1258: yo dharmo 'tyantatayā vivikto na so 'stitāṃ vā nāstitāṃ vopaiti,
K03psp_5u:1259: yo dharmo 'tyantatayā vivikto na so 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K03psp_5u:1260: na cāsaṃvidyamāno dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbohotsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1261: tathā hi bhagavaṃs te dharmā na saṃvidyante ye saṃkliśyeyur vyavadāyeyur vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1274: yaś cātyantavivikto dharmo na sa bhāvayitavyo vā vibhāvayitavyo vā,
K03psp_5u:1276: yady atyantaviviktā prajñāpāramitā tat kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitam āgamya bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
K03psp_5u:1279: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1291: anuttarā samayaksaṃbodhir atyantaviviktā yāvat sarvākārajñatā atyantaviviktā. yathā
K03psp_5u:1292: subhūte 'tyantaviviktā prajñāpāramitā yāvat sarvākārajñatā tathātyantaviviktām anuttarāṃ
K03psp_5u:1294: sacet subhūte na prajñāpāramitātyantaviviktābhaviṣyad yāvat sarvākārajñatātyantaviviktā
K03psp_5u:1295: bhaviṣyan na prajñāpāramitābhaviṣyad yāvan na sarvākārajñatābhaviṣyad evaṃ na prajñapāramitā.
K03psp_5u:1296: ye ca punar evaṃ śroṣyanti akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike
K03psp_5u:1297: gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāntikād,
K03psp_5u:1298: ayam api bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgala imāṃ prajñāpāramitām adhimokṣyate,
K03psp_5u:1299: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitā tathādhimucyamāno 'vinivartanīyatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
K03psp_5u:1300: evaṃ bahukaraṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇaṃ vadāmi,
K03psp_5u:1301: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'dhimokṣyante 'dhimucya tathatvāya sthāsyanti tathatvāya pratipatsyante tathatvāya sthitvā tathatvāya pratipadyamānās tiṣṭhanti
K03psp_5u:1303: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathatāyāṃ sthitvā tathatāyāṃ pratipadyamāno na kaścid dharmam upalabhate tadā kathaṃ tiṣṭhati sarvākārajñatāyām?
K03psp_5u:1304: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1305: yathā subhūte tathāgatanirmitas tiṣṭhati tathā tiṣṭhati sarvākārajñatāyām.
K03psp_5u:1306: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1307: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatanirmito na kaścid dharmam upalabhate,
K03psp_5u:1309: ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
K03psp_5u:1310: ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati?
K03psp_5u:1312: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati (PSP_5:47)
K03psp_5u:1313: tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
K03psp_5u:1314: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1316: tathāgatanirmito na kaścid dharmam upalabhate ko 'yaṃ tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_5u:1317: ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K03psp_5u:1318: ko yā tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayiṣyati,
K03psp_5u:1320: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. evam etat subhūte evam etat,
K03psp_5u:1322: na subhūte tathāgatanirmitaḥ kaścid dharmam upalabhate yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati yas tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K03psp_5u:1323: yas tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati tathataiva tāvan nopalabhyate,
K03psp_5u:1324: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samysaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyantiti,
K03psp_5u:1325: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1326: utpādād vā subhūte tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭir,
K03psp_5u:1327: neha subhūte tathatāyāṃ kaścit tiṣṭhati na tathatāyāṃ kaścid anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate na tathatāyāṃ kaścid dharmaṃ deśayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1328: na hy atra tathatāyāṃ dharma upalabhyate,
K03psp_5u:1330: yo vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K03psp_5u:1331: yo vā tathatāyā sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1333: naivāsyotpāda upalabhyate na vyayo na sthitir nānyathātvam. yatrāsya dharmasya notpāda upalabhyate na vyayo na sthitir nānyathātvaṃ,
K03psp_5u:1335: ko vā tatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
K03psp_5u:1336: tasmāt tarhi subhūte prajñāpāramitātyantaviviktā yāvat sarvākārajñatātyantaviviktā,
K03psp_5u:1337: tasmāt subhūte prajñapāramitām āgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K03psp_5u:1340: na ca tām anāgamya prajñāpāramitām abhisaṃbhotsyate.
K03psp_5u:1342: gambhīre bhagavann arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
K03psp_5u:1348: tañ cārthaṃ na sākṣātkaroti yad uta śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā.
K03psp_5u:1350: yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi tathā na kaścid duṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1351: tathā hi bhagavan so 'rtho nopalabhyate yaṃ sākṣātkuryāt. sāpi prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate yayā sākṣātkuryāt,
K03psp_5u:1353: anupalabhamāno bhagavan sarvadharmāṃs tat katamam arthaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati?
K03psp_5u:1355: katamaṃ dharmaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati yaṃ sākṣātkṛtvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
K03psp_5u:1356: iyaṃ bhagavann anupalambhacarir bodhisattvacarir yatra caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmair anandhakāratām anuprāpnoti.
K03psp_5u:1357: saced bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
K03psp_5u:1358: evañ caraṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_5u:1359: sa caran nimittam api na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:1361: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyata iti na samanupaśyati.
K03psp_5u:1362: tasya khalu punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1363: dūrīkariṣyāmi śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vāsanno 'smi sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. iti svabhāvavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1364: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan nākāśasyaivaṃ bhavati kasyacid,
K03psp_5u:1365: ahaṃ dūre vābhyāse vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1366: abhedatvād bhagavann ākāśasya. evam eva bhagavan na prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1367: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre,
K03psp_5u:1368: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāse vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1370: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1371: māyākāro vā na mama dūre māyākāro mamābhyāse,
K03psp_5u:1372: yaḥ punar evaṃ janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ sa mama dūre nābhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1373: avikalpatvād bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya. evam eva bhagavan na prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1374: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mamābhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1376: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pratibhāsasya naivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1378: ye punar atra nopasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te mama dūre. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1380: evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1381: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1383: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na kaścit priyo vāpriyo vā saṃvidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1385: evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā na kaścit priyo vāpriyo vā saṃvidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1386: tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nopalabhyate. iti pratipakṣavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1387: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvavikalpaprahīṇa evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvavikalpaprahīṇā avikalpatām upādāya. iti svādhigamavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1388: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatanirmitasya naivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1389: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mamābhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1391: evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1392: srāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1394: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatena yo nirmitaḥ sa yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena kṛtas tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sa ca nirmino 'vikalpo (PSP_5:50)
K03psp_5u:1395: nirvikalpaḥ. evam eva bhagavan yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_5u:1396: bhāvayati tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sā ca prajñāpāramitāvikalpā nirvikalpā. iti kāritravikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1397: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā yantrayuktaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt strīvigraho vā puruṣavigraho vā hastivigraho vā balīvardavigraho
K03psp_5u:1398: sa ca yantrayukto yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena kṛtas tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sa ca yantrayukto
K03psp_5u:1399: 'vikalpo nirvikalpaḥ. evam eva bhagavan yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K03psp_5u:1400: prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sā prajñāpāramitā avikalpā nirvikalpā.
K03psp_5u:1401: iti kriyāsāphalyavikalpaḥ ity ukto navavidhaḥ prathamo grāhyavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1402: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1403: kiyacciraṃ saṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ?
K03psp_5u:1404: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etd avocat:
K03psp_5u:1407: kiyanto buddhā bhagavataḥ paryupāsitā bhagavaṃs tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ?
K03psp_5u:1409: gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitās taiḥ kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā bhavitavyā ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
K03psp_5u:1411: kiyat tair bhagavan kuśalamūlaṃ kṛtaṃ bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ?
K03psp_5u:1413: prathamacittotpādam upādāya subhūte na sā kācid dānapāramitā yā tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na paripūritā,
K03psp_5u:1417: na sā kācid dhyānapāramitā yā tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na paripūritā,
K03psp_5u:1418: na sā kācit prajñāpāramitā yā tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na paripūritā ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
K03psp_5u:1420: āścaryam etad bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
K03psp_5u:1423: āścaryam etat subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
K03psp_5u:1424: tadyathāpi nāma sūryācandramasau maṇḍale caturṣu dvīpeṣu kāryaṃ kurvāte caturo dvīpān anugacchataḥ,
K03psp_5u:1425: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā pañcasu pāramitāsu karma karoti pañca pāramitā anugacchanti,
K03psp_5u:1427: prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvād na pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yathā rājā cakravartī virahitaḥ saptabhī ratnair na rājā cakravartīti nāmadheyaṃ labhate,
K03psp_5u:1428: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitā virahitatvāt prajñāpāramitayā na pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante.
K03psp_5u:1430: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte apuruṣā strī sudharṣaṇā bhavati dhūrtakānām,
K03psp_5u:1431: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvāt sudharṣaṇā bhavanti māreṇa pāpīyasā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhiḥ.
K03psp_5u:1433: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte saṃgrāmāvacaraḥ puruṣaḥ saṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ saṃgrāme vartamāne durdharṣo bhavati rājanyair vā pratyarthikair vā pratyamitrair
K03psp_5u:1434: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvād durdharṣā bhavanti māreṇa
K03psp_5u:1435: vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir ādhimānikair vā pudgalair yāvad evaṃ bodhisattvacaṇḍālair
K03psp_5u:1436: vā pañca pāramitā durdharṣā bhavanti. iti pratipattivaikalyavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1437: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte koṭṭarājāno rājñaś cakravartino 'nuvidheyā bhavanti so 'yaṃ prātarupasthāno yo gacchanti,
K03psp_5u:1438: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchanti. iti parapratyayamāyitvavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1439: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāḥ kācit kunadyaḥ sarvās tā yena gaṅgānadī tenānugacchanti tā gaṅgānadyā sārdhaṃ mahāsamudram upayānti,
K03psp_5u:1440: evam eva pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchanti. ity uddeśanivṛttivikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1441: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya dakṣiṇo hastaḥ sarvakṛtyāni karoty,
K03psp_5u:1444: evaṃ pañca pāramitā draṣṭavyāḥ. iti prādeśikakāritravikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1445: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yac ca kunadīnāṃ yac ca mahānadīnām udakaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ mahāsamudrapraviṣṭam ekarasaṃ bhavaty,
K03psp_5u:1446: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā anupraviṣṭāḥ pāramitā nāmadheyaṃ labhante. ity adhigamanānātvavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1447: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś caturaṅgasya balakāyasya cakraratnam agrato gacchati,
K03psp_5u:1448: tiṣṭhati ca yatra rājñaś cakravartinaś cakraratnaṃ tiṣṭhati tatra rājā cakravartī balakāyam arpayati na ca cakraratnaṃ sthānataś calati,
K03psp_5u:1449: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pariṇāyikā yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchanti,
K03psp_5u:1450: tatra sthāsyanti tatra sthitvā sthānato nātikrāmanti. iti sthānaprasthānāsthānavikalpaḥ.
K03psp_5u:1451: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś cakraratnaṃ sapariṇāyakaratnaṃ sagṛhapatiratnaṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasyāgrato gacchaty,
K03psp_5u:1452: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitāgrato gacchaty agrato gatvā yena sarvākārajñatā tena tiṣṭhati. na ca prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1459: na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā evaṃ bhavaty,
K03psp_5u:1460: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitām anugaccheyam iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1461: svabhāva āsām akiṃcitsamarthaḥ svabhāvaḥ śūnyas tuccho marīcisamaḥ.
K03psp_5u:1462: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1463: yadā bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyās tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:1464: caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:1467: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carata evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1471: śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmīti,
K03psp_5u:1473: arthāyādhyātmabahirdhāvastu parityajati tasya ca parityajata evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1474: na kiṃcit parityaktam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1476: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇo dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati. teṣāñ ca sattvānām arthāya dauḥśīlyasyāvakāśaṃ na dadāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1477: na hy etan mama pratirūpaṃ syād yo 'ham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ kuryām,
K03psp_5u:1478: evam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ piśunavacanaṃ paruṣavacanam abaddhapralāpam abhidhyāṃ vyāpādaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiṃ kuryāṃ,
K03psp_5u:1480: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati. teṣām eva sattvānām arthāyaikacittotpādam api na kṣobhayati,
K03psp_5u:1481: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisatttvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāñ carati. teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya kauśīdyacittaṃ notpādayati,
K03psp_5u:1483: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇo vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati. sa teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya vikṣiptacitto na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1485: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati. sa teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya na jātu prajñāpāramitāvirahito
K03psp_5u:1486: yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1487: na hy anyathā śakyāḥ sattvāḥ paripācayitum anyatra prajñayety arthavaśenaivam arthaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
K03psp_5u:1488: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1490: katham iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate
K03psp_5u:1495: nemāḥ pañca pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labheran prajñāpāramitāṃ punaḥ subhūte āgamya imāḥ
K03psp_5u:1496: pañca pāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante tadyathāpi nāma subhūte nānāprakārā ātmabhāvāḥ
K03psp_5u:1499: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitām āgamya pañca pāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante,
K03psp_5u:1508: tathā hy āsāṃ svabhāvo nāsty anena kāraṇena svabhāvo na prajñāyate.
K03psp_5u:1510: yadi bhagavann arthānupratipannasya kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā na prajñāyate,
K03psp_5u:1511: katham iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate
K03psp_5u:1512: śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttāmākhyāyate anuttarākhyāyate
K03psp_5u:1516: arthānupratipannasya kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā na prajñāyate. api tu khalu punar lokavyavahārasaṃketam upādāya dānapāramitā
K03psp_5u:1520: dhyānapāramitā prajñaptā sattvānāṃ saṃsārataḥ parimocanāya. te ca sattvā na jāyante na mriyante na cyavante nopapadyante,
K03psp_5u:1521: sattvāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā. anena subhūte kāraṇenāsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ
K03psp_5u:1523: praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate anuttamākhyāyate niruttamākhyāyate asamākhyāyate asamasamākhyāyate,
K03psp_5u:1524: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāḥ kāścana striyas tāsāṃ strīratnam agram ākhyāyate jyeṣṭham
K03psp_5u:1525: ākhyāyate śreṣṭham ākhyāyate varam ākhyāyate pravaram ākhyāyate praṇītam ākhyāyate
K03psp_5u:1526: uttamam ākhyāyate anuttamam ākhyāyate niruttamam ākhyāyate asamam ākhyāyate asamasamam
K03psp_5u:1527: ākhyāyate. evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agrākhyāyate
K03psp_5u:1528: jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate
K03psp_5u:1531: ka eṣa bhagavann abhiprāyo yat prajñāpāramitā agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate (PSP_5:55)
K03psp_5u:1532: praṇītākhyāyate' uttamākhyāyate anuttamākhyāyate niruttamākhyāyate asamākhyāyate asamasamākhyāyate?
K03psp_5u:1534: tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā sarvān kuśalān dharmān gṛhītvā yena sarvākārajñatā
K03psp_5u:1535: tena sthāsyaty asthānayogena. iti pṛṣṭato niryāṇavikalpaḥ ity ukto navavidho dvitīyo grāhyavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1537: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kañcid dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti vā muñcati vā?
K03psp_5u:1539: na subhūte prajñāpāramitā kañcid dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti vā muñcati vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1540: tathā hi subhūte sarvadharmā agṛhītā amuktāḥ.
K03psp_5u:1542: tat katamān bhagavan sarvadharmān prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati?
K03psp_5u:1544: rūpaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati,
K03psp_5u:1545: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
K03psp_5u:1546: vijñānaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaṃ
K03psp_5u:1547: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati. evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ
K03psp_5u:1550: buddhadharmān anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ subhūte prajñapāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati.
K03psp_5u:1557: yaḥ subhūte rūpasyāmanasikāro vedanāyā amanasikāraḥ saṃjñāyā amanasikāraḥ saṃskārāṇām amanasikāro vijñānasyāmanasikāraḥ,
K03psp_5u:1566: yāvad yo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher amanasikāraḥ. evaṃ hy etat subhūte rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati yāvat sarvākārajñatā parigṛhītā bhavati.
K03psp_5u:1571: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā na manasikartavyāni,
K03psp_5u:1574: buddhadharmā na manasikartavyāḥ sarvākārajñatā na manasikartavyā tat kathaṃ bhagavan rūpam amanasikṛtvā,
K03psp_5u:1578: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ
K03psp_5u:1585: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
K03psp_5u:1588: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāparamāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr na manasikariṣyati,
K03psp_5u:1592: tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlāni vivardhiṣyante yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1594: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārāṃ vijñanam amanasikṛtvā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādān
K03psp_5u:1600: kim atra bhagavan kāraṇaṃ yena rūpam amanasikāraṃ,
K03psp_5u:1608: amanasikāreṇa hi na śliṣyate kāmadhātau na śliṣyate rūpadhātau na śliṣyate ārūpyadhātāv amanasikāreṇa na kvacic chliṣyate,
K03psp_5u:1609: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na kvacid dharme śliṣyate. iti traidhātukāśleṣavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1611: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kvacit sthāsyati.
K03psp_5u:1613: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_5u:1616: evaṃ caran skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_5u:1617: sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣv āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu
K03psp_5u:1619: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyām api na tiṣṭhati. iti sthānavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1621: kim atra bhagavan kāraṇaṃ yena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tatrāpi na tiṣṭhati?
K03psp_5u:1625: tathā hi sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati yatrābhiniviśeta vā tiṣṭhed vā,
K03psp_5u:1626: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraty anabhiniveśyāsthānayogena. iti bhāvābhāvavikalpābhiniveśavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1628: ya evaṃ bhāvayaty evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
K03psp_5u:1629: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi. saced evaṃ saṃjānīte dūrīkaroti prajñāpāramitāṃ,
K03psp_5u:1631: dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā dūrībhavati,
K03psp_5u:1637: na ca prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kaścid abhiniveśo 'sti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1638: tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti yatrābhiniviśateḥ.
K03psp_5u:1639: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām api saṃjānīte cyuto bodhisattvo
K03psp_5u:1640: mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyā yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati sarvadharmeṣu carati. saced asyaivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1648: na khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitena śakyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum.
K03psp_5u:1649: sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavatīha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyākariṣyaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1650: ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitām abhinirhariṣyati,
K03psp_5u:1660: cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1664: na hy ādhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatācyutasya śakyam abhinirharaṇāya,
K03psp_5u:1668: na hi sarvākārajñatā cyutasya śakyam abhinirharaṇāya,
K03psp_5u:1671: aparigṛhītās tathāgatena sarvadharmāḥ svayam abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyākhyātā deśitāḥ prakāśitāś,
K03psp_5u:1672: cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1673: na hi tathāgatena kaścid dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1677: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1678: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ime doṣā na bhavanti?
K03psp_5u:1680: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evañ jānāti,
K03psp_5u:1684: saced aparigrahadharmam abhinivaśate virahitaḥ prajñāpāramitayā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1685: na hi prajñāpāramitābhiniveśena vartitavyā. iti śaktivikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1711: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam iti nābhiniviśate,
K03psp_5u:1715: idaṃ vijñānam asya vijñānam. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā nābhiniviśate,
K03psp_5u:1716: ime skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāny asya skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ceti,
K03psp_5u:1718: ime sarvadharmā asya sarvadharmāḥ. rūpaṃ nityato vānityato vā duḥkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:1720: vijñānaṃ nityato vānityato vā duṣkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:1722: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā nityato vānityato vā duḥkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:1723: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nityato vānityato vā duṣkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1724: na hi dharmo nityato vānityato vā duṣkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā saṃvidyate,
K03psp_5u:1726: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:1727: vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:1728: sthāsyati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś caturaṅgabalakāyo yena yena
K03psp_5u:1730: evam eva subhūte yena yena prajñāpāramitā gacchati tena tenemāḥ pañca pāramitā anuvartante,
K03psp_5u:1731: yena sarvākārajñatā tena sthāsyanti. iti yathecchagamanavyāghātavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1733: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sārathiś caturaṅgam abhiruhya satmārgeṇa gacchati,
K03psp_5u:1734: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā sārathyaṃ karoti samyagmārgeṇa yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchati. ity uktā uddeśaniryāṇavikalpāḥ
K03psp_5u:1741: sarvākārajñatāmārgo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgaḥ. imau subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgāmārgau. iti mārgāmārgajñānavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1743: mahākṛtyena bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā. evaṃ nayati praṇayati,
K03psp_5u:1747: mahākṛtyeneyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā,
K03psp_5u:1749: praṇayati, ayaṃ mārgo 'yam amārga iti. aprameyāṇam asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyena pratyupasthitā prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_5u:1750: na kaścit subhūte praṇayati na rūpaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_5u:1751: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
K03psp_5u:1753: na śrāvakabhūmer vā na pratyekabudddhabhūmer vā pratyupasthitā,
K03psp_5u:1754: sā khalu punar iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāyikānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_5u:1756: sarvākārajñatāyāś copanāyikā. evam iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasyotpādikā na nirodhikā dharmasthititāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya.
K03psp_5u:1758: yadi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasyotpādikā na nirodhikā,
K03psp_5u:1759: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dānaṃ dātavyaṃ?
K03psp_5u:1771: sarvākārajñatām ārambaṇīkṛtya prajñā bhāvayitavyā. tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K03psp_5u:1772: tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K03psp_5u:1773: pariṇāmayitavyāni. tathā ca pariṇāmayitavyāni yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1776: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imān kuśalān dharmān anuttarāyai
K03psp_5u:1777: samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayataḥ ṣaṭpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṅ gacchati yāvad bodhisattvasya
K03psp_5u:1778: mahāsattvasya maitrībhāvanā paripūriṅ gacchati yāvat sarvākārajñatābhāvanā paripūriṅ
K03psp_5u:1779: gacchati. yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir avirahitaḥ sarvākārajñatayāvirahito bhavati,
K03psp_5u:1780: tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena ṣaṭsu
K03psp_5u:1781: pāramitāsu śikṣitavyaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritavyam. ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhisattvo
K03psp_5u:1782: mahāsattvaḥ sarvān kuśalān dharmān paripūrya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati, tasmād (PSP_5:63)
K03psp_5u:1783: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ.
K03psp_5u:1786: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ?
K03psp_5u:1792: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca na saṃyuktāni na visaṃyuktāni,
K03psp_5u:1796: sarvākārajñatā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ.
K03psp_5u:1798: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpe sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
K03psp_5u:1799: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
K03psp_5u:1801: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu na sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
K03psp_5u:1802: na pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
K03psp_5u:1803: evaṃ na sarvapāramitāsu sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
K03psp_5u:1804: na sarvaśūnyatāsu na saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu nāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu
K03psp_5u:1807: na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1808: na hi rūpaṃ vā kvacit sthitaṃ,
K03psp_5u:1809: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
K03psp_5u:1811: na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā kvacit sthitāni,
K03psp_5u:1812: evaṃ na pāramitā na śūnyatā na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni
K03psp_5u:1814: na sarvākārajñatā kvacit sthitā. evam asthānayogena bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir (PSP_5:64)
K03psp_5u:1816: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣa āmraphalāni vā panasaphalaṃ vā bhakṣayitukāmaḥ syāt tenāmraphalaṃ panasaphalaṃ vāvaropayitavyam,
K03psp_5u:1818: tasyānupūrveṇa saṃbaddhyamānasya stambasya sāmagrī labhamānasy āmraphalair vā panasaphalair vā sāmagrī bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_5u:1819: sa tāny āmraphalāni vā parasaphalāni vā bhakṣiṣyati. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_5u:1820: mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā
K03psp_5u:1821: sattvān dānenānugrahīṣyati śīlena kṣāntyā vīryeṇa dhyānena prajñayānugrahīṣyati sattvān
K03psp_5u:1824: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena,
K03psp_5u:1829: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadasi.
K03psp_5u:1831: prajñāpāramitayā subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadāmi,
K03psp_5u:1832: sarvadharmavaśitām anuprāptukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadāmi. iti prārthanābhāvavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1836: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte mahāsamudraḥ sarvaratnānāṃ sarvasaritāṃ mukhaṃ,
K03psp_5u:1839: sarvadharmā hi prajñāpāramitā bhāvitāḥ prajñāpāramitā bhavanti,
K03psp_5u:1840: tasmāt tarhi śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā bodhisattvayānikair vā pudgalair ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:1841: tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ
K03psp_5u:1842: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ
K03psp_5u:1844: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:1848: śikṣitavyam aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
K03psp_5u:1850: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte iṣvastrācāryo yathānurūpaṃ dhanur gṛhītvā durādharṣo bhavati pratyarthikānāṃ vā pratyamitrāṇāṃ vā,
K03psp_5u:1851: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran durādharṣo bhavati
K03psp_5u:1852: mārair vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhis tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ
K03psp_5u:1854: taṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran tam atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāharanti.
K03psp_5u:1855: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1856: kathaṃ bhagavan buddhā bhagavanto dānapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti?
K03psp_5u:1857: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
K03psp_5u:1858: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
K03psp_5u:1859: vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
K03psp_5u:1860: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
K03psp_5u:1861: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
K03psp_5u:1862: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
K03psp_5u:1863: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
K03psp_5u:1865: caran tam abhijñāsu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu caran taṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvitsv
K03psp_5u:1867: kathaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti?
K03psp_5u:1868: evam utkte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1869: iha subhūte atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ samanvāharanti,
K03psp_5u:1870: tathā ca samanvāharanti yatra naiva dānaṃ na śīlan na kṣāntir na vīryan na dhyānaṃ na prajñopalabhyate. evam anupalambhena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ
K03psp_5u:1871: yatra nādhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā nopalabhyante, yatra (PSP_5:66)
K03psp_5u:1873: yatra sarvākārajñatā nopalabhyate. evam anupalambhayogena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti.
K03psp_5u:1874: punar aparaṃ subhūte buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ na rūpataḥ samanvāharanti,
K03psp_5u:1875: na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārato,
K03psp_5u:1877: na skandhato na dhātuto nāyatanato na pratītyasamutpādato na pratītyasamutpādāṅgataḥ samanvāharanti,
K03psp_5u:1878: na dānapāramitāto na śīlapāramitāto na kṣāntipāramitāto na vīryapāramitāto na dhyānapāramitāto na prajñāpāramitātaḥ samanvāharanti,
K03psp_5u:1883: na sarvākārajñatātaḥ samanvāharanti. iti pratyarthikadharmopalambhavikalpaḥ ity ukto navavidho dvitīyo grāhakavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:1884: atha khalu subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ śakran devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1885: yat tvaṃ kauśikaivaṃ vadasi gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_5u:1886: duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yeṣāṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu na bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhanvāyitatvaṃ vā,
K03psp_5u:1887: śūnyeṣu kauśika sarvadharmeṣu kasyātra kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhanvāyitvaṃ vā bhaviṣyati?
K03psp_5u:1888: evam ukte śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtisthaviram etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1889: yadyad eva subhūtiḥ sthaviro nirdiśati sarvan tac chūnyatām evārabhya nirdiśati na kvacit sajjati,
K03psp_5u:1890: tadyathāpi nāmeṣur antarīkṣe kṣipto na kvacit sajjati,
K03psp_5u:1891: evam eva subhūteḥ sthavirasya dharmadeśanā na kvacit sajjati.
K03psp_5u:1892: atha khalu sakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1893: kaccid ahaṃ bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣamāṇa evam upadiśann uktavādī ca bhagavato dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmaṃ samyag vyākurvan vyākaromi?
K03psp_5u:1895: samyak khalu tvaṃ kauśika evaṃ bhāṣamāṇa evam upadiśaṃs tathāgatasyoktavādī ca dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmaṃ (PSP_5:67)
K03psp_5u:1898: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad eva subhūteḥ sthavirasya pratibhāti sarvan tac chūnyatāṃ caivārabhya pratibhāti,
K03psp_5u:1904: evam ukte bhagavān śakran devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1905: subhūtiḥ kauśika sthaviraḥ śūnyatāyāṃ viharan dānapāramitāñ caiva nopalabhate,
K03psp_5u:1906: kaḥ punar vādo ye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranti kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caranti vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranti dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranti prajñāpāramitāñ caiva nopalabhate,
K03psp_5u:1907: kaḥ punar vādo ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti. smṛtyupasthānāny eva nopalabhate,
K03psp_5u:1908: kaḥ punar vādo ye smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayanti,
K03psp_5u:1912: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti,
K03psp_5u:1914: kaḥ punar vādo ya āryasatyāni bhāvayanti,
K03psp_5u:1918: kaḥ punar vādo ye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāvayanti,
K03psp_5u:1922: kaḥ punar vādo ye balāni bhāvayanti vaiśāradyāny eva nopalabhate,
K03psp_5u:1923: kaḥ punar vādo ye vaiśāradyāny abhinirharanti,
K03psp_5u:1925: kaḥ punar vādo ye pratisaṃvido 'bhinirharanti abhijñā eva nopalabhate,
K03psp_5u:1928: kaḥ punar vādo ye mahākaruṇāvihāraṃ bhāvayanti,
K03psp_5u:1930: kaḥ punar vādo ye āveṇikāṃ buddhadharmān abhinirharanti,
K03psp_5u:1932: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante, (PSP_5:68)
K03psp_5u:1934: kaḥ punar vādo ye sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti,
K03psp_5u:1936: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathāgato bhavaty anutpādam eva nopalabhate,
K03psp_5u:1937: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'nutpādaṃ sākṣāt kurvanti,
K03psp_5u:1939: kaḥ punar vādo yeṣāṃ lakṣaṇāni kāye bhavanti,
K03psp_5u:1941: kaḥ punar vādo yeṣām anuvyañjanāni kāye bhavanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1943: anupalambhavihārī śūnyatāvihāry ānimittavihāry apraṇihitavihārī kauśika ya eṣa subhūteḥ
K03psp_5u:1944: sthavirasya vihāraḥ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato vihārasya
K03psp_5u:1945: śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api kotītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm
K03psp_5u:1946: api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām
K03psp_5u:1947: apy upamām apy aupamyam apy upaniśām apy upaniṣadam api nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1948: tathā hi tathāgatavihāraṃ sthāpayitvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ
K03psp_5u:1949: carato yo vihāraḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca ye vihārās teṣāṃ vihārāṇām ayaṃ
K03psp_5u:1950: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato yo vihāraḥ so 'gra ākhyāyate,
K03psp_5u:1958: niruttama ākhyāyate. tasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāgratāṃ gantukāmenānena vihāreṇa vihartavyaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:1959: atra hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati,
K03psp_5u:1963: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāno bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_5u:1964: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi devās trayastriṃśā māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā bhagavantam
K03psp_5u:1965: avakiranti smābhyavakiranti smābhiprakiranti sma. ṣaṣṭiñ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ śatam utsthāyāsanebhya
K03psp_5u:1966: ekāṃśañ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs
K03psp_5u:1968: teṣāṃ ca bhikṣūṇām añjalayaḥ praṇāmitā buddhānubhāvena māndāravaiḥ puṣpaiḥ paripūrṇā
K03psp_5u:1969: abhūvaṃs te ca māndāravaiḥ puṣpais tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham avakiranti
K03psp_5u:1971: smāvakiranto 'bhyavakiranto 'bhiprakiranta evaṃ ca vācam udīrayanti sma:
K03psp_5u:1972: vayaṃ bhagavann etena kuśalamūlenaitenottamena vihāreṇa vihariṣyāmo yatra nāgatiḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām iti.
K03psp_5u:1973: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyā velāyāṃ teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇām adhyāśayaṃ viditvā smitaṃ praduṣkaroti
K03psp_5u:1974: sma. dharmatā khalu punar eṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yadā smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti tadā
K03psp_5u:1975: khalv anekavarṇā nānāvarṇā arciṣo bhagavato mukhadvārān niścaranti sma,
K03psp_5u:1976: tadyathā nīlāḥ pītā lohitā avadātā māñjiṣṭhā rajatavarṇās trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
K03psp_5u:1977: lokadhātum avabhāsya punar evāgatya buddhān bhagavatas triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato
K03psp_5u:1979: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃśaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1982: smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya nāhetukan nāpratyayan tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti.
K03psp_5u:1983: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ ānanadam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:1984: imāny ānanda ṣaṣṭir bhikṣuśatāny anāgate 'dhvani tārakopame kalpe 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante,
K03psp_5u:1986: teṣāṃ khalu punar ānandāvakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ samasamo bhikṣusaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_5u:1989: viṃśativarṣasahasraṃ yato yato 'bhiniṣkramiṣyanti abhiniṣkramya pravrajiṣyanti pravrajitvā
K03psp_5u:1990: yatra yatra vihariṣyanti tatra tatra pañcavarṇikānāṃ kusumānāṃ kusumavarṣāṇi pravarṣiṣyanti.
K03psp_5u:1991: tasmāt tarhy ānanda uttamena vihāreṇa vihartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ

K03psp_5u:1999: tuṣiteṣu deveṣv iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa śrutā bhaviṣyati,

K03psp_5u:2002: bodhisattvayānikānāṃ vā pudgalānām imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty anuśāsiṣyati
K03psp_5u:2003: niṣṭhā tenānanda kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vānugantavyā saṃmukhaṃ mayā teṣāṃ tathāgatānām
K03psp_5u:2004: arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antikād iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutābhūt,
K03psp_5u:2005: udgrahītā ca dhāritā ca vācitā ca paryavāptā cābhūt,

K03psp_5u:2009: arthataś ca dharmataś ca vinayataś cānugamiṣyati niṣṭhānanda tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vānugantavyā saṃmukhībhūto 'haṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām iti,
K03psp_5u:2010: yaḥ kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā na pratikrokṣyati na prativahiṣyati prasādaṃ
K03psp_5u:2011: pūrvajinakṛtādhikāraḥ sa ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ,
K03psp_5u:2014: kiṃ cāpy ānanda yena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike

K03psp_5u:2022: ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāñ caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:2023: caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na śrāvakatvāya
K03psp_5u:2024: vā na pratyekabuddhatvāya vā sthāsyati. tasmāt tarhy ānandānuparīndāmi ta imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ,
K03psp_5u:2025: sacet punas tvaṃ ānanda yo mayā dharmo deśitaḥ sthāpitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvāntāṃ
K03psp_5u:2026: dharmadeśanām udgṛhya paryavāpya punar eva nāśayeḥ punar evotsṛjer na me tvam ānanda
K03psp_5u:2028: sacet tvam ānandemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya ekapadam api nāśayer utsṛjes tāvatā me tvaṃ ānandāparāddhaḥ syāḥ,
K03psp_5u:2029: sacet tvaṃ ānandemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya dve padam api punar
K03psp_5u:2030: eva nāśayeḥ punar evotsṛjes tāvatā me tvaṃ ānandāparāddhaḥ syāḥ. tasmāt tarhy ānandānuparīndāmi
K03psp_5u:2031: te tathemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paṭheyam udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā
K03psp_5u:2032: paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā bhavet,
K03psp_5u:2033: tvayā ca suvyaktena suparigṛhītenākṣarapadavyañjanena suniruktā ca suparigṛhītā ca kartavyā.
K03psp_5u:2034: yaḥ kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati
K03psp_5u:2035: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati
K03psp_5u:2036: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
K03psp_5u:2038: yo hy ānanda tarhi māṃ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā satkuryād gurukuryāt
K03psp_5u:2040: gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā udgṛhītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā
K03psp_5u:2041: yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ
K03psp_5u:2042: prajñāpāramitāṃ satkurvan tu gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan tena pūjito bhavāmi,
K03psp_5u:2043: atītānāgatapratyutpannāś ca buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūjitā bhavanti.
K03psp_5u:2044: yaḥ kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
K03psp_5u:2045: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā gauravaṃ ca prema ca prasādaṃ (PSP_5:72)
K03psp_5u:2046: cotpādayiṣyati atītānāgatapratyutpannanāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike tena gauravañ
K03psp_5u:2047: ca prema ca prasādaś cotpādito bhaviṣyati yathā te 'ham ānanda priyaś ca manaāpaś
K03psp_5u:2048: cāparityaktaś ca tatheyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā priyā manaāpāparityaktā bhavatu
K03psp_5u:2049: yathā ekapadam api ta ito gambhīrāyā prajñāpāramitāyā na nāśayitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:2050: bahv api te 'ham ānanda bhāṣe prajñāpāramitāyā parīndanām ārabhya saṃkṣiptenānanda yādṛśas te 'haṃ śāstā tādṛśī te prajñāpāramitā śāstā,
K03psp_5u:2051: tasmāt tarhy ānanda prajñāpāramitā yā apramāṇāni parīndanāni,
K03psp_5u:2052: ahaṃ ca te ānandemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām anuparīndāmi,
K03psp_5u:2053: tasmāt tarhy ānanda sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyārocayāmi yasyāparityakto buddho 'parityakto
K03psp_5u:2057: yaḥ kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K03psp_5u:2058: pareṣāñ cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati prajñāpayiṣyati prasthāpayiṣyati vivariṣyati vibhajiṣyaty uttānīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
K03psp_5u:2059: sa khalu punar ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K03psp_5u:2060: abhyāsannaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:2061: prajñāpāramitā nirjātā hy ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. ye
K03psp_5u:2062: 'pi te ānandābhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās teṣām apy
K03psp_5u:2063: ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitā nirjātaivānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. ye
K03psp_5u:2064: 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās teṣām apy
K03psp_5u:2065: ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitā nirjātaivānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. ye
K03psp_5u:2066: 'pi te ānandaitarhi pūrvasyān diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha ūrdhvaṃ
K03psp_5u:2067: vidikṣu daśadiglokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante
K03psp_5u:2069: teṣām apy ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitā nirjātaivānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tasmāt tarhy ānanda (PSP_5:73)
K03psp_5u:2070: bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmena iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:2071: eṣā hy ānanda bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātājanayitrī yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_5u:2072: ye kecid ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyante sarve te niryāsyanty
K03psp_5u:2073: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tasmāt tarhy ānandemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhūyasyā mātrayānuparīndāmi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:2074: eṣā hy ānanda tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmakośaḥ,
K03psp_5u:2075: akṣayo hy eṣa kośo yad uta prajñāpāramitākośaḥ. ye 'pi te ānanda pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ
K03psp_5u:2076: paścimāyām uttarasyām adha ūrdhvaṃ vidikṣu daśadiglokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ
K03psp_5u:2077: samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti te 'py ānanda
K03psp_5u:2078: buddhā bhagavanta ita eva prajñāpāramitākośād deśayanti. ye 'pi te ānandātīte 'dhvani
K03psp_5u:2079: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhūvaṃs te 'py asyām eva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ
K03psp_5u:2080: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā dharman deśitavantaḥ. ye 'pi te ānanda bhaviṣyanty
K03psp_5u:2081: anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py asyām eva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:2082: śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante dharmañ ca deśayiṣyanti. ye 'pi
K03psp_5u:2083: te ānandātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakāḥ sarve te ihaiva
K03psp_5u:2084: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā parinirvṛtāś ca parinirvānti ca parinirvāsyanti ca. iti
K03psp_5u:2086: sacet tvam ānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvakabhūmim ārabhya dharman deśayes
K03psp_5u:2087: tayā ca dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'rhattvaṃ
K03psp_5u:2088: sākṣātkuryur adyāpi tvayā mama śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyan na kṛtaṃ syāt. sacet me tvam
K03psp_5u:2089: ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ekam api prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayer,
K03psp_5u:2092: tayā ca pūrvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve
K03psp_5u:2093: 'pūrvācaramaṃ mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabheran mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhyārhattvaṃ
K03psp_5u:2094: sākṣātkuryus teṣāñ cārhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
K03psp_5u:2097: tvam ānandāpi nu tat puṇyakriyāvastu bahu.
K03psp_5u:2098: ānanda āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_5u:2100: ataḥ sa ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_5u:2101: yaḥ śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktan dharman deśayed antaśa ekadivasam api,
K03psp_5u:2102: tiṣṭhatv ānanda ekadivasaṃ saced yāvad ardhadivasam api,
K03psp_5u:2104: tiṣṭhatv ānanda purobhaktaṃ saced yāvan nālikāntaraṃ,
K03psp_5u:2105: saced yāvat kṣaṇaṃ vā yāval lavaṃ vā,
K03psp_5u:2106: tiṣṭhatv ānanda lavam antaśo nimeṣamātram api,
K03psp_5u:2107: ayaṃ ānanda tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. yaḥ śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktan dharman deśayet,
K03psp_5u:2108: sa sarvaśrāvakayānikānāṃ sarvapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlam abhibhavati.
K03psp_5u:2109: saced ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ
K03psp_5u:2110: dharman deśayed antaśa ekadivasam apy ardhadivasam api purobhaktam api nālikāntaraṃ
K03psp_5u:2111: vā kṣaṇaṃ vā lavaṃ vā nimeṣamātram api,
K03psp_5u:2112: ayam ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ kuśalamūlam abhibhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:2113: tathā hi sa ātmanā cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ parāṃś cānuttarāyai
K03psp_5u:2114: samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpraharṣayati samuttejayati samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati.
K03psp_5u:2115: evaṃ ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carañ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu
K03psp_5u:2117: bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carann apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu
K03psp_5u:2120: caran kuśalamūlair vivardhamāno 'sthānam anavakāśo yad anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ
K03psp_5u:2121: parihāsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. asyāṃ khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:2122: catasraḥ pariṣado devamanuṣyayaksagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragāś ca saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣanṇā abhūvan.
K03psp_5u:2123: atha khalu bhagavāṃś catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ puratas tathārūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān
K03psp_5u:2124: yathārūpeṇarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhi saṃskṛtenākṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyanti sma,
K03psp_5u:2126: parṣady akṣobhyāyāṃ sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niḥkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ
K03psp_5u:2127: suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair
K03psp_5u:2130: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva tam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ pratisaṃharati sma,
K03psp_5u:2131: yenarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇa pratisaṃhṛtena tāś catasraḥ pariṣado na bhūyaḥ paśyanti sma.
K03psp_5u:2132: tam aksobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā
K03psp_5u:2133: vā bodhisattvayānikā vā pudgalās tañ ca buddhakṣetram akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
K03psp_5u:2134: samyaksaṃbuddhasya na bhūyaḥ paśyanti sma. sa buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho na bhūyaś
K03psp_5u:2136: pratisaṃhṛto hi bhagavatā tathāgatena sa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāras tena bhūyo na paśyati sma.
K03psp_5u:2137: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ ānandam āmantrayate sma:
K03psp_5u:2138: evaṃ hy ānanda sarvadharmāś cakṣuṣo nābhāsam āgacchanti,
K03psp_5u:2141: na dharmo dharmaṃ jānāti. yathā punar eva so 'ksobhyas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas
K03psp_5u:2142: te ca śrāvakās te ca bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrās tac ca buddhakṣetraṃ cakṣuṣo nābhāsam āgacchanti,
K03psp_5u:2143: evaṃ hy ānanda sarvadharmāś cakṣuṣo nābhāsam āgacchanti,
K03psp_5u:2146: na dharmo dharmaṃ jānāti. sarvadharmā hy ānandājānakā apaśyakā akriyāsamarthāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:2147: nirīhakā agrāhyā ānanda sarvadharmā agrāhyā nirīhakatayā,
K03psp_5u:2149: avedakā hy ānanda sarvadharmā asāratām upādāya. evañ carann ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyān na kaṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate,
K03psp_5u:2150: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyān na kaṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate, evaṃ (PSP_5:76)
K03psp_5u:2151: śikṣamāṇa ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate prajñāpāramitayāṃ sarvapāramitānuprāptukāmena
K03psp_5u:2152: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. eṣā hi śikṣā yāgrākhyāyate
K03psp_5u:2153: jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate
K03psp_5u:2155: sarvalokahitā sarvalokasukhā anāthānāṃ nāthakarī buddhānujñātā buddhapraśastā,
K03psp_5u:2156: yatra sthitvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ
K03psp_5u:2157: dakṣiṇena pāṇinotkṣipya punar eva nikṣipeyur na ca teṣām evaṃ bhavati utkṣipto vāyaṃ
K03psp_5u:2158: trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ nikṣipto veti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:2159: iyaṃ sānanda prajñāpāramitāśikṣā yatra śikṣitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatām atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu
K03psp_5u:2160: dharmeṣu asaṅgajñānadarśanam utpannaṃ yāvatya ānanda śikṣāḥ sarvāsām ānanda śikṣānām
K03psp_5u:2163: ākāśasya ānanda pramāṇaṃ vā paryantaṃ vā udgṛhītavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā paryantaṃ vā grahītavyaṃ manyeta. tat kasya
K03psp_5u:2167: na prajñāpāramitā pramāṇabaddhā. iti mahābodhiprāptaye puṇyabāhulyalakṣaṇaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇam ity uktāni kāraṇāni
K03psp_5u:2168: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:2171: akṣayatvād ānanda prajñāpāramitāpramāṇabaddhā viviktād ānanda prajñāpāramitā pramāṇabaddhā,
K03psp_5u:2172: ye 'pi te ānandābhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta ita eva prajñāpāramitātaḥ prabhāvitā na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā kṣīyate kṣeṣyate,
K03psp_5u:2173: ye 'pi te ānanda bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
K03psp_5u:2174: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta ita eva prajñāpāramitātaḥ prabhāviṣyante na ca prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_5u:2176: ye 'pi te ānanda etarhi daśadiśi loke tathāgatā arhantaḥ (PSP_5:77)
K03psp_5u:2177: samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharman deśayanti te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta
K03psp_5u:2178: ita eva prajñāpāramitātaḥ prabhāvyante na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā kṣīyate kṣeṣyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:2179: ākāśaṃ sa ānanda kṣayituṃ manyeta yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṣayaṃ manyeta na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā kṣīyate kṣeṣyate,
K03psp_5u:2180: na dhyānapāramitā kṣīyate na vīryapāramitā kṣīyate na kṣāntipāramitā kṣīyate na śīlapāramitā kṣīyate na dānapāramitā kṣīṇā kṣīyate kṣaṣyate,
K03psp_5u:2181: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na kṣīṇā na kṣīyate na kṣeṣyate,
K03psp_5u:2182: smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā na kṣīṇā na kṣīyante na kṣeṣyante,
K03psp_5u:2183: āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo na kṣīṇā na kṣīyante na kṣeṣyante,
K03psp_5u:2184: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā na kṣīṇā na kṣīyante na kṣeṣyante,
K03psp_5u:2185: sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni na kṣīṇā na kṣīyante na kṣeṣyante daśatathāgatabalāni
K03psp_5u:2186: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikābuddhadharmā na kṣīṇā na
K03psp_5u:2188: sarvākārajñatā na kṣīṇā na kṣīyate na kṣeṣyate. na hi teṣāṃ dharmāṇām utpādo 'sti yeṣām utpādo nāsti,
K03psp_5u:2191: atha khalu bhagavāñ jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmya sarvāvantaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ jihvendriyeṇācchādayitvāyuṣmantaṃ ānandam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:2193: ānandāpi nu īdṛśaṃ jihvendriyaṃ vitathavādi anyathāvādi syāt.
K03psp_5u:2194: ānanda āha: na bhagavan na sugata.
K03psp_5u:2196: tasmāt tarhy ānanda imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ vistareṇākhyāhi deśaya prajñāpaya prasthāpaya vibhaja vibhāvayottānīkuru saṃprakāśaya,
K03psp_5u:2197: ihaivānanda gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra śrāvakayānikaiś ca pratyekabuddhayānikaiś ca bodhisattvayānikaiś ca pudgalaiḥ śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:2199: iyaṃ punar ānanda gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā sarvākṣarapraveśa sarvānakṣarapraveśā,
K03psp_5u:2200: iyam ānanda gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā sarvadhāraṇīnāṃ mukhaṃ,
K03psp_5u:2202: dhāraṇīṃ dhārayatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvāḥ pratibhānapratisaṃvido bhaviṣyantiyam ānanda gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_5u:2204: tasmāt tarhy ānandārocayāmi te prativedayāmi te,
K03psp_5u:2205: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
K03psp_5u:2206: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati so 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiṃ dhārayiṣyati,
K03psp_5u:2207: iyaṃ sānanda prajñāpāramitā dhāraṇy uktā mayā,
K03psp_5u:2208: tāṃ tvaṃ prajñāpāramitādhāraṇīṃ dhārayan sarvadharmān dhārayasi. ity uktaṃ mahābodhau saṃpratyayakāraṇam
K03psp_5u:2209: atha khalv āyuṣmataḥ subhūter etad abhavat:
K03psp_5u:2212: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:2220: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānākṣayatvāt subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinir hartavyā. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanākṣayatvāt subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
K03psp_5u:2224: evaṃ śīlapāramitākṣayatvāt kṣāntipāramitākṣayatvād vīryapāramitākṣayatvād dhyānapāramitākṣayatvāt prajñāpāramitākṣayatvāt subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
K03psp_5u:2229: subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākṣayatvena pañcābhijñākṣayatvena subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
K03psp_5u:2231: daśabalākṣayatvena caturvaiśāradyākṣayatvena pratisaṃvidakṣayatvenāṣṭādaśāveṇikābuddha dharmākṣayatvena subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
K03psp_5u:2233: punar aparaṃ subhūte rūpākāśākṣayatvena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
K03psp_5u:2255: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā ādyantavivarjitā,
K03psp_5u:2256: āveṇiko 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmo bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya yad evaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayaty,
K03psp_5u:2257: evaṃ vyavalokayan pratītyasamutpādaṃ sarvajñajñānaṃ pratilapsyate. yaḥ kaścit subhūte
K03psp_5u:2258: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nenākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayiṣyati,
K03psp_5u:2259: na sa śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patiṣyati,
K03psp_5u:2260: so 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthāsyati. yaḥ kaścit subhūte bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vivartiṣyaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
K03psp_5u:2261: sa sarva imaṃ prajñāpāramitāmanasikāram anāgamya vivartiṣyati,
K03psp_5u:2262: na saṃjñāsyate kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavyaḥ?
K03psp_5u:2264: iti. ye kecit subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā vivartante sarve ta idam upāyakauśalyam
K03psp_5u:2265: anāgamya vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. ye kecit subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
K03psp_5u:2266: na vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ sarve ta imāṃ prajñāpāramitām āgamya na
K03psp_5u:2267: vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher upāyakauśalyena. evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā
K03psp_5u:2268: bodhisattvena mahāsattven ākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā vyavalokayitavyā abhinirhartavyā.
K03psp_5u:2269: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayan na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:2270: ahetukam utpadyamānan na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:2271: nirudhyamānan na kaṃcid dharmam ātmataḥ samanupaśyati na sattvato na jīvato na jantuto
K03psp_5u:2272: na poṣato na puruṣato na pudgalato na manujato na mānavato na kārakato notthāpakato
K03psp_5u:2273: na samutthāpakato na vedakato na vedāpakato na jānakato na jānāpakato na paśyakato na paśyāpakato,
K03psp_5u:2274: na nityato nānityataḥ samanupaśyati na sukhato na duṣkhato nātmakato nānātmakato na śāntato nāśāntataḥ.
K03psp_5u:2275: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratītyasamutpādo (PSP_5:81)
K03psp_5u:2277: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati tasmin samaye
K03psp_5u:2278: rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā
K03psp_5u:2279: śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā,
K03psp_5u:2281: vijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā
K03psp_5u:2282: vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā. evaṃ vyastasamastān skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādān
K03psp_5u:2283: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ
K03psp_5u:2284: vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā. evaṃ sarvapāramitān na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:2288: na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śāntaṃ
K03psp_5u:2289: vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā. sarvākārajñatān na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ
K03psp_5u:2290: vā sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ
K03psp_5u:2291: vā. yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati tasmin
K03psp_5u:2292: samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitān na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:2293: tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:2299: tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa yāvad dānapāramitāṃ samanupaśyet. evaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāny āryāstāṅgamārgan na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:2300: tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ samanupaśyet. adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ na
K03psp_5u:2301: tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyed āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīr na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:2302: tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīḥ (PSP_5:82)
K03psp_5u:2305: yena dharmeṇa śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān samanupaśyet. sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:2306: tam api dharman1 na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni samanupaśyet. abhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:2307: tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇābhijñadaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaḥ samanupaśyet. aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:2308: tam api dharmān na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān samanupaśyet. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhin na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_5u:2309: tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ samanupaśyet.
K03psp_5u:2310: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ sarvadharmān
K03psp_5u:2311: anupalabhamānena. yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmān anupalabhamānaḥ
K03psp_5u:2312: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃ śokaśalyasamarpito bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2313: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya mātāpitarau kālagatau bhavataḥ sa tena duṣkhena śokaśalyasamarpito bhavati parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgataḥ,
K03psp_5u:2314: evam eva subhūte māraḥ pāpīyāṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvadharmān anupalabhamānasya śokasalyasamarpito bhavati parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgataḥ.
K03psp_5u:2315: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:2316: eka eva bhagavan māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyena samanvāgato bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2317: utāho ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsas te sarve parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgatā bhavanti,
K03psp_5u:2320: sarva eva subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgatā bhavanti,
K03psp_5u:2322: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇāvirahito bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2323: evaṃ viharataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuraloko 'vatāran na labhate yatra gṛhītvā viheṭhayet,
K03psp_5u:2324: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena
K03psp_5u:2325: prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihartavyam. ity uktam akṣayākāraṃ kṣayajñānam anutpādākāram anutpādajñānam
K03psp_5u:2326: prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati,
K03psp_5u:2331: prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvāḥ pāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti
K03psp_5u:2332: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:2333: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati,
K03psp_5u:2339: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:2340: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan dānan dadāti,
K03psp_5u:2341: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan śīlaṃ rakṣati,
K03psp_5u:2342: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan kṣāntyā saṃpādayati,
K03psp_5u:2343: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan vīryam ārabhate,
K03psp_5u:2344: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. iha subhūte bodhisatttvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
K03psp_5u:2345: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
K03psp_5u:2346: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
K03psp_5u:2347: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:2348: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2350: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānan dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:2351: pariṇāmayataḥ sattveṣu maitraṃ kāyakarma maitraṃ vākkarma maitraṃ manaḥkarma pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2352: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2354: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2356: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānan dadato yad idaṃ pratigrāhakā ākrośanti vā paribhāṣante vā,
K03psp_5u:2358: na ca teṣām antike cittam āghātayati,
K03psp_5u:2359: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2361: kathaṃ bhagavan boddhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2363: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā danan dadatas te
K03psp_5u:2364: pratigrāhakā yady ākrośanti vā paribhāṣante vā asatyāṃ vā paruṣāṃ vā vācaṃ samudācaranti
K03psp_5u:2366: asatyayā vā paruṣayā vā vācā samudācaryamāṇasya dānabuddhir eva bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2369: na mayā na dātavyaṃ sa kāyikañ ca caitasikañ ca vīryaṃ sa vyañjanayati,
K03psp_5u:2370: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2372: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2374: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānan dadato dānaṃ parityajataḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayate,
K03psp_5u:2375: na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā cittaṃ pariṇāmayaty,
K03psp_5u:2377: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2379: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2381: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānan dadato dānaṃ parityajataḥ,
K03psp_5u:2382: tasya māyābuddhir eva dāne pratyupasthitā bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2383: tena ca dānena na kasyacit sattvasyopakāraṃ vāpakāraṃ vā paśyaty,
K03psp_5u:2384: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā pprajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2385: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:2386: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2388: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito yaḥ kāyikaś ca vācikaś
K03psp_5u:2389: ca caitasikaś ca saṃvaras tena saṃvarena na śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā parāmṛṣati,
K03psp_5u:2390: tatra ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito na sattvān jīvitād vyaparopayati,
K03psp_5u:2394: na paruṣavāg bhavati na piśunāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate,
K03psp_5u:2399: sa tatra śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito yad dānan dadāty annam annārthikānāṃ pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ
K03psp_5u:2400: yānaṃ yānārthikānāṃ vastraṃ vastrārthikānāṃ mālyaṃ mālyārthikānāṃ vilepanaṃ vilepanārthikānāṃ
K03psp_5u:2401: śayanaṃ śayanārthikānām upāśrayam upāśrayārthikānāṃ pradīpaṃ pradīpārthikānāṃ upakaraṇam
K03psp_5u:2403: tac ca dānaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2404: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathā na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2405: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2407: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2409: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsatttvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitasya sarvasattvā aṅgapratyaṅgāni
K03psp_5u:2410: cchitvā cchitvā gaccheyus tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ekacittotpādo 'pi na
K03psp_5u:2413: yatra hi nāma mama sattvā aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchitvā cchitvā gaccheyur,
K03psp_5u:2414: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2416: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2418: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kāyena na cittena vīryaṃ srasayati,
K03psp_5u:2419: sarvasattvā mayottārayitavyāḥ saṃsārataḥ amṛte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ,
K03psp_5u:2420: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2422: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2424: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ
K03psp_5u:2425: na ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vādhyālambate 'nyatra cāsyaivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2426: iha mayā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvāḥ saṃsārād uttārayitavyāḥ,
K03psp_5u:2427: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2429: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2431: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito na kañcid dharmaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vāsaṃskṛtaṃ vā paśyati,
K03psp_5u:2433: na kasyacid dharmasyāsti tvaṃ vā nāsti tvaṃ vā paśyaty anyatra sarvadharmatathatān na vyativartante,
K03psp_5u:2434: tayā ca prajñāpāramitayopāyakauśalyena na śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pataty,
K03psp_5u:2435: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2436: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:2437: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2440: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya sarvasattvā yady ākrośayeyuḥ
K03psp_5u:2441: paribhāṣerann aṅgapratyaṅgāni cācchidyus tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:2444: na mayaiteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dānaṃ na dātavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:2445: sa teṣāṃ sattvānām annam annārthikānāṃ dadāti,
K03psp_5u:2449: dadāti yāvad anyatarānyatarāṇi mānuṣyakāṇi pariṣkāropakaraṇāni dadāti,
K03psp_5u:2450: tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2451: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate,
K03psp_5u:2454: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2456: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo nmahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2458: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣanṇo
K03psp_5u:2459: 'trāntare na kaścit sattvo jīvitād vyaparopito na daihikī bodhyaṅgatāghātadoṣakriyā vā utpāditā,
K03psp_5u:2470: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2471: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate,
K03psp_5u:2474: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2476: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2480: nāhaṃ yojanaṃ vā gatvā yojanaśataṃ vā yojanasahasraṃ vā yojanaśatasahasraṃ vā yojanakoṭī niyutaśatasahasraṃ vā,
K03psp_5u:2481: lokadhātuṃ vā lokadhātuśataṃ vā lokadhātusahasraṃ vā lokadhātuśatasahasraṃ vā lokadhātuniyutaśatasahasraṃ
K03psp_5u:2482: vā lokadhātukoṭīṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīśataṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīsahasraṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīśatasahasraṃ
K03psp_5u:2483: vā lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā gatvā tatrāntaśa ekasattvam api śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeṣu
K03psp_5u:2484: na pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ srotaāpattiphale vā sakṛdāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā arhattvaphale
K03psp_5u:2485: vā na pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ pratyekabodhau vā na pratiṣṭhāpayeyam anuttarāyāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhau
K03psp_5u:2487: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate,
K03psp_5u:2490: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣānatipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2492: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2494: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_5u:2498: utpannotpannāṃś cittacetasikān dharmān kuśalamūlopasaṃhitān sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇān kṛtvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2500: yathā dhyānāni ca dhyānāṅgāni ca tasmin samaye nopalabhate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ
K03psp_5u:2502: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2504: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā tasmin samaye dharme dharmānupaśyī viharati,
K03psp_5u:2505: viviktavihāreṇa vā śāntākāreṇa vākṣayākāreṇa vā na ca tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkaroti,
K03psp_5u:2506: yāvac ca na bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2510: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2511: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate,
K03psp_5u:2514: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_5u:2515: tathā ca parigṛhṇāti yathā nodgṛhṇāti tāvan notsṛjati.
K03psp_5u:2516: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:2517: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2519: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kāyena cittena caran na nikṣipati,
K03psp_5u:2522: sattvānāṃ ca kṛtena yojanaṃ vā yojanaśataṃ vā yojanasahasraṃ vā yojanaśatasahasraṃ
K03psp_5u:2523: vā yojanakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā lokadhātuṃ vā lokadhātuśataṃ vā lokadhātusahasraṃ
K03psp_5u:2524: vā lokadhātuśatasahasraṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā gatvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:2525: sthitvāntaśa ekasattvam apy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_5u:2526: saced bodhisattvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ labheta taṃ bodhicaryāsu pratiṣṭhāpayati. śrāvakayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ śrāvakatvāya pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_5u:2528: antaśa ekasattvam api daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayati,
K03psp_5u:2529: sa tad dharmadānaṃ dattvā āmiṣadānena sattvān saṃtarpayati. sa tat kuśalamūlaṃ na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty,
K03psp_5u:2530: anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2531: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate,
K03psp_5u:2534: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2536: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2538: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya,
K03psp_5u:2544: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā cādattādānāt prativirato bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2548: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca kāmamithyācārāt prativirato bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2552: teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca mṛṣāvādāt prativirato bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2556: teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca paruṣavacanāt prativirato bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2560: teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca piśunavacanāt prativirato bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2564: teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā cābaddhapralāpāt prativirato bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2568: teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā cābhidhyāyāḥ prativirato bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2572: teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca vyāpādāt prativirato bhavati,
