K03psp_5u:2576: teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativirato bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2580: teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. sa tayā śīlapāramitayā na kāmadhātuṃ prārthayati,
K03psp_5u:2585: anyatra tat kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2586: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate,
K03psp_5u:2589: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2591: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2593: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya
K03psp_5u:2594: manuṣyabhūto vāmanuṣyabhūto vā cittavikṣepaṃ vā kuryād aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchitvā ādāya gacchet,
K03psp_5u:2595: tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitasya naivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2596: ko me cchinatti vā bhinatti vā harati vā,
K03psp_5u:2598: sulabdhā me lābhā yeṣām evāham arthāya kāyaṃ pariharāmi,
K03psp_5u:2601: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty,
K03psp_5u:2602: anyatra sarva sattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2603: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2606: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2608: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2610: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ
K03psp_5u:2611: savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
K03psp_5u:2612: vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ
K03psp_5u:2613: samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. prīteś ca virāgād upekṣako viharati,
K03psp_5u:2614: smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃ sukhaṃ ca kāye na (PSP_5:92)
K03psp_5u:2616: upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sukhasya
K03psp_5u:2617: ca prahāṇād duṣkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād
K03psp_5u:2618: aduṣkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhañ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvasattveṣu
K03psp_5u:2620: sa sarvasattveṣu duṣkhasaṃjñāmanasikārāt karuṇām apramāṇām upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_5u:2621: sa sarvasattveṣu pramuditāsaṃjñāmanasikārād muditām apramāṇām upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_5u:2622: sa sarvasattveṣu sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñāmanasikārād upekṣām apramāṇām upasaṃpadya viharati.
K03psp_5u:2623: sa rūpe audārikasaṃjñāyāḥ prahāṇād ākāśasaṃjñāyāś ca manasikārād ākāśānantyāyatanam
K03psp_5u:2625: sa vijñāne śāntasaṃjñāyā manasikārād vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_5u:2626: sa ākiṃcanyāyataneṣu śāntasaṃjñāmanasikārād ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_5u:2627: sa naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyāḥ śāntasaṃjñāyā manasikārād naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa teṣām apramāṇānāñ cārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ ca vipākan na pratigṛhṇāty,
K03psp_5u:2629: tatropapadyate sa tān sattvān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu paripācayati dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:2631: buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ paryupāste paripṛcchati paripraśnīkurute kuśalamūlāvaropanatayā,
K03psp_5u:2632: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2633: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2636: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2638: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2640: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā na dānapāramitān dravyataḥ
K03psp_5u:2641: samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittato na śīlapāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na
K03psp_5u:2643: na kṣāntipāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittato,
K03psp_5u:2644: na vīryapāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittato, na
K03psp_5u:2645: (PSP_5:93) dhyānapāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittato,
K03psp_5u:2646: na prajñāpāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupsaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ. evaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni
K03psp_5u:2647: mārgaṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
K03psp_5u:2648: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatān na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
K03psp_5u:2649: āryasatyāprmāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
K03psp_5u:2650: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni pañcābhijñā na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
K03psp_5u:2651: sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
K03psp_5u:2652: daśabalaviśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmān na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
K03psp_5u:2653: sarvākārajñatān na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
K03psp_5u:2654: sarvadharmān na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ. sa evaṃ paśyan na kvacid dharmaniketaṃ karoti,
K03psp_5u:2655: sa yathā vādī tathā kārī ca bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2656: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2657: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2660: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2661: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:2662: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2664: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ
K03psp_5u:2665: pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ
K03psp_5u:2666: dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc caitasa
K03psp_5u:2667: ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
K03psp_5u:2668: viharati. prīteś ca virāgād upekṣako viharati,
K03psp_5u:2669: smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃ sukhaṃ ca kāye na pratisaṃvedayati yat tad āryā ācakṣate upeksakaḥ
K03psp_5u:2670: smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sukhasya ca prahāṇāt
K03psp_5u:2671: duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduṣkhāsukham
K03psp_5u:2673: caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. evam ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattim
K03psp_5u:2675: tatra dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito 'vikṣiptamānasas teṣāṃ sattvānām āmiṣadānaṃ dharmadānaṃ ca dadāti,
K03psp_5u:2678: ye 'pi cānye āmiṣadānaṃ dharmadānañ ca dadāti,
K03psp_5u:2679: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty,
K03psp_5u:2680: anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2681: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2684: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2686: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2688: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitasya na rāgasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate,
K03psp_5u:2692: anyatra sarvākārajñatā pratisaṃyuktair manasikārair viaharati tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ
K03psp_5u:2693: na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ
K03psp_5u:2694: sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati tathā ca pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2698: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2700: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2702: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ phenapiṇḍopamaṃ rūpaṃ pratyavekṣate,
K03psp_5u:2706: māyopamaṃ vijñānaṃ pratyavekṣate. tasyaivaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasya pañcaskandheṣv asārakasaṃjñā pratyupasthitā bhavati, tasyaivaṃ (PSP_5:95)
K03psp_5u:2715: ākruṣyamāṇasya vā paribhāṣyamāṇasya vā na vyāpāda utpadyate. sa tat kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2716: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2719: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2721: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2723: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalamūlair
K03psp_5u:2724: dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
K03psp_5u:2725: viharati. vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam
K03psp_5u:2726: avicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. prīteś ca virāgād upekṣako viharati,
K03psp_5u:2727: smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃ sukhañ ca kāye na pratisaṃvedayati,
K03psp_5u:2729: upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sukhasya ca
K03psp_5u:2730: prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduḥkhāsukham
K03psp_5u:2732: sa dhyānānāṃ dhyānāṅgānāṃ nimittaṃ na gṛhṇāti,
K03psp_5u:2735: yāvad divyena śrotradhātunā ubhau śabdau śṛṇoti divyañ ca mānuṣyakañ ca,
K03psp_5u:2736: sa parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ prajānāti,
K03psp_5u:2737: vistareṇa yāvad anuttaraṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāty,
K03psp_5u:2739: vistareṇa yāvad divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakena yāvad yathākarmopagān sattvān paśyati,
K03psp_5u:2740: sa iha pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāya buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ gacchati,
K03psp_5u:2741: buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste paripṛcchati paripraśnīkaroti kuśalamūlāny avaropayati,
K03psp_5u:2743: ca kuśalamulāni na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty,
K03psp_5u:2744: anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2745: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2748: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2750: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2752: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito rūpaṃ nopalabhate,
K03psp_5u:2771: anutpādayamāno na nirodhayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:2772: tathā hi subhūte utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā sā naivotpadyate na
K03psp_5u:2773: so 'vikṣiptacittasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair avirahito bhavati. tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K03psp_5u:2774: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2777: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2778: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:2779: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
K03psp_5u:2781: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti samanupaśyati. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti samanupaśyati?
K03psp_5u:2782: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatādhyātmaśūnyateti nopalabhate,
K03psp_5u:2784: yāvad abhāvaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateti nopalabhate. sa āsu śūnyatāsu sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpan nopalabhate śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam iti vā,
K03psp_5u:2786: vijñānaṃ nopalabhate śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam iti vā,
K03psp_5u:2787: skandhadhātvāyatanāni nopalabhate śūnyānīti vā aśūnyānīti vā,
K03psp_5u:2788: pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā nopalabhate śūnyānīti vā aśūnyānīti vā,
K03psp_5u:2789: sarvapāramitā nopalabhate śūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
K03psp_5u:2790: smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā nopalabhate śūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
K03psp_5u:2791: āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo nopalabhate sūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
K03psp_5u:2793: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni nopalabhate śūnyānīti vā aśūnyānīti vā,
K03psp_5u:2794: abhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmā nopalabhate śūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
K03psp_5u:2795: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir nopalabhate śūnyeti vā aśūnyeti vā,
K03psp_5u:2796: saṃskṛto vā dhātur asaṃskṛto vā dhātur nopalabhate śūnya iti vā aśūnya iti vā. sa
K03psp_5u:2797: iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadyad eva dānan dadāty annaṃ
K03psp_5u:2798: vā pānaṃ vā śayanaṃ vā āvasathaṃ vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ vā vastraṃ vā
K03psp_5u:2799: suvarṇaṃ vā rūpyaṃ vā maṇimuktāśaṅkhaśilāpravālādīni vā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapaṭākā
K03psp_5u:2800: vā yāvad anyatarānyatarāṇi mānuṣyakāṇi pariṣkāropakaraṇāni dadāti. sa tad dānaṃ śūnyam
K03psp_5u:2802: yo vā dadāti yasyaivā dadāti tad api śūnyam iti aśūnyam iti nopalabhate,
K03psp_5u:2803: tasya mātsaryacittasya codgrahacittasya vāvakāśo na bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:2804: sarva ete dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya (PSP_5:98)
K03psp_5u:2806: prathamacittotpadam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya yathā caiva tathāgatasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya na mātsaryacittaṃ vodgrahacittaṃ
K03psp_5u:2807: tathaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato mātsaryacittaṃ vā udgrahacittaṃ vā nopapadyate,
K03psp_5u:2808: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śāstā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_5u:2809: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2810: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2813: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2815: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2817: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsatttvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmicittānām avakāśaṃ dadāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:2820: yac chrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2826: ye 'pi cānye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_5u:2827: evam adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādāt paruṣavacanāt piśunavacanād abaddhapralāpād
K03psp_5u:2832: ye 'pi cānye mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. tena ca śīlena na kaścid dharmaṃ parāmṛśati śrāvakatvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhatvaṃ vā,
K03psp_5u:2833: prāg evānyad vā tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2834: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2837: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2839: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2841: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitasyānulomikī kṣāntir utpadyate,
K03psp_5u:2843: iha na kaścid dharma utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā mriyate vā ākruṣyate vā paribhāṣyate
K03psp_5u:2844: vā cchidyate vā bhidyate vā hanyate vā tasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya
K03psp_5u:2845: yadi sarvasattvā āgamyākroṣayur vā paribhāṣeran vā loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān dadyuś
K03psp_5u:2849: na iha kaścid dharma ākruṣyate vā paribhāṣyate vā cchidyate vā bhidyate vā hanyate vā,
K03psp_5u:2850: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2851: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2854: kutra vā parinamayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2856: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigarhnāti?
K03psp_5u:2858: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā caturbhir ṛddhipādair
K03psp_5u:2859: upāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ kāyikañ ca caitasikañ ca vīryaṃ saṃjanayyānyaṃ lokadhātum api gatvā,
K03psp_5u:2861: lokadhātusahasram api gatvā lokadhātuśatasahasram api gatvā lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasram api gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati. dānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:2874: nāsaṃskṛte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayati tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattveṣu (PSP_5:100)
K03psp_5u:2880: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_5u:2882: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K03psp_5u:2884: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā,
K03psp_5u:2886: yāvantaḥ kecit samādhayaḥ śrāvakasamādhir vā pratyekabuddhasamādhir vā tān sarvān samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca,
K03psp_5u:2887: samādhau sthitvā aṣṭau vimokṣān anulomaṃ pratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca. katamān aṣṭau vimokṣān?
K03psp_5u:2888: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhārūpāṇi paśyaty,
K03psp_5u:2889: ayaṃ prathamo vimokṣaḥ. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhārūpāṇi paśyaty ayaṃ dvitīyo
K03psp_5u:2890: vimokṣaḥ. śūnyatvenādhimuktaḥ śūnyatve cādhimukto bhavaty ayaṃ tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ. sukhasya
K03psp_5u:2891: ca prahāṇād duṣkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād
K03psp_5u:2892: aduṣkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvaśo
K03psp_5u:2893: rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamād nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād
K03psp_5u:2894: anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
K03psp_5u:2895: ayaṃ caturtho vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
K03psp_5u:2896: ayaṃ pañcamo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramād ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
K03psp_5u:2897: ayaṃ ṣaṣṭho vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanasamatikramād naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
K03psp_5u:2898: ayaṃ saptamo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamatikramāt saṃjñāvedayitanirodham upasaṃpadya viharaty,
K03psp_5u:2899: ayam aṣṭamo vimokṣaḥ. itīmān aṣṭau vimokṣān anulomaṃ pratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca,
K03psp_5u:2900: tatra samādhau sthitvā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiīr anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca. katamā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr?
K03psp_5u:2901: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ (PSP_5:101)
K03psp_5u:2902: savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_5u:2903: vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_5u:2904: prīteś ca virāgād upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan sukhaṃ kāye na pratisaṃvedayate,
K03psp_5u:2906: upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sukhasya
K03psp_5u:2907: ca prahāṇād duṣkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād
K03psp_5u:2908: aduṣkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhiṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvaśo
K03psp_5u:2909: rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamād nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād
K03psp_5u:2910: anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād
K03psp_5u:2911: anantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramād
K03psp_5u:2912: nāsti kiṃcid ity ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanasamatikramād
K03psp_5u:2913: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamatikrayāt
K03psp_5u:2914: saṃjñāvedayitanirodhasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati. evam imā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr
K03psp_5u:2916: imān aṣṭa vimokṣān imāś ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr vibhaṅgaṃ kṛtvā imaṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate,
K03psp_5u:2917: tatra ca samādhau sthitvā dvādaśāṅgapratītyasamutpādam anulomapratilomaṃ pratyavekṣate. katamāni dvādaśāṅgāni?
K03psp_5u:2918: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti pratyavekṣate,
K03psp_5u:2919: evaṃ saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamb nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ,
K03psp_5u:2926: jarāmaraṇapratyayāḥ śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā iti pratyavekṣate. evam asya
K03psp_5u:2927: kevalasya mahato duṣkhaskandhasya loke samudayo bhavatīti pratyavekṣate. jarāmaraṇe
K03psp_5u:2928: tasminn asati śokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā na bhavantīti pratyavekṣate,
K03psp_5u:2929: evaṃ jātāv asatyāṃ jarāmaraṇan na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2933: na bhavati, vedanāyam asatyāṃ tṛṣṇā na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2939: avidyāyām asatyāṃ saṃskārā na bhavantīti pratyavekṣate. evam asya kevalasya mahatā
K03psp_5u:2940: duṣkhaskandhasya loke nirodho bhavatīti pratyavekṣate. evam imaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyasamutpādam
K03psp_5u:2942: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:2943: ko vā pariṇāmayati kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:2944: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. ity ukto darśanamārgaḥ
K03psp_5u:2945: katamaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya siṃhavijṛmbhitaḥ samādhir?
K03psp_5u:2946: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ
K03psp_5u:2947: savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
K03psp_5u:2949: tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_5u:2950: ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattin naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_5u:2957: caturthād dhyānād vyutthāya tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
K03psp_5u:2958: tṛtīyād dhyānād vyutthāya dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
K03psp_5u:2959: dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthāya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate. sa imaṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ
K03psp_5u:2960: samādhiṃ vibhaṅgaṃ kṛtvāvaskandakaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate. katamaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasya
K03psp_5u:2962: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ (PSP_5:103)
K03psp_5u:2963: pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_5u:2964: prathamād dhyānād vyutthito dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_5u:2965: dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthitas tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_5u:2966: tṛtīyād dhyānād vyutthitaś caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_5u:2967: caturthyād dhyānād vyutthita ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati,
K03psp_5u:2971: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatter vyutthitaḥ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati. nirodhasamāpatter vyutthitaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
K03psp_5u:2973: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthito nirodhasamāpittiṃ samāpadyate,
K03psp_5u:2986: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatānasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty,
K03psp_5u:3005: prathamād dhyānād vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhati. sa ihāvaskandake samādhau sthitvā sarvadharmasamatām anuprāpnoti,
K03psp_5u:3006: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_5u:3007: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K03psp_5u:3010: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vaskandakasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
K03psp_5u:3013: bahuṣu sthāneṣu śikṣitavyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kvacic chikṣitavyam.
K03psp_5u:3016: bahuṣu sthāneṣu śikṣitavyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kvacic chikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3017: tathā hi te dharmā nopalabhyante yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam.
K03psp_5u:3018: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:3019: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena me saṃkṣiptena ca vistareṇa ca dharmā bhāṣitāḥ,
K03psp_5u:3020: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmenemāḥ ṣaṭ
K03psp_5u:3021: pāramitāḥ saṃkṣiptena ca vistareṇa ca paryavāptavyāḥ paryavāpya yāvad vācā parijitāḥ
K03psp_5u:3022: kartavyā yāvad vācā parijitāḥ kṛtvā manasā pratyavekṣitavyā,
K03psp_5u:3023: tathā ca cittacetasikā dharmā na pravartante,
K03psp_5u:3024: asmin punaḥ saṃkṣepavistare śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṇnāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāñ ca saṃkṣepavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
K03psp_5u:3029: rūpasya vā vedanāyā vā saṃjñāyā vā saṃskārāṇāṃ vā vijñānasya vā saṃkṣiptavistarañ
K03psp_5u:3030: ca tathatāṃ jānānaḥ. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ
K03psp_5u:3032: evaṃ sarvapāramitānāṃ vā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhānāṃ
K03psp_5u:3034: vā sarvākārajñatāyā vā saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ tathatāṃ jānānaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3040: na sthitir nānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate iyaṃ sā tathatā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K03psp_5u:3041: śikṣitavyam. evaṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
K03psp_5u:3045: akoṭir bhūtakoṭir atra koṭyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati,
K03psp_5u:3046: evaṃ dharmadhātuṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
K03psp_5u:3050: ākāśadhātur dharmadhātur yasya dhātor na cchedaḥ prajñāyate na paricchedaḥ. evaṃ ca dharmadhātuṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
K03psp_5u:3054: yathā sarvadharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ.
K03psp_5u:3056: katame bhagavan sarvadharmā ye na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ?
K03psp_5u:3061: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca na saṃyuktāni na (PSP_5:106)
K03psp_5u:3063: evaṃ yāvat saṃskṛto dhātur asaṃskṛto dhatur na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3064: na hy asyāsti svabhāvo yaḥ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā yaś cāsvabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo,
K03psp_5u:3065: yaś cābhāvaḥ so 'bhāvena sārdhaṃ na saṃyukto na visaṃyukta,
K03psp_5u:3068: ayaṃ punar bhagavann abhisaṃkṣepo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyātra hi bhagavann abhisaṃkṣepapāramitāyām ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K03psp_5u:3070: ihaiva punar abhisaṃkṣepe śikṣimāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣepavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
K03psp_5u:3075: kasyacin na praveśaḥ śikṣitukāmasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāyaṃ praveśo,
K03psp_5u:3076: na khalu kuśīdasyāyaṃ praveśo na hīnavīryasya muṣitasmṛter na vikṣiptacittasyāyaṃ
K03psp_5u:3077: praveśaḥ ārabdhavīryasyākuśīdasyopasthitasmṛter ayaṃ praveśaḥ śikṣitukāmasya cāvinivartanīyabhūmau
K03psp_5u:3078: sarvākārajñatām anuprāptukāmasya cāyaṃ praveśaḥ. iti saṃkṣepavistarājñānavikalpau
K03psp_5u:3079: saced yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate śikṣitvā dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitām
K03psp_5u:3084: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yāni kānicit mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante,
K03psp_5u:3086: tasmād upāyakauśalyaṃ parigṛhītukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:3087: caritavyam. yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
K03psp_5u:3089: tasmin samaye 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ (PSP_5:107)
K03psp_5u:3090: ca deśayanti te taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3091: ato nirjātā hi subhūte 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto yad uta ṣaḍbhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3092: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam,
K03psp_5u:3093: aham apy enān dharmān anuprāpsyāmi ye tair atītānāgatapratyutpannair buddhair bhagavadbhir
K03psp_5u:3094: anuprāptāḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ yogam āpattavyam,
K03psp_5u:3095: evaṃ prayujyamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
K03psp_5u:3096: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāvirahitena
K03psp_5u:3097: bhavitavyam. sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyām
K03psp_5u:3099: sa khhalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutarapuṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
K03psp_5u:3100: na tv eva ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva dānena saṃtarpayec
K03psp_5u:3101: chīle pratiṣṭhāpayet kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayed vīrye pratiṣṭhāpayet samādhau pratiṣṭhāpayet
K03psp_5u:3102: prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktau pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayet,
K03psp_5u:3103: srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3105: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ. ye 'pi
K03psp_5u:3106: te buddhā bhagavanto daśadiglokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K03psp_5u:3107: te 'pito nirjātā yad uta prajñāpāramitātaḥ. ye 'pi te subhūte ' tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantas te 'pīta eva prabhāvitā yad uta prajñāpāramitātaḥ.
K03psp_5u:3108: punar aparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo muhūrtaṃ vā divasaṃ vā divasaśataṃ
K03psp_5u:3109: vā saṃvatsaraṃ vā saṃvatsaraśataṃ vā kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā yāvad asaṃkhyeyān api
K03psp_5u:3110: kalpāni māṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair bhāvayiṣyati,
K03psp_5u:3111: sa bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati. na tv eva ye gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu
K03psp_5u:3112: sattvās tān kaścid eva dānena saṃtarpayec chīle kṣāntau vīrye samādhau prajñāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:3119: ato nirjātā hi te buddhā bhagavanto yair idaṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastuprajñāptaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3122: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prajñāptam.
K03psp_5u:3124: yaḥ punar aparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3125: sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. tathāgatasamanvāgataḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3126: upāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bahubuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparyupāsitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. avaropitakuśalamūlaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3128: ṣaṭpāramitāvatīrṇaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. viṃśatiśūnyatābhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3134: kumārabhūtaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. abhiprāyaparipūrṇaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3136: kuśalamūlair avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. anākṣiptapratibhānaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3137: dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. rūpapariniṣpattis tasya pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
K03psp_5u:3138: vyākaraṇasaṃpanno gotrasaṃpannaḥ saṃcintyabhavaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
K03psp_5u:3142: vedanākuśalaḥ saṃjñākuśalaḥ saṃskārakuśalo vijñānakuśalaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgakuśalo (PSP_5:109)
K03psp_5u:3155: sarvākārajñatā manasikārakuśalaḥ. rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam iti kuśalaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3163: bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ iti kuśalaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3170: aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā aṣṭādaśāveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā iti kuśalaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3190: itīme 'nuśaṃsāḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ.
K03psp_5u:3199: rūpaśāntatayā subhūte rūpavaśikatayā rūpatucchatayā rūpāsāratayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3213: kiyac ciraṃ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cīrṇo bhavati?
K03psp_5u:3222: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃś cittāntarānām avakāśan dadatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam?
K03psp_5u:3224: anyeṣāṃ subhūte manasikārāṇām avakāśam adadatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3229: tathā ca caritavyā tathā cābhinirhartavyā tathā ca bhāvayitavyā,
K03psp_5u:3232: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitām abhinirharan prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
K03psp_5u:3263: yathātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātur jantudhātuḥ poṣadhātuḥ puruṣadhātuḥ pudgaladhātuḥ.
K03psp_5u:3265: kathaṃ bhagavan tathatā bhūtakoṭidharmadhātur ātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātur jantudhātuḥ poṣadhātuḥ puruṣadhātuḥ pudgaladhātuḥ?
K03psp_5u:3268: subhūte api nu sa ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poso vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā upalabhyate.
K03psp_5u:3272: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte ātmānaṃ vā sattvaṃ vā jīvaṃ vā jantuṃ vā poṣaṃ vā puruṣaṃ vā pudgalaṃ vā,
K03psp_5u:3273: kathaṃ sattvadhātuṃ vā yāvat pudgaladhātuṃ vā prajñāpayiṣyati. evaṃ prajñāpāramitām apy aprajñapayamānaḥ sarvadharmān apy aprajñapayamānaḥ sarvākārajñatām
K03psp_5u:3283: yāvat sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vāsaṃskṛtā vā śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā yāvad buddhadharmā vā.
K03psp_5u:3291: srotaāpannā vā sakṛdāgāmino vānāgāmino vārhanto vā pratyekabuddhā vā samyaksaṃbuddhā vā prajñāyante.
K03psp_5u:3298: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte sattvaṃ kuto nārakaṃ prajñāpayiṣyati tiryagyonigatān,
K03psp_5u:3299: yamalokaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā devaṃ vā srotaāpannān vā sakṛdāgāmino vā anāgāmino vā arhato vā pratyekabuddhān vā samyaksaṃbuddhān vā kutaḥ prajñāpayiṣyati?
K03psp_5u:3300: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāprajñapanīyeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam. iti sattvaprajñāptivikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:3302: na nu bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3341: kathaṃ bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti śikṣitavyam?
K03psp_5u:3346: evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo,
K03psp_5u:3348: evaṃ rūpaṃ śabdagandharasasparṣṭavyadharmāḥ śabdagandharasasparṣṭavyadharmaiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ,
K03psp_5u:3352: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśena śūnyo draṣṭavyaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3353: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayayā vedanayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā,
K03psp_5u:3358: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayayā vedanayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā,
K03psp_5u:3363: bahirdhāśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā,
K03psp_5u:3382: āveṇikā buddhadharmā āveṇikaiḥ buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ,
K03psp_5u:3383: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā śūnyā draṣṭavyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu
K03psp_5u:3387: vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. evaṃ yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā śūnyā. tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carir bhavati?
K03psp_5u:3393: tathā hi subhūte sā prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate,
K03psp_5u:3399: tad api nopalabhyate. evaṃ hi subhūte acarir bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitācarir yatraite sarvaprapañcā nopalabhyante.
K03psp_5u:3401: yadi bhagavan na cariḥ prajñāpāramitācarir bhavati,
K03psp_5u:3402: tat kathaṃ bhagavann ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam?
K03psp_5u:3404: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāyānupalambheṣu sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3414: smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayatānupalambhayogena smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayi tavyāni. evaṃ
K03psp_5u:3422: āveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayatānupalambhayogena āveṇikā buddhadharmā bhāvayitavyāḥ,
K03psp_5u:3431: kiyatā bhagavan dvayaṃ vā advayaṃ vā bhavati?
K03psp_5u:3438: na bodhiś ca na buddhaś ca,
K03psp_5u:3447: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte upalambhānupalabdhisamatānupalambhaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte
K03psp_5u:3448: bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānupalambhasamatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo
K03psp_5u:3451: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naivopalambhe sajjati nānupalambhe,
K03psp_5u:3452: kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmiḥ paripūrayitavyā,
K03psp_5u:3455: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upalambhe sthitvā bhūmer bhūmiṃ paripūrayati,
K03psp_5u:3456: na copalarabhe sthitvā śaktyā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmiṃ paripūrayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3459: so 'pi nopalabhyate yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ caritavyam. iti śaktivikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:3461: yadi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate. tat kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ caratā dharmeṣu pravicayaḥ kartavyaḥ?
K03psp_5u:3479: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tathā dharmeṣu pravicayaṃ karoti,
K03psp_5u:3493: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran rūpaṃ nopalabhate,
K03psp_5u:3496: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhin nopalabhate. tat kathaṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrya śīlapāramitāṃ
K03psp_5u:3497: paripūrya kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrya vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrya dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrya
K03psp_5u:3501: sattvān paripācya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati,
K03psp_5u:3505: na subhūte bodhisattvo rūpasya kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_5u:3506: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
K03psp_5u:3508: na skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ na pratītyasamutpādasya na pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_5u:3510: na śūnyatāmukhānāṃ na bodhipakṣyānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtena,
K03psp_5u:3515: kasyedānīṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K03psp_5u:3517: na kasyacit kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3518: tathā hi subhūte 'kṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
K03psp_5u:3520: bodhisattvo 'py akṛto 'vikṛto 'nabhisaṃskṛtaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam akṛtāvikṛtānabhisaṃskṛtānabhisaṃskārayogena.
K03psp_5u:3523: yadi bhagavann akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
K03psp_5u:3524: kathaṃ yeṣāṃ bhagavaṃs trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati?
K03psp_5u:3527: na subhūte 'kṛtānām avikṛtānām anabhisaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kiṃcid vyavasthānam upalabhyate,
K03psp_5u:3528: anabhisaṃskṛtānām anabhisaṃcetayitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ ca nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3550: bodhipakṣyān dharmān manyate bodhipakṣyān dharmān upalabhate,
K03psp_5u:3557: bodhiṃ manyate bodhim upalabhate. tasyaivaṃ bhavaty,
K03psp_5u:3559: ahaṃ sattvān parimocayiṣyāmi saṃsārataḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3560: tathā hi subhūte yad buddhena pañcabhiś cakṣurbhir nopalabdhaṃ rūpaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3569: tatsamohapuruṣo buddhvā vākhyāya sattvān icchati saṃsārāt parimocayitum.
K03psp_5u:3570: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:3572: tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena pañcabhiś cakṣurbhir nopalabdhās te sattvā yān
K03psp_5u:3573: āsaṃsārāt parimocayed iti. tat katham idānīṃ bhagavatānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
K03psp_5u:3574: sattvās triṣu rāśiṣu vyākṛtāḥ samyaktvaniyatā vā mithyātvaniyatā vāniyatā vā?
K03psp_5u:3576: na mayā subhūte 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya kathaṃcid api sattva upalabdhaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3578: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ya ime sattvā adravye dravyasaṃjñinas tāṃs tato abhūtagrahād dhārayāmi lokavyavahāreṇa naḥ punaḥ paramārthena.
K03psp_5u:3580: na punar bhagavatā paramārthe sthitvā bodhir abhisaṃbuddhā?
K03psp_5u:3583: yadi bhagavatā naiva paramārthe sthitvānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
K03psp_5u:3585: katham idānīṃ bhagavatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhir abhisaṃbuddhā bhavati?
K03psp_5u:3588: sā ca na kvacit sthitā saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmito na kvacit sthitaḥ saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau,
K03psp_5u:3589: sa ca tathāgatanirmito gacchati cāgacchati ca tiṣṭhati ca niṣīdati ca,
K03psp_5u:3597: caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhiś caturbhiḥ
K03psp_5u:3598: smṛtyupasthānaiś caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhir ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir indriyaiḥ
K03psp_5u:3599: pañcabhir balaiḥ saptabhir bodhyaṅgair āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa śūnyatāsamādhinā animittasamādhināpraṇihitasamādhinā (PSP_5:121)
K03psp_5u:3601: aṣṭavimokṣair navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś
K03psp_5u:3602: catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā samādhidhāraṇīmukhair aṣṭādaśabhir
K03psp_5u:3604: sa ca nirmito 'parimāṇān sattvān abhinirmāya triṣu rāśiṣu vyākuryāt. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_5u:3605: subhūte 'pi nu tena kaścit sattvas triṣu rāśiṣu vyākṛtaḥ.
K03psp_5u:3609: evam eva subhūte tathāgatena sarvadharmā nirmitopamā jñātā,
K03psp_5u:3610: na ca kaścit sattvo vinītaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
K03psp_5u:3617: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā nirmitopamās tathāgatasya nirmitasya ca kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ?
K03psp_5u:3620: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:3621: tathāgatasya ca subhūte nirmitasya ca na kaścid viśeṣo,
K03psp_5u:3623: nirviśeṣaḥ subhūte tathāgataś ca nirmitaś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3624: tathā hi yat tathāgataḥ karma karoti,
K03psp_5u:3627: kaccit punar bhagavan na sati tathāgate nirmitaḥ karma karoti?
K03psp_5u:3631: kathaṃ yathā punar bhagavan na sati tathāgate tathāgatanirmitaḥ karma karoti?
K03psp_5u:3633: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sacet tathāgato bhavyasattvam anupalabhamāno nirmitan nirmāya parinirvṛtaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3634: tena ca nirmitenārdhakalpaṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ sa paścād buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā parinirvṛta iti janaḥ saṃjānīte,
K03psp_5u:3635: na ca nirmitānāṃ kaścid utpādo na nirvāṇam. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ, (PSP_5:122)
K03psp_5u:3636: yad uta nirmitopamān sarvadharmān adhimucyate. iti yānatrayavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:3638: yadi bhagavan nirmitasya tathāgatasya ca viśeṣo nāsti dakṣiṇā pariśuddhiḥ kathaṃ bhaviṣyati?
K03psp_5u:3639: ya ime bhagavaṃs tathāgate dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti,
K03psp_5u:3640: sā na jātu kṣīyate yāvat te sattvā anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyante,
K03psp_5u:3641: evam eva ye nirmite dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti,
K03psp_5u:3642: sā na jātu kṣīyate yāvat te sattvā anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyanti.
K03psp_5u:3644: yayā subhūte dharmatayā tathāgataḥ sadevakasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyo bhavati,
K03psp_5u:3645: tayaiva dharmatayā nirmito 'pi sadevasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyaḥ. tiṣṭhatu tāvat subhūte tathāgatapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā,
K03psp_5u:3646: tiṣṭhatu nirmitapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā yaḥ kaścit subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataṃ maitratayā manasikariṣyati,
K03psp_5u:3647: sarvo 'sau tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya duṣkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati. tiṣṭhatu
K03psp_5u:3648: maitraṃ vā manasikāro yaḥ kaścit subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ākāśe puṣpāṇi
K03psp_5u:3649: kṣepsyati tathāgataṃ manasikṛtvā sarvo 'sau tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya
K03psp_5u:3652: tiṣṭhatv ākāśe puṣpāṇi yaḥ kaścit subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā namo buddhānām iti manasikariṣyati,
K03psp_5u:3653: sarvo 'sāv anupūrveṇa duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati. evaṃ maharddhikā subhūte tathāgatapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā,
K03psp_5u:3655: tad anena te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3656: tathāgatasya ca tathāgatanirmitasya ca na kiṃcit nānākaraṇam upalabhyate dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtyam. iti dakṣiṇāviśuddhivikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:3657: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3661: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyā iyaṃ dānapāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyā,
K03psp_5u:3662: evaṃ yāvat sarvadharmeṣv ime sarvadharmā iyaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmateti na vikopayitavyā.
K03psp_5u:3664: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāṇān dharmatā na vikopayitavyā,
K03psp_5u:3665: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena vikopitaṃ rūpam idam,
K03psp_5u:3676: evaṃ kuśalā dharmā evam akuśalā dharmāḥ sāsravā anāsravā laukikā lokottarās sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇāḥ saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtā dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
K03psp_5u:3677: tan mā haiva bhagavatā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā vikopitā bhavet?
K03psp_5u:3679: nāmanimittā hi te dharmā nirdiṣṭā dharmāṇāṃ sūcanakṛtā,
K03psp_5u:3680: kathaṃ paro 'vatariṣyatiti na dharmāṇān dharmatā vikopitā bhavet.
K03psp_5u:3682: yadi bhagavan nāmanimittā hi te dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ pareṣām avatāraṇāya,
K03psp_5u:3683: kathaṃ bhagavarm anāmakā animittāḥ sarvadharmā nāma nimittena vyāhṛtāḥ?
K03psp_5u:3687: na subhūte vyavahāro nāmanimittam abhiniveśo vā nātra subhūte nāmni vyavaharāmi,
K03psp_5u:3688: na nimitte 'nimitte 'bhiniveśo vā. na hi subhūte tathāgataśrāvako vā nāmni nimitte vābhiniviśate. na hi subhūte nāma nāmny abhiniviśate,
K03psp_5u:3698: na hy ete nāmamātre 'vatiṣṭhante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmamātre sthitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3702: kasyedānīṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhaye cittam utpādyānekavidhāṃ saṃsāracārikāṃ pratyanubhavati,
K03psp_5u:3725: tat kasyedānīṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhaye cittam utpādyānekavidhāṃ saṃsāracārikāṃ pratyanubhavatīti,
K03psp_5u:3727: tac ca nāma nāmnā śūnyaṃ nimittaṃ nimittena śūnyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3728: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
K03psp_5u:3730: dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvāṃs tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāpayati,
K03psp_5u:3731: tasya ca nāmanimittasya notpādo na nirodho na sthitir na sthiter anyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
K03psp_5u:3738: kathaṃ punar bhagavan sarvākārajñatā tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā,
K03psp_5u:3741: āsāṃ bhagavaṃs tisṛṇāṃ sarvajñatānāṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇam?
K03psp_5u:3747: kena kāraṇena bhagavan sarvākārajñatā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya?
K03psp_5u:3749: yāvantaḥ subhūte ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittais te dharmāḥ sūcyante,
K03psp_5u:3750: te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tathāgatenānubaddhāni tenocyate tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvākārajñatā. iti sarvākārajñatāsaṃmohavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:3752: kena kāraṇena bhagavan mārgajñatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām?
K03psp_5u:3758: ye ca bodhimārgās te ca mārgāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ taiś ca mārge mārgakaraṇīyaṃ kartavyan na cānena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā.
K03psp_5u:3760: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭir na sākṣātkartavyā?
K03psp_5u:3762: nāparipūrya praṇidhānaṃ nāparipācya sattvān nāpariśodhya buddhakṣetran tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā,
K03psp_5u:3763: tena kāraṇenocyate bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgajñatā. iti mārgākārajñatāsaṃmohavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:3767: etāvad eva subhūte sarvaṃ yāvad evādhyātmikāś ca bāhyāś ca dharmās te ca sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair jñātā,
K03psp_5u:3768: na punaḥ sarvamārgeṇa sarvākāreṇa. iti sarvajñatāsaṃmohavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:3770: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārge sthitvā bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā?
K03psp_5u:3782: tat katham idānīṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā?
K03psp_5u:3785: subhūte api nu tava mārge sthitasyānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktam.
K03psp_5u:3800: api tu khalu punar me bhagavaṃś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ yathā na kvacit sthitvā syām.
K03psp_5u:3802: evam etat subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kvacit sthitvā bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā.
K03psp_5u:3804: yāḥ punar imā bhagavan sarvākārajñatā ca mārgajñatā ca sarvajñatā ca kaccid bhagavann āsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ sarvajñatānāṃ kleśaprahāṇasya nānātvam asti,
K03psp_5u:3812: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvajñatāyām anuprāptāyām aśeṣaprahāṇam asaṃskṛtaṃ bhavati?
K03psp_5u:3816: kiṃ punar bhagavann asaṃskṛtasya nānātvam upalabhyate?
K03psp_5u:3830: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:3834: ayaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yan tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
K03psp_5u:3836: na khalu subhūte asaṃskṛtaṃ bhāvayati api tu lokavyavahāraṃ pramāṇīkṛtyocyate na punaḥ paramārthena śakyā prabhāvanā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3838: api tu khalu punar yaiḥ pūrvānto vyavacchinnas teṣāṃ paścimā koṭiprajñāptā.
K03psp_5u:3844: svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ pūrvā koṭir na prajñāyate,
K03psp_5u:3847: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ye te sattvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān na jānanti,
K03psp_5u:3848: teṣām evaṃ nirdiṣṭam iyaṃ pūrvā koṭir iyaṃ paścimā koṭir,
K03psp_5u:3849: na punaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu pūrvā koṭir na paścimā koṭir upalabhyate,
K03psp_5u:3850: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3851: svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu caran na kvacid abhiniviśate 'dhyātmikeṣu vā bāhyeṣu vā saṃskṛteṣu vāsaṃskṛteṣu vā śrāvakadharmeṣu vā pratyekabuddhadharmeṣu
K03psp_5u:3852: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:3856: paramapāramitaiṣā subhūte sarvadharmāṇām agamanārthena prajñāpāramitety ucyate. api
K03psp_5u:3857: tu khalu punaḥ subhūte etayā prajñāpāramitayā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāś
K03psp_5u:3858: ca mahāsattvās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pāraṅgatās tenārthena prajñāpāramitety
K03psp_5u:3859: ucyate. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte paramārthena yo 'rthaḥ sarvadharmāṇām abhinnaḥ,
K03psp_5u:3860: sa iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,
K03psp_5u:3861: sarvadharmeṣu pāro nopalabdhas tenārthenocyate prajñāpāramitā. iti mārgasaṃmohavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:3862: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathatāntargatā,
K03psp_5u:3864: dharmadhātur antargataḥ tenocyate prajñāpāramiteti. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte neyaṃ
K03psp_5u:3865: prajñāpāramitā kenacid dharmeṇa saṃyuktā vā visaṃyuktā vā sanidarśanā vānidarśanā
K03psp_5u:3866: vā sapratighā vāpratighā vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3869: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ cārikā sarvapratibhānānāṃ
K03psp_5u:3870: sarvālokānām anācchedyeyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir devatābhiḥ
K03psp_5u:3873: yāvan na kenacid anyatīrthikaiḥ pratyamitrair vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śakyā cchettuṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3874: tathā hi te 'tra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nopalabhyante sarva evaivaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam. ity asamatvasaṃmohavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:3875: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattveneha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam anityārthe caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3883: duḥkhaparijñatārthe samudayaprahāṇārthe nirodhasākṣātkriyārthe mārgajñatārthe anvayajñānārthe caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3885: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam.
K03psp_5u:3887: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:3888: yadi bhagavann iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthaś cānarthaś ca nopalabhyate,
K03psp_5u:3889: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattveneha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam?
K03psp_5u:3891: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena gambhīre 'rthe prajñāpāramitārthe carataivaṃ caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3897: idaṃ dṛṣṭigato me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3898: na hi rāgadveṣamohānāṃ tathatā kasyacid artham anarthaṃ karoti,
K03psp_5u:3899: na dṛṣṭigatānāṃ tathatā kasyacid artham anarthaṃ karoti. rūpaṃ me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3902: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanāni me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3907: bodhipakṣyā me dharmā artho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3913: anuttarā me samyaksaṃbodhir artho 'nartha iti na caritavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3914: tathā hi subhūte tathāgatenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya na kaścid dharma upalabdho yo 'rthaṃ vā kuryād anarthaṃ vā kuryād,
K03psp_5u:3915: api nu khalu punaḥ subhūte utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā
K03psp_5u:3916: dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā sā naiva kasyacid arthaṃ
K03psp_5u:3918: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenārthānartho varjayitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
K03psp_5u:3919: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:3920: kena kāraṇena bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nānarthakarī nārthakarī?
K03psp_5u:3922: tathā hi subhūte saṃskṛtadharmāṇām asaṃskṛtadharmāṇām akāraṇaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_5u:3923: tena kāraṇena prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid arthaṃ vā karoty anarthaṃ vā.
K03psp_5u:3925: punar bhagavann asaṃskṛto 'rthaḥ sarvāryāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ vā.
K03psp_5u:3928: pratyupasthito na punar apakāreṇa vopakāreṇa vā,
K03psp_5u:3929: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśasya tathatā na kasyacid apakāreṇa vopakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitā,
K03psp_5u:3930: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasyāpakāreṇa vopakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitā.
K03psp_5u:3932: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃskṛtāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
K03psp_5u:3934: iha punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃskṛtāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
K03psp_5u:3945: yathā nādvayo na dvayo dharma upalabhyate.
K03psp_5u:3947: kathaṃ bhagavan nādvayo na dvayo dharma upalabhyate?
K03psp_5u:3949: anupalambhaṃ prati na rūpam anupalambhena prāpnoti,
K03psp_5u:3950: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān,
K03psp_5u:3951: na vijñānam anupalambhena prāpnoti. iti dvayābhāvasaṃmohavikalpaḥ
K03psp_5u:3953: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:3954: gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā duṣkarakārakā bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthitā na ca nāmasattva upalabhyate na sattvaprajñāptis,
K03psp_5u:3955: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum abhisaṃprasthitāḥ. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścid eva puruṣa ākāśe apratiṣṭhāne stambam icched dhāpayitum,
K03psp_5u:3956: evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtenecchet sarvākārajñatām anuprāptum.
K03psp_5u:3959: duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sarvākārajñatārtham abhipratiṣṭhante,
K03psp_5u:3960: tāñ ca sarvākārajñatām anubudhya sarvasattvān saṃsārāt parimocayiṣyanti. iti sarvākārajñatāyā abhāvālambanajñānam
K03psp_5u:3961: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣaḥ stambam icched vāpanāya sa ca puruṣas tasya stambasya na mūlaṃ jānīyād na śākhāṃ na tvacchedaṃ na pattraṃ na palāśaṃ na puṣpaṃ jānīyāt,
K03psp_5u:3962: sa tasya stambasya kāṇḍaṃ vāpayeta vāpayitvā kālena kālaṃ gopāyatodakaṃ dadyād arthaṃ tasya tat kāṇḍam anupūrveṇa śākhāsaṃpannañ ca bhavet,
K03psp_5u:3967: puṣpāṇi ca phalāni cānubhuñjīta. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ
K03psp_5u:3968: kṛtaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum abhisaṃprasthitā anupūrveṇa ṣaṭsu
K03psp_5u:3970: tataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ pattrapuṣpaphalopajīvyā bhavanti. tatredaṃ subhūte pattraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_5u:3971: mahāsattvānāṃ yad āgamya sattvās tribhyo 'pāyebhyaḥ parimucyante. tatredaṃ puṣpaṃ
K03psp_5u:3973: vā cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapadyante trayastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratisu
K03psp_5u:3975: tatredaṃ phalaṃ yad āgamya sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhante,
K03psp_5u:3980: tad eva ca phalam āgamya sattvāḥ sarvākārajñatam anuprāpnuvanti,
K03psp_5u:3982: tatra ye dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti te sarve 'nupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvānti,
K03psp_5u:3983: yad uta śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā,
K03psp_5u:3986: na ca sattvaprajñāptis te ca sattvā ātmagrāhataḥ parimocyante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:3987: na ceha kaścit sattvo vā sattvaprajñāptir vopalabhyate,
K03psp_5u:3988: yeṣāṃ sattvānām ahaṃkṛte na sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyāmīti.
K03psp_5u:3989: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:3990: tathāgata eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:3991: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sarvanarakā ucchidyante,
K03psp_5u:4000: tathāgata evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye nābhipratiṣṭhet,
K03psp_5u:4001: nātītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā nābhisaṃbhotsyante nābhisaṃbudhyante. na pratyekabuddhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_5u:4005: srotaāpannānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo na bhaviṣyati. na sarvanarakā ucchetsyante,
K03psp_5u:4008: na sarvahīnagatayo na kāmadhātur na rūpadhātur nārūpyadhātur ucchetsyati. api tu khalu punar bhagavan yāvat tathāgata eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K03psp_5u:4012: tathāgata eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4013: yayaiva hi subhūte tathatayā tathāgataḥ prajñapyate,
K03psp_5u:4016: tayaiva tathatayā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ prajñapyante,
K03psp_5u:4018: tayaiva tathatayā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca prajñapyante,
K03psp_5u:4019: evaṃ yāvat tayaiva tathatayā saṃskṛto dhātur asaṃskṛtaś ca dhātuḥ prajñapyate,
K03psp_5u:4020: tayaiva tathatayā sarvasattvatathatā tathāgatatathatā ca prajñapyate,
K03psp_5u:4021: tathāgatatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
K03psp_5u:4023: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgata eva veditavyaḥ tathatāṃ
K03psp_5u:4024: pramāṇīkṛtya. evaṃ khalu subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_5u:4028: praṇidhijñānaṃ paripūrya triṣv andhasu jñānaṃ viśodhayiṣyati,
K03psp_5u:4029: triṣv andhasu jñānaṃ viśodhya bodhisattvacaryā caran sattvānām arthaṃ kariṣyati,
K03psp_5u:4033: dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvās triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati,
K03psp_5u:4034: sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpyānupadhiśese nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayiṣyati. evaṃ
K03psp_5u:4035: khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaguṇānuśaṃsā saṃpaśyamānenātmanaś ca
K03psp_5u:4037: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4038: namaskaraṇīyā bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ caranti.
K03psp_5u:4042: namaskaraṇīyās te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ caranti.
K03psp_5u:4045: kiyat sa bhagavan prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K03psp_5u:4048: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4049: yāvantaḥ subhūte sāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān sarvān kvacid eva śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pratiṣṭhāpayed,
K03psp_5u:4050: api nu sa sattvo bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet?
K03psp_5u:4055: yac ca khalu subhūte sāhasre lokadhātau śrāvakayānikānāṃ sattvānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā puṇyakriyāvastu,
K03psp_5u:4057: tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puṇyakriyāvastunaḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
K03psp_5u:4058: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatataraīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api kotīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalān nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4060: na punaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaprasūto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. evaṃ yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śrāvakayānikānāṃ sattvānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā puṇyakriyāvastu,
K03psp_5u:4062: tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puṇyakriyāvastunaḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
K03psp_5u:4063: yāvat kotīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalān nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4065: na punaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaprasūto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. tiṣṭhantu śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4066: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramāhāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve śuklavidarśanābhūmau
K03psp_5u:4067: pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya
K03psp_5u:4071: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve gotrabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitā
K03psp_5u:4072: bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_5u:4073: śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti yāvat koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalān nopaiti. tiṣṭhantu
K03psp_5u:4076: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsahasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'ṣṭamakabhūmau
K03psp_5u:4077: pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya
K03psp_5u:4078: mahāsattvasya puṇyaskandhasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
K03psp_5u:4079: yāvat koṭīniyutasatasahasratamīm api kalān nopaiti. tiṣṭhantu 'ṣṭamakabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4080: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve darśanabhūmau
K03psp_5u:4081: pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya
K03psp_5u:4083: yāvat koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalān nopaiti. tiṣṭhantu darśanabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4084: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve tanubhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitā
K03psp_5u:4085: bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_5u:4089: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve vītarāgabhūmau
K03psp_5u:4090: pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya
K03psp_5u:4092: yāvat koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalān nopaiti. tiṣṭhantu vītarāgabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ
K03psp_5u:4093: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve kṛtāvibhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitā
K03psp_5u:4094: bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_5u:4096: yāvat koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalān nopaiti. tiṣṭhantu kṛtāvibhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4097: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve pratyekabuddhabhūmau
K03psp_5u:4098: pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya
K03psp_5u:4100: yāvat kotīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalān nopaiti. tiṣṭhantu pratyekabuddhabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4101: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve bodhisattvaniyāmāvakrāntau
K03psp_5u:4102: pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tad bodhisattvapratipannakasya puṇyasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
K03psp_5u:4103: yāvat koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalān nopaiti. tiṣṭḥantu bodhisattvaniyāmāvakrāntau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4105: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve bodhisattvapratipannakā bhaveyus,
K03psp_5u:4106: teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
K03psp_5u:4107: yāvat koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalān nopaiti. ity ānantaryasamādhiḥ
K03psp_5u:4109: prathamacittotpādikena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kiṃ manasikartavyam?
K03psp_5u:4111: prathamacittotpādikena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatā manasikartavyā.
K03psp_5u:4125: kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti. sarvākārajñatāyāḥ subhūte abhāva ārambaṇaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4129: sarvākārajñatāyāḥ subhūte idam ārambaṇam ayam adhipatir ayam ākāra idaṃ lakṣaṇam.
K03psp_5u:4137: evam adhyātmikā vā bāhyā dharmā abhāvaḥ?
K03psp_5u:4138: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni,
K03psp_5u:4143: sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
K03psp_5u:4144: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā prathamā
K03psp_5u:4145: abhijñā dvitīyā abhijñā tṛtīyā abhijñā caturthy abhijñā pañcamy abhijñā ṣaṣṭhy abhijñā
K03psp_5u:4154: sarvaśūnyatā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvida āveṇikabuddhadharmā api subhūte abhāvaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4156: saṃskṛto dhātur asaṃskṛto dhātur abhāvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4157: tathā hi subhūte tasyāḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti,
K03psp_5u:4158: yasya khalu punaḥ subhūte svabhāvo nāsti so 'bhāvaḥ.
K03psp_5u:4160: kena kāraṇena bhagavan sarvākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti?
K03psp_5u:4163: yasya subhūte sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvo nāsti so 'bhāvaḥ. anena subhūte paryāyeṇābhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ. ity ālambanopapattau vipratipattiḥ
K03psp_5u:4164: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte tathatāvitathatānanyatathatābhūtakoṭisvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4166: anenāpi subhūte paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyam abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
K03psp_5u:4167: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4169: katamenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahhāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_5u:4181: maitryāṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyām upekṣāyām ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattau vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattāv ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattau naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattau
K03psp_5u:4182: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūunyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_5u:4185: aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu dhāraṇīmukheṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu
K03psp_5u:4186: caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu sarvākārajñatāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_5u:4190: etad eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyaṃ veditavyaṃ yad abhāvasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu parijayaṃ karoti,
K03psp_5u:4193: tac ca buddhakṣetraṃ tāṃś ca sattvān abhāvasvabhāvān jānāti. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ karoti,
K03psp_5u:4194: śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ karoti,
K03psp_5u:4195: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ karoty,
K03psp_5u:4196: āryasatyeṣu caran śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhau caran maitrīkaraṇāmuditopekṣāsu caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ karoti,
K03psp_5u:4198: taṃ ca bodhimārgam abhāvasvabhāvaṃ jānāti. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ kurvan,
K03psp_5u:4200: caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā sarvākārajñatājñānena ca samanvāgato
K03psp_5u:4203: pāramitāḥ paripūrya sarvan tad ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
K03psp_5u:4206: sa buddhacakṣuṣā trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ vyavalokya bhāvam api nopalabhate
K03psp_5u:4207: prāg evābhāvam. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam
K03psp_5u:4208: abhāvasvabhāvaiḥ sarvadharmair idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4209: yad bhāva iti nopalabhyate prāg evābhāva iti. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti,
K03psp_5u:4210: sa tad dānam abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
K03psp_5u:4213: abhāva iti saṃjanīte. evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran,
K03psp_5u:4214: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tām api prajñāpāramitām abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
K03psp_5u:4215: yeṣāṃ prajñā bhāvyate tān apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
K03psp_5u:4216: yo 'pi bhāvayati tam apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte. evam adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ,
K03psp_5u:4219: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caraṃs tām apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
K03psp_5u:4220: yo 'py abhisaṃbudhyate tam apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
K03psp_5u:4221: yenāpy abhisaṃbudhyate tam apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4222: yathaiva hīyam abhāvasvabhāvā tathaiva sarvadhrmā abhāvasvabhāvās,
K03psp_5u:4223: te ca buddhair akṛtāḥ śrāvakair akārakāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4226: nanu bhagavan dharmair eva dharmā virahitāḥ?
K03psp_5u:4231: yadi bhagavan dharmair eva dharmā virahitāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4232: kathaṃ bhagavan virahito dharmo virahitaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte bhāvaṃ vā abhāvaṃ vā?
K03psp_5u:4233: na hi bhāvo dharmo bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte,
K03psp_5u:4234: na hy abhāvo dharmo 'bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte,
K03psp_5u:4235: na hi bhāvo dharmo 'bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte,
K03psp_5u:4236: na hy abhāvo dharmo bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte. evam asaṃjānāneṣu dharmeṣu kuta evaṃ bhavati?
K03psp_5u:4237: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāva iti vābhāva iti vā lokasaṃvṛtim upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhāva iti vābhāva iti vā nirdiśati,
K03psp_5u:4241: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyā lokasaṃvṛtir anyaḥ paramārthaḥ?
K03psp_5u:4244: yaiva lokasaṃvṛtes tathatā saiva paramārthasya tathatā,
K03psp_5u:4245: tān te sattvā evaṃtathatān na jānanti na paśyanti,
K03psp_5u:4246: teṣām arthāya lokasaṃvṛtyā nirdiśyate bhāva iti vābhāva iti vā. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ya ete sattvāḥ pañcabhiḥ skandhair bhāvasaṃjñino abhāva iti na jānanti, (PSP_5:139)
K03psp_5u:4248: teṣām arthāyaivaṃ nirdiśyate dharmāṇāṃ prabhedatām upādāya katham api bhāvam abhāvaṃ
K03psp_5u:4249: vā jñāsyanti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
K03psp_5u:4251: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4252: bodhisattvacaryā bodhisattvacaryeti bhagavann ucyate kasyaitad adhivacanam?
K03psp_5u:4254: bodhisattvacaryeti subhūte bodhaye caryaiṣā bodhicārikā tasmād bodhisattvacaryety ucyate.
K03psp_5u:4256: kva sā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsavasya bodhisattvacaryā?
K03psp_5u:4307: carati, evam atra carati yathā bodhim advayī karoti na dvaidhī karoti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhaye carati. iti prayoge vipratipattiḥ
K03psp_5u:4308: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4312: bhūtārtho buddha ity ucyate. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhūtā asya dharmā abhisaṃbuddhās tasmād buddha ity ucyate,
K03psp_5u:4313: bhūto 'syārthaḥ pratividdhas tasmād buddha ity ucyate. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmā yathāvadabhisaṃbuddhās tasmād buddha ity ucyate. iti buddharatne vipratipattiḥ
K03psp_5u:4317: bodhir iti subhūte śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4321: dharmadhātor etad adhivacanam. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte nāmadheyamātram etad bodhir
K03psp_5u:4322: iti. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte abhedārtho bodhyarthaḥ. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte
K03psp_5u:4323: bodhis tathatāvitathatānanyatathatānanyathībhāvas tasmād bodhir ity ucyate. api tu
K03psp_5u:4324: khalu punaḥ subhūte nāmanimittamātram etad bodhir iti tasmād bodhir ucyate. api tu
K03psp_5u:4325: khalu punaḥ subhūte buddhānām eva bhagavatām eṣā bodhis tasmād bodhir ity ucyate.
K03psp_5u:4326: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte buddhair eṣā bhagavadbhir abhisaṃbuddhās tasmād bodhir
K03psp_5u:4328: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4329: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva imā yair bodhaye carati,
K03psp_5u:4336: kasya dharmasyāgame vā caraty apagame vā hānau vā vṛddhau vā utpādāya vā nirodhāya vā saṃkleśāya vyavadānāya vā?
K03psp_5u:4337: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4338: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imā yair bodhaye carati,
K03psp_5u:4344: na kasyacid dharmasyāgame vā caraty apagame vā hānau vā vṛddhau vā utpādāya vā nirodhāya
K03psp_5u:4345: vā saṃkleśāya vyavadānāya vā. na hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:4346: carata ārambaṇayogena pratyupasthitā ācaye vā apacaye vā hānau vā vṛddhau vā utpādāya
K03psp_5u:4347: vā nirodhāya vā saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā pratyupasthitā.
K03psp_5u:4349: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahyāsattvasya bodhir na kasyacid dharmasyārambaṇayogena pratyupasthitā,
K03psp_5u:4350: tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_5u:4365: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4366: na hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dvayena bodhisattvacarir,
K03psp_5u:4367: na hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvayena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_5u:4383: yadi bhagavan dānapāramitāyāṃ na dvayena caraty,
K03psp_5u:4384: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na dvayena carati,
K03psp_5u:4389: tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhate prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvat paścimakaś cittotpādaḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhate?
K03psp_5u:4390: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4391: ye subhūte dvayena caranti na te vivardhante kuśalamūlair dharmaiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4392: dvaye niśritya hi subhūte sarvabālapṛthagjanās te na vivardhate kuśalamūlair dharmair,
K03psp_5u:4393: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punar advayena carati tena prathamacittotpādam upādāya kuśalamūlair dharmair vivardhate,
K03psp_5u:4394: yāvat paścimakaś cittotpādaḥ kuśalamūlair dharmair vivardhate. tenānavamardanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena,
K03psp_5u:4395: yair akuśalair dharmair avamarditaḥ samānaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau
K03psp_5u:4396: vāpated ity ebhiś cānyaiś cākuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃhriyamāṇo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran
K03psp_5u:4399: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kuśalair dharmair vivardhate,
K03psp_5u:4401: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran na kuśalair dharmair vivardhate,
K03psp_5u:4404: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran na kuśalair dharmair vivardhate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
K03psp_5u:4406: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K03psp_5u:4408: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_5u:4412: kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptum.
K03psp_5u:4414: kathaṃ bhagavan paryupāsya buddhān bhagavataḥ kuśalamulāni (PSP_5:143)
K03psp_5u:4415: paripūrya kalyāṇamitraparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
K03psp_5u:4417: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paryupāste,
K03psp_5u:4418: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇam itivṛttakaṃ
K03psp_5u:4419: jātakaṃ saṃgrahavaipulyādbhutadharmāvadānopadeśāṃs tān sarvān udgṛhṇāty udgṛhya kāyena
K03psp_5u:4420: vācā suparijitān kṛtvā manasā tatprekṣitān karoti,
K03psp_5u:4424: pratisaṃvidbhir utpāditābhis tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi te dharmā na jātu vipraṇasyanti yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti,
K03psp_5u:4425: tatra tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ kuṣalamūlāny avaropayati,
K03psp_5u:4426: taiś ca kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhīto na jātv apāyair vākṣaṇair votpadyate,
K03psp_5u:4430: taiś ca kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ kalyāṇamitraiś ca na jātu virahito bhavati buddhair bhagavadbhir bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca ye buddhayānasya varṇaṃ bhāṣante,
K03psp_5u:4431: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitavyāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4434: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4435: yaḥ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāpi buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste,
K03psp_5u:4438: mā haiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt.
K03psp_5u:4440: na khalu subhūte buddhān bhagavato 'paryupāsyānavaropitakuśalamūlaḥ kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhītaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4441: buddhān eva tāvad bhagavataḥ paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny avaropya kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitvā
K03psp_5u:4442: bhajitvā paryupāsyaivaṃ kuśalamūlasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām
K03psp_5u:4443: anuprāptum asamarthaḥ prāg eva buddhān bhagavato 'paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny anavaropya
K03psp_5u:4444: kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhītaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
K03psp_5u:4447: kuśalamulāni cāvaropitavyāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni.
K03psp_5u:4449: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ paryupāsya kuśalamūlāni cāvaropya kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitvā bhaktvā paryupāsya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt?
K03psp_5u:4452: ye nopāyena śruto bhavati teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāt sadharmas tāni ca kuśalamūlāni
K03psp_5u:4453: nāvaropitāni tāni ca kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitāni bhaktitāni paryupāsitāni yāny asyopāyam
K03psp_5u:4458: yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
K03psp_5u:4459: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4460: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caran
K03psp_5u:4461: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dānaṃ dadāti buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ
K03psp_5u:4463: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ samanvāgato na cāsya dānasaṃjñā bhavati,
K03psp_5u:4466: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
K03psp_5u:4467: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
K03psp_5u:4474: na ca dānaphalam upajīvati yad dānaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā dānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
K03psp_5u:4475: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ śīlaṃ
K03psp_5u:4476: tasya naiva rāge cittaṃ patati na doṣe na mohe nānuśaye na paryutthāne patati,
K03psp_5u:4478: ye bodhaye paripanthakās tadyathā mātsaryacittaṃ vā dauḥśīlyacittaṃ vā kṣubdhacittaṃ vā kauśīdyacittaṃ vā hīnacittaṃ vā bhrāntacittaṃ (PSP_5:145)
K03psp_5u:4479: vā dauṣprajñacittaṃ vā mānātimāno 'dhimāno 'smimānaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittaṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4480: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
K03psp_5u:4481: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
K03psp_5u:4486: sa śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
K03psp_5u:4488: na ca śīlaphalam upajīvati yac chīlaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati.
K03psp_5u:4489: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati,
K03psp_5u:4490: sa svakeṣv api prāṇeṣu vyavaropyamāneṣu na pratidahyate,
K03psp_5u:4492: sa jīvitād vyaparopyamāno 'pi sarvasve vāpahriyamāṇe dāre vākṛṣyamāṇe mṛṣāvāda ucyamānaḥ
K03psp_5u:4493: piśunaṃ paruṣaṃ saṃbhinnaṃ vocyamāna ākruṣyamāṇo vā tāḍyamāno vā cchidyamāno vā na
K03psp_5u:4494: kṣubhyati sattvānām eva hitam utpādayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4496: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
K03psp_5u:4499: so 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ kuśalair dharmair vivardhate sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamānaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_5u:4500: sa kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
K03psp_5u:4502: na ca kṣāntiphalam upajīvati yat kṣāntiphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati.
K03psp_5u:4503: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vīryam
K03psp_5u:4504: dṛḍhasaṃnāho dṛḍhaparākramo na kauśīdyaṃ vā alasacittaṃ votpādayati,
K03psp_5u:4505: sa bodher arthāya duḥkham api na gaṇapatidakṣo 'nalaso 'pi śaktibhir vāryamāṇo manuṣyaduṣkham
K03psp_5u:4506: asuraduḥkhaṃ tiryagyoniduḥkhaṃ narakaduṣkham api na gaṇapatir api śaktibhir vāryamāṇaḥ. tat (PSP_5:146)
K03psp_5u:4508: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
K03psp_5u:4509: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
K03psp_5u:4513: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
K03psp_5u:4515: na ca vīryaphalam upajīvati yad vīryaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati.
K03psp_5u:4516: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dhyānaṃ
