K03psp_5u:4517: cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī bhavati,
K03psp_5u:4518: yathāvikaraṇam evaṃ cakṣurindriyeṇāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtaṃ viharantam abhidhyā daurmanasyāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anuśraveyuḥ,
K03psp_5u:4519: teṣāṃ saṃvarāya pratipadyate rakṣati cakṣurindriyam evaṃ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā,
K03psp_5u:4523: manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati,
K03psp_5u:4525: yathāvikaraṇam evaṃ manaindriyenāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtaṃ viharantam abhidhyā daurmanasyāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anuśraveyuḥ,
K03psp_5u:4528: sa gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi bhāṣamāno 'pi tūṣṇībhūto 'pi samāhitāvasthāṃ na jahāti na vijahāti,
K03psp_5u:4530: śāntakāyaḥ śāntavāk śāntacitto rahasyarahasi vāvikalpiteryāpatho yaiḥ kecid apy annapānaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ
K03psp_5u:4531: saṃtuṣṭaḥ surabhaḥ supoṣyaḥ kalyāṇācāragocaraḥ saṃgaṇikāyā api vivekagocaraḥ lābhe
K03psp_5u:4532: 'lābhe ca sa nirvikāro 'nunnatāvanataḥ sukhe duṣkhe stutau nindāyāṃ yaśasyayaśasi
K03psp_5u:4533: jīvite ca maraṇe ca samo nirvikāro 'nunnatāvanataḥ,
K03psp_5u:4534: śatrau ca mitre ca sādhau cāsādhau ca manaāpavartiny amanaāpavartiny āryeṣu śabdesv anāryeṣu (PSP_5:147)
K03psp_5u:4535: śabdeṣu vivikteṣu vyavakīrṇeṣu ca samo nirvikāro 'nunnatāvanataḥ priyāpriyeṣu rūpeṣv anurodhavirodhāpagaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4536: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
K03psp_5u:4537: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
K03psp_5u:4541: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_5u:4542: sa dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
K03psp_5u:4544: na dhyānaphalam upajīvati yad dhyānaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
K03psp_5u:4545: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam
K03psp_5u:4546: upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na duṣprajño bhavati na parapraṇeyo
K03psp_5u:4548: ātmasattva jīvajantu poṣapuruṣa pudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakavigataś ca bhavati sarvadṛṣṭivigataḥ sarvaśūnyatāvigato nirvikalpo nirvikāraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4549: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
K03psp_5u:4550: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
K03psp_5u:4555: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
K03psp_5u:4557: na ca prajñāphalam upajīvati yat prajñāphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
K03psp_5u:4558: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
K03psp_5u:4563: prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na ca teṣāṃ vipākaṃ parigṛhṇāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4564: tathā hi sa tenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bhavati,
K03psp_5u:4565: yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatas tāni ca dhyānāny apramāṇārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyamānaḥ sa (PSP_5:148)
K03psp_5u:4567: asadbhutān apariniṣpannan anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
K03psp_5u:4571: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate.
K03psp_5u:4572: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran darśanabhāvanāprahātavye 'smin mārge carati,
K03psp_5u:4574: na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvam anuprāpnoti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4575: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān jānāti,
K03psp_5u:4576: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
K03psp_5u:4580: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamānaḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu carati,
K03psp_5u:4581: bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu caran śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramatīyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntiḥ.
K03psp_5u:4582: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann aṣṭavimokṣān samāpadyate,
K03psp_5u:4586: na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvam anuprāpnoti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4587: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
K03psp_5u:4588: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
K03psp_5u:4593: sa vimokṣasamādhisamāpattyāryasatyaśūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu caran śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim avakrāmatīyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānutpattikadharmavyākaraṇakṣāntiḥ.
K03psp_5u:4594: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu parijayaṃ karoti,
K03psp_5u:4596: catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ ca,
K03psp_5u:4599: sarvasattvāś ca na paripācitā bhavanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4600: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyān dharmān jānāti,
K03psp_5u:4601: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
K03psp_5u:4603: akiṃcitsamarthatāṃ ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃskāraṃ lakṣaṇam avatarati,
K03psp_5u:4605: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ caran buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
K03psp_5u:4606: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati. evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
K03psp_5u:4607: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4611: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4613: paramabuddhimantaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya evaṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu caranti,
K03psp_5u:4614: vipākaṃ ca na pratigṛhṇanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4615: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svabhāvato na calanti.
K03psp_5u:4620: yat punar āyuṣmān subūtir evam āha katamasmāt svabhāvān na calanti,
K03psp_5u:4622: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
K03psp_5u:4627: śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvān na calanti,
K03psp_5u:4628: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvān na calanti,
K03psp_5u:4629: apramāṇasvabhāvād dhyānārūpyasamāpattisvabhāvāt smṛtyupasthānasvabhāvāt samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgasvabhāvād āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasvabhāvān na calanti,
K03psp_5u:4633: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmasvabhāvān na calanti mahāmaitrīmahākaruṇāsvabhāvān na calanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4634: tathā hi subhūte ya eṣa dharmo niḥsvabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvaḥ.
K03psp_5u:4636: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4637: tat kiṃ punar bhagavann abhāvenābhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum?
K03psp_5u:4640: tat kiṃ punar bhagavan bhāvena bhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum?
K03psp_5u:4643: tat kiṃ bhagavann abhāvena bhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum?
K03psp_5u:4649: tan mā haiva bhagavan na prāptir nābhisamayo bhaviṣyati?
K03psp_5u:4660: sa tādṛśo 'bhisamayo yatraite prapañcā na saṃvidyante,
K03psp_5u:4663: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4664: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prapañcaḥ?
K03psp_5u:4666: rūpan nityam anityam iti vā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prapañcaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4668: vijñānaṃ nityam anityam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4671: vijñānaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkham iti vā prapañcaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4677: vijñānaṃ śāntam aśāntam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4678: rūpaṃ parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4680: saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4682: iti vā prapañcaḥ. duṣkham āryasatyaṃ parijñeyam iti prapañcaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4690: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayitavyānīti prapañcaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4694: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvam atikramiṣyāmīti prapañcaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4703: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyāmīti prapañcaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4704: catvāri vaiśāradyāni daśatathāgatabalāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān utpādayiṣyāmīti prapañcaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4706: sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān prahāsyāmīti prapañcaḥ. tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ nityam anityam ity aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
K03psp_5u:4710: parijñeyam aparijñeyam ity aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
K03psp_5u:4712: vijñānaṃ nityam anityam aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
K03psp_5u:4716: parijñeyam aparijñeyam ity aprapañcan na prapañcayati. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādān pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca nityam anityam iti,
K03psp_5u:4720: parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vāprapañcan na prapañcayati. evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatā
K03psp_5u:4723: srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhattvapratyekabuddhabodhim atikramiṣyāmity aprapañcan na prapañcayati. sarvākārajñatām atikramiṣyāmity aprapañcan na prapañcayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4726: na hi svabhāvo 'bhāvaṃ vā sthāpayitvā anyat kiñcid upalabhate,
K03psp_5u:4729: yena vā prapañcayet. tasmāt tarhi subhūte niṣprapañcaṃ rūpaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4734: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāny
K03psp_5u:4739: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir niṣprapañcā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena niṣprapañcena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
K03psp_5u:4741: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ yāvad vijñānaṃ niḥprapañcaṃ peyālaṃ yāvad bodhir niṣprapañcā?
K03psp_5u:4742: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4744: nāsti vedanāyā nāsti saṃjñāyā nāsti saṃskārāṇāṃ nāsti vijñānasya svabhāvo,
K03psp_5u:4746: pāramitānāṃ svabhāvo nāsti śūnyatāmukhānāṃ svabhāvaḥ. evaṃ nāsti
K03psp_5u:4749: yasya svabhāvaṃ nāsti so 'prapañco 'nena subhūte kāraṇena niṣprapañcaṃ rūpaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4754: sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatā bodhipakṣyā dharmā niṣprapañcāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4758: sarvākārajñatā niṣprapañcā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhi sattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati.
K03psp_5u:4759: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4760: yadi bhagavan na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāva upalabhate,
K03psp_5u:4761: tat katamena mārgeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati?
K03psp_5u:4762: kiṃ śrāvakamārgeṇa vā pratyekabuddhamārgeṇa vā buddhamārgeṇa vā?
K03psp_5u:4763: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4764: na subhūte śrāvakamārgeṇa vā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati
K03psp_5u:4765: na pratyekabuddhamārgeṇa vā na buddhamārgeṇa vā. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_5u:4767: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte arhan sarvamārgeṣu śikṣitvā samyaktvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
K03psp_5u:4769: yāvan na phalamārgam utpādayati. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān utpādya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
K03psp_5u:4771: yāvan na vajropamaḥ samādhiḥ pratilabdho bhavati,
K03psp_5u:4772: tataḥ sa ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. iti viparyāse vipratipattiḥ
K03psp_5u:4773: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4774: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān paripūrya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
K03psp_5u:4776: anyaḥ srotaāpannasyānyaḥ sakṛdāgāmitāyāḥ pratipannakasyānyaḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nyo 'nāgāmitāyāḥ pratipannakasyānyo 'nāgāmino 'nyo 'rhattvapratipannakasyānyo 'rhato mārgaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4779: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān paripūrya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati? (PSP_5:154)
K03psp_5u:4780: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgāḥ paripurayitavyāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4781: mā khalu bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ṣṭamakamārgam utpādyāṣṭamako bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_5u:4783: bhāvanāmārgam utpādya sakṛdāgāmitāyai pratipannakaḥ sakṛdāgāmī bhaviṣyaty,
K03psp_5u:4787: asthānaṃ bhagavann anavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ṣṭamakamārgam utpādyāṣṭamakaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4788: syād aṣṭamako bhūtvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmed iti,
K03psp_5u:4792: evaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpya sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyārhattvaṃ prāpya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ prāpya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmed
K03psp_5u:4795: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kathaṃ bhagavan jānīyāma vayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān utpādya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmatiti?
K03psp_5u:4796: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4798: asthānaṃ subhūte anavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ṣṭamako bhūtvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ
K03psp_5u:4799: prāpya sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyārhattvaṃ prāpya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ
K03psp_5u:4805: kathaṃ bhagavann etān mārgān prāpya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
K03psp_5u:4806: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4807: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carann aṣṭau bhūmīr jñānena ca darśanena cātikrāmati. katamā
K03psp_5u:4808: yad uta śuklavidarśanābhūmir gotrabhūmir aṣṭamakabhūmir darśanabhūmis tanūbhūmir vītarāgabhūmiḥ kṛtāvībhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmir,
K03psp_5u:4809: ayaṃ bhūminirdeśaḥ. sa imā aṣṭau bhūmīr jñānena darśanena cātikramya mārgajñatayā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
K03psp_5u:4811: sarvākārajñatājñānena sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān prajahāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4812: tathā hi subhūte yad aṣṭamakasya jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
K03psp_5u:4813: yaṃ srotaāpannasya jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
K03psp_5u:4814: yat sakṛdāgāmino jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
K03psp_5u:4815: yad anāgāmino jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
K03psp_5u:4816: yad arhato jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
K03psp_5u:4817: yat pratyekabuddhasya jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ.
K03psp_5u:4818: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
K03psp_5u:4820: bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya sarvākārajñatājñānena ca sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān prajahāti.
K03psp_5u:4821: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgān paripūryānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
K03psp_5u:4822: abhisaṃbodhavyā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvānāṃ phalopabhogena bhavitavyam.
K03psp_5u:4823: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4824: ya ime bhagavan mārgā ākhyātāḥ śrāvakamārgaḥ pratyekabuddhamārgo buddhamārgaḥ,
K03psp_5u:4827: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgākārajñatāviśuddhir utpādayitavyā,
K03psp_5u:4828: tatreyaṃ subhūte sarvadharmā mārgākārajñatāviśuddhiḥ. yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ sarvamārgākārajñatā visuddhir bhavati,
K03psp_5u:4829: te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvenābhisaṃboddhavyāni,
K03psp_5u:4830: abhisaṃbudhya pareṣām ākhyātavyāni nirdeśayitavyāni prakāśayitavyāni prajñepayitavyāni prasthāpayitavyāni,
K03psp_5u:4831: vivaritavyāni parebhyo vinayārthāya yathā pare jānīyur iti. tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvarutasaṃketaghoṣāḥ samudānayitavyā uccārayitavyāś
K03psp_5u:4832: yai rutasaṃketaghoṣaiḥ trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau vijñāpayati yadidaṃ pratiśrutkopamā
K03psp_5u:4833: jñānena. tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgākārajñatā paripūrayitavyā,
K03psp_5u:4835: nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ nairayiko mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ tataś ca nairayikamārgān nivārayitavyāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4839: sattvānāṃ tiryagmārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyo phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ tataś ca tiryagmārgān nivārayitavyāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4841: phalato nivārayitavyāḥ. evaṃ kiṃnarāṇāṃ mahoragānāṃ nāgānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ gandharvāṇām
K03psp_5u:4842: asurāṇāṃ garuḍānāṃ guhyakānāṃ cāraṇānāṃ vidyādharāṇāṃ siddhānāṃ sādhyānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ
K03psp_5u:4843: mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4844: cāturmahārājakānāṃ devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ
K03psp_5u:4845: brahmapāriṣadyānāṃ devānāṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ mahābrahmāṇo mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyam,
K03psp_5u:4846: ābhāsvarāṇāṃ parīttābhānām apramāṇābhānāṃ parīttaśubhānāṃ apramāṇaśubhānāṃ śubhakṛtsnānām
K03psp_5u:4847: anubhrakānāṃ puṇyaprasavānāṃ bṛhatphalānām asaṃjñisattvānāṃ śuddhāvāsānām aspṛhāṇām
K03psp_5u:4850: devānāṃ mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyam. catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayitavyāni,
K03psp_5u:4864: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā jñātavyāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4865: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā jñātavyā. yaiś ca mārgair ye sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ tān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_5u:4866: ye sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ tān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_5u:4867: ye anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ tān anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_5u:4869: ye pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā tān pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_5u:4870: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyās tān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_5u:4872: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣitvā sattvānām āśayam avatarati,
K03psp_5u:4873: sattvānām āśayam avatīrya tathā dharmaṃ deśayati yathāsya sā dharmadeśanāmoghākṣaṇā bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4874: tathā hy asya puruṣendriye parāparajñānaṃ suvibhaktaṃ suvijñātaṃ ca bhavati,
K03psp_5u:4875: sattvānāṃ gatiṃ cyutim upapattiṃ ca prajānāti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
K03psp_5u:4876: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ sarvadharmā antargatā,
K03psp_5u:4878: yatra bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiś caritavyaṃ śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā caritavyam.
K03psp_5u:4879: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4880: yadi bhagavan ye bodhipakṣyā dharmā yāvad yā bodhiḥ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4882: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodher āhārikā bhavanti?
K03psp_5u:4883: evaṃ bhagavan na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā dharmā na kasyacid dharmasyāhārikā vāpahārikā
K03psp_5u:4884: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavann ākāśan na kasyacid dharmasyāhārakaṃ vāpahārakaṃ vā. evam eva bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyā dharmā na kasyacid dharmasyāhārakā vāpahārakā vā.
K03psp_5u:4887: na subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyā dharmāḥ kasyacid dharmasyāhārakā vāpahārakā vā,
K03psp_5u:4888: ye vā subhūte sattvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān na jānanti,
K03psp_5u:4890: ime bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodher āhārakā bhavanti.
K03psp_5u:4892: api tu khalu subhūte yañ ca rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac ca
K03psp_5u:4893: vijñānaṃ ye ca skandhā ye ca dhātavo yāni cāyatanāni yaś ca pratītyasamutpādo yāni
K03psp_5u:4894: ca pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni yā ca dānapāramitā yā ca śīlapāramitā yā ca kṣāntipāramitā
K03psp_5u:4895: yā ca vīryapāramitā yā ca dhyānapāramitā yā ca prajñāpāramitā yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā
K03psp_5u:4896: yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāva śūnyatā
K03psp_5u:4897: yac ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yac ca dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ yac ca tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ yac ca caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4898: yac cākāśānantyāyatanaṃ yac ca vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ yac cākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ yac ca naivasaṃjñānā saṃjñāyatanaṃ yā ca mahāmaitrī yā ca mahākaruṇā yā ca mahāmuditā yā ca (PSP_5:158)
K03psp_5u:4900: śūnyatā yac cānimittaṃ yac cāpraṇihitaṃ ye cāṣṭavimokṣā yāś ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo
K03psp_5u:4901: yāni cāryasātyāni yāś cābhijñā ye ca samādhayo yāni ca dhāraṇīmukhāni yāś ca daśabodhisattvabhūmayo
K03psp_5u:4902: yāni ca daśatathāgatabalāni yāni ca catvāri vaiśāradyāni yāś ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
K03psp_5u:4903: ye cāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yā ca mahākaruṇā yā ca yāvat sarvākārajñatā,
K03psp_5u:4904: ārye 'smin dharmavinaye sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā
K03psp_5u:4905: apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ. te ca khalu punaḥ subhūte tathāgatena sattvānām
K03psp_5u:4906: avatāraṇārthāya lokavyavahāreṇa vyavakṛtās te dharmā prajñāpayitavyāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4907: na punaḥ paramārthena. tatra subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvatra śikṣitavyaṃ jñānena ca darśanena ca śikṣitvā kecid dharmāḥ pratibodhavyāḥ kecin na pratibodhavyāḥ
K03psp_5u:4909: katame dharmā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena jñānena ca darśanena ca śikṣitvā na pratibodhavyāḥ?
K03psp_5u:4912: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca śikṣitvā jñānena ca darśanena ca na pratibodhavyā,
K03psp_5u:4913: sarvākārajñatā jñānena ca darśanena ca pratibodhavyā,
K03psp_5u:4914: sarvākārajñatājñānena sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmāś ca pratibodhavyāḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ārye 'smin dharmavinaye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_5u:4915: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4916: āryo dharmavinayo 'nāryo dharmavinaya iti bhagavann ucyate,
K03psp_5u:4920: kiyatā bhagavann anāryo dharmavinaya ity ucyate?
K03psp_5u:4921: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4922: iha subhūte śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvāś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā rāgena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā,
K03psp_5u:4933: prathamena dhyānena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā,
K03psp_5u:4935: caturthena dhyānena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā,
K03psp_5u:4936: maitryā karuṇayā muditayopekṣayā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4937: ākāśānantyāyatanena vijñānānantyāyatanenākiṃcanyāyatanena naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4939: āryasatyaiḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4940: aṣṭavimokṣair navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhir na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4948: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4949: daśabhis tathāgatabalair na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4950: caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśābhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4951: saṃskṛtadhātāv asaṃskṛtadhātau na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:4952: tathā hi sarvadharmā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ,
K03psp_5u:4953: te arūpiṇo 'rūpibhiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā,
K03psp_5u:4954: anidarśanā nidarśanaiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā,
K03psp_5u:4955: apratighā apratighaiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā,
K03psp_5u:4956: alakṣaṇā alakṣaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā. iti vipakṣapratipakṣayor vipratipattiḥ
K03psp_5u:4957: imā subhūte 'rūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā pāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yatra bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4958: yatra śikṣitvā na kasyacid dharmasya lakṣaṇam upalabhyate.
K03psp_5u:4959: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:4960: na punar bhagavan rūpalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ na vedanālakṣaṇe na saṃjñālakṣaṇe na saṃskāralakṣaṇe na vijñānalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4964: nābdhātulakṣaṇe na tejodhātulakṣaṇe na vāyudhātulakṣaṇe nākāśadhātulakṣaṇe (PSP_5:160)
K03psp_5u:4967: na śīlapāramitālakṣaṇe na kṣāntipāramitālakṣaṇe na vīryapāramitālakṣaṇe na dhyānapāramitālakṣaṇe na prajñāpāramitālakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4968: nādhyātmaśūnyatālakṣaṇe na bahirdhāśūnyatālakṣaṇe nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatālakṣaṇe na yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatālakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4970: na dvitīyadhyānalakṣaṇe na tṛtīyadhyānalakṣaṇe na caturthadhyānalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4971: na mahāmaitrīlakṣaṇe na mahākaruṇālakṣaṇe na muditālakṣaṇe nopekṣālakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4972: nākāśānantyāyatanalakṣaṇe na vijñānānantyāyatanalakṣaṇe nākiṃcanyāyatanalakṣaṇe naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4994: yadi bhagavann eteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇe na śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:4995: kathaṃ bhagavan na śikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmāṇāṃ dharmalakṣaṇe śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramiṣyati?
K03psp_5u:4999: dharmacakram apravartya kathaṃ sattvān saṃsārāt parimocayiṣyati śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā buddhayānena vā?
K03psp_5u:5000: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:5001: yadi subhūte kasyacid dharmasya lakṣaṇaṃ syāt,
K03psp_5u:5002: tadā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ syād,
K03psp_5u:5003: yasmāt tarhi sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇās tasmāt tad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāpi lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:5004: yadi pūrvaṃ lakṣaṇam abhaviṣyat paścād alakṣaṇaṃ na bhaved,
K03psp_5u:5005: yasmāt tarhi subhūte pūrvam eva te sarvadharmā alakṣaṇās tasmāt tarhy apy alakṣaṇās,
K03psp_5u:5006: tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāpi lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_5u:5007: nāpy alakṣaṇe śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:5008: utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthita evaiṣa lakṣaṇadhātuḥ.
K03psp_5u:5010: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:5011: yadi bhagavann alakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā na vilakṣaṇāḥ,
K03psp_5u:5013: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati?
K03psp_5u:5014: na hi bhagavann avibhāvya prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śakyā śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā atikramitum,
K03psp_5u:5015: anatikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā na śakyo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramituṃ,
K03psp_5u:5016: bodhisattvaniyāmam anavakramya na śakyānutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntir utpādayitum,
K03psp_5u:5017: anutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntim anutpādya na śakyā bodhisattvābhijñā utpādayituṃ,
K03psp_5u:5019: buddhakṣetram apariśodhya na śakyāḥ sattvān paripācāyituṃ,
K03psp_5u:5020: sattvān aparipācya na śakyā sarvākārajñatām anuprāptuṃ,
K03psp_5u:5021: sarvākārajñatām ananuprāpya na śakyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayituṃ,
K03psp_5u:5022: dharmacakram apravartya na śakyāḥ sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ,
K03psp_5u:5026: nāpi śakyāḥ sattvā dānamaye puṇyakriyāvastūni pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ,
K03psp_5u:5029: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:5035: na subhūte prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bodhisattvasya mahāsāttvasyaikalakṣaṇā anekalakṣaṇā,
K03psp_5u:5036: alakṣaṇā bhāvanā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati.
K03psp_5u:5038: kathaṃ bhagavann alakṣaṇā bhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati?
K03psp_5u:5157: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:5166: sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaphalaṃ pratyekabodhir yāvat kathaṃ bhagavan sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇabhāvanāvibhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā?
K03psp_5u:5167: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:5168: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati,
K03psp_5u:5170: vijñānaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:5176: anuśayaparyutthānāni bhāva iti na bhāvayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_5u:5180: tathā hi subhūte bhāve eṣo 'ham iti saṃjñā,
K03psp_5u:5183: yo dvābhyām antābhyāṃ saktas tasya nāsti vimokṣo,
K03psp_5u:5184: nāsti subhūte bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā na samyakprahāṇabhāvanā narddhipādabhāvanā
K03psp_5u:5185: nendriyabhāvanā na balabhāvanā na bodhyaṅgabhāvanā nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanā na duḥkhāryasatyabhāvanā
K03psp_5u:5186: na samudayāryasatyabhāvanā na nirodhāryasatyabhāvanā na mārgāryasatyabhāvanā na śūnyatābhāvanā
K03psp_5u:5188: na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhāvanā na sarvaśūnyatābhāvanā na samādhidhāraṇīmukhabhāvanā
K03psp_5u:5192: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:5226: yāvat saṃskārās tāvat sattvā na parimucyante jātyā jarayā vyādhinā maraṇena śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ. tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ
K03psp_5u:5228: nāsti śīlaṃ nāsti kṣāntir nāsti vīryaṃ nāsti dhyānaṃ nāsti prajñā nāsti mārgo nāsti jñānaṃ nāsty abhisamayo nāsty antaśo 'nulomikī kṣāntiḥ. kutaḥ punā rūpasya parijñā,
K03psp_5u:5237: kutaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ parijñā yasya nāsti mārgabhāvanā,
K03psp_5u:5244: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:5245: yadi bhagavan bhāvasaṃjñina ānulomikī kṣāntir nāsti kutaḥ punaḥ prāptiḥ kuto 'bhisamayaḥ?
K03psp_5u:5246: kiṃ punar bhagavann abhāvasaṃjñina ānulomikī kṣāntiḥ? (PSP_5:167)
K03psp_5u:5247: śuklavidarśanābhūmir vā gotrabhūmir vā aṣṭamakabhūmir vā darśanabhūmir vā tanūbhūmir vā vītarāgabhūmir vā kṛtāvībhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā bodhisattvabhūmir vā,
K03psp_5u:5248: yā ca mārgabhāvanām āgamya kleśān prajahīta śrāvakabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā pratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā,
K03psp_5u:5251: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvan sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān prajahīta. punar bhagavan nābhāvasaṃjñinaḥ kasyacid dharmasya sthānaṃ vā nirodho vā utpādo vā bhavati,
K03psp_5u:5253: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:5256: na śuklavidarśanābhūmir na gotrabhūmir nāṣṭamakabhūmir na darśanabhūmir na tanūbhūmir na vītarāgabhūmir na kṛtāvībhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmir na bodhisattvabhūmir,
K03psp_5u:5257: na sā mārgabhāvanāyāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya kleśān prajahīta śrāvakabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā pratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā,
K03psp_5u:5262: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhāvasaṃjñā vā bhāvaty abhavasaṃjñā vā,
K03psp_5u:5263: rūpasaṃjñā vā vedanāsaṃjñā vā saṃjñāsaṃjñā vā saṃskārasaṃjñā vā vijñānasaṃjñā vā,
K03psp_5u:5267: rāgasaṃjñā vā rāgaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā doṣasaṃjñā vā doṣaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā mohasaṃjñā vā mohaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā,
K03psp_5u:5268: avidyāsaṃjñā vāvidyāprahāṇasaṃjñā vā saṃskārasaṃjñā vā saṃskāraprahāṇasaṃjñā vā vijñānasaṃjñā
K03psp_5u:5269: vā vijñānaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā nāmarūpasaṃjñā vā nāmarūpaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā ṣaḍāyatanasaṃjñā
K03psp_5u:5270: vā ṣaḍāyatanaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā sparśasaṃjñā vā sparśaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā vedanāsaṃjñā
K03psp_5u:5272: tṛṣṇāsaṃjñā vā tṛṣṇāprahāṇasaṃjñā vopādānasaṃjñā vopādānaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā bhavasaṃjñā
K03psp_5u:5273: vā bhavaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā jātisaṃjñā vā jātiprahāṇasaṃjñā vā jarāmaraṇasaṃjñā vā jarāmaraṇaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā,
K03psp_5u:5274: śokaparidevasaṃjñā vā śokaparidevaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā duṣkhasaṃjñā vā duṣkhaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā daurmanasyopāyāsasaṃjñā vā daurmanasyopāyāsaprahāṇasaṃjñā
K03psp_5u:5275: duḥkhasaṃjñā vā duḥkhaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā samudayasaṃjñā vā samudayaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā nirodhasaṃjñā vā nirodhaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā mārgasaṃjñā vā mārgaprahāṇasaṃjñā
K03psp_5u:5276: sarvākārajñatāsaṃjñā vā sarvākārajñatāprahāṇasaṃjñā vā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśasaṃjñā vā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā.
K03psp_5u:5278: naitat subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kvacid dharme bhāvasaṃjñā vābhāvasaṃjñā vā,
K03psp_5u:5279: eṣaiva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānulomikī kṣāntir yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā vābhāvasaṃjñā vā,
K03psp_5u:5280: eṣaivāsya mārgabhāvanā yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā nābhāvasaṃjñā,
K03psp_5u:5281: etad evāsya phalaṃ yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā nābhāvasaṃjñā. abhāvaḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgaḥ,
K03psp_5u:5285: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:5288: yeṣām abhisaṃbodhāya sarvadharmeṣu ca vaśavartitā visayavartitā cānuprāptā?
K03psp_5u:5289: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:5290: ihāhaṃ subhūte pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran viviktaṃ kāmair
K03psp_5u:5291: viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ
K03psp_5u:5294: teṣāñ ca dhyānānāṃ dhyānāṅgānāṃ ca nimittam anudgṛhṇaṃs taiś ca dhyānair dhyānāṅgaiś ca na manye,
K03psp_5u:5296: dhyānāni dhyānāṅgāni ca nopalabhe. so 'han tāni catvāri dhyānāny ākāraviśuddhāny upasaṃpadyotsāhaṃ dhyānaṃ vipākaṃ kṛtvā vābhijñājñānasākṣātkriyāyai cittam abhinirṇāmayāmi,
K03psp_5u:5302: so 'han tāsāṃ sākṣātkriyānāṃ nimittam anudgṛhṇaṃs tābhir abhijñābhir na manye,
K03psp_5u:5304: so 'han tāḥ pañcābhijñā ākāśasamāḥ paśyāmi samāpadye,
K03psp_5u:5305: so 'haṃ punaḥ subhūte ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya yāvad idaṃ duṣkhaṃ,
K03psp_5u:5309: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiḥ samanvāgataś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sattvāṃs triṣu rāśiṣu vyākaromi.
K03psp_5u:5310: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:5311: kathaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhāvasvabhāvāni catvāri dhyānāny utpāditāni ṣaḍ abhijñā utpāditāḥ sattvāsattayā ca sattvās triṣu rāśiṣu vyākṛtāḥ?
K03psp_5u:5312: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_5u:5313: sacet subhūte kāmānāṃ vā pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo vā bhāvo vābhāvo vā bhaviṣyan,
K03psp_5u:5314: nāhaṃ subhūte pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran nābhāvasvabhāvān pāpakān akuśalān dharmān viditvā prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyahārṣaṃ,
K03psp_5u:5315: yasmāt tarhi subhūte kāmānāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā nāsti,
K03psp_5u:5316: pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā nāsty anyatrābhāvasvabhāvāt,
K03psp_5u:5317: tasmād ahaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyahārṣaṃ,
K03psp_5u:5318: evaṃ yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyahārṣam. sacet subhūte abhijñānāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā abhaviṣyan,
K03psp_5u:5319: nāhaṃ subhūte sarvābhijñā abhāvasvabhāvā iti viditvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye yāvat sattvāṃs tribhyo rāśibhyo na vyupaśamayiṣye,
K03psp_5u:5320: yasmāt tarhi subhūte sarvābhijñānāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā nāsty anyatrābhāvasvabhāvāt,
K03psp_5u:5321: tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvābhijñā abhāvasvabhāvā iti viditvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syāṃ,
K03psp_5u:5326: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ mūrdhābhisamayādhikāraḥ śikṣāpariśuddhiparivartaḥ
